[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde nga bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D101}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ku sha la mU la saM pa ri gra ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[1b.2\]]po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal 
[\[1b.3\]]po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'di lta ste/_bsam gtan pa rnams kyi gnas/_gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas/_stong pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas/_
[\[1b.4\]]mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas na 'di lta ste/_dge slong 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[1b.5\]]te/_thams cad kyang sgra bskyungs pa/_dben pa la gnas pa/_nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang du yang dag 'jog 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_
[\[2a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang /_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[2a.3\]]dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ci 'jigs dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas dang /_tshe dang ldan pa mis byin gyi bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa thang la gnas pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa mo ki la dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang /_
[\[2a.4\]]de dag dang gzhan yang dbang dang ldan par gyur pa lnga brgya tham pa phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 
[\[2a.5\]]'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang /_tshe dang ldan pa las mchod dang /_tshe dang ldan pa grags 'dod dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' sde dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' 'dod dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang dge 
[\[2a.6\]]slong lnga brgya tham pa lam du zhugs pa las dbyar mnyan yod na gnas nas/_rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong dang lhan cig tu yul tsam par dbyar gnas nas lam du zhugs te/_rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la 
[\[2b.2\]]ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_ded 
[\[2b.3\]]dpon bzang po dang /_phug sbas dang /_mis byin dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_chu lha dang /_tshangs lha dang /_stobs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_bla ma'i blo gros dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_'phel ba'i blo gros dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_legs par yang dag zhugs dang /_rab kyi 
[\[2b.4\]]rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang /_rtag tu brtson dang /_brtson pa mi gtong dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_'gro ba 'dzin dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_bdud rtsi 'dzin dang /_blo gros rab gnas dang /_blo gros mtha' yas dang /_brtan pa'i blo gros dang /_'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon 
[\[2b.5\]]dang /_mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang /_dpag med rnam par gnon dang /_rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang /_don yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang /_mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang /_spobs pa chen po dang spobs pa rnon po dang /_spobs pa zab 
[\[2b.6\]]pa dang /_spobs pa mtha' yas dang /_spobs pa dpag med dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_pad ma dpal gyi snying po dang /_chos 'phags dang /_lag na rin chen dang /_rin chen 'dzin dang /_bskal pa 'gyur ba mtha' yas par go cha bgos pa dang /_
[\[2b.7\]]bud med 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang /_skyes pa 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang /_sems can 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang /_mtha' yas khyu mchog dang /_dpag med khyu mchog dang /_dmigs pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa sha stag ste/_yul tha dad pa rnams su dbyar gnas par gnas nas yul rgyu zhing gcig tu 'dus te/_rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba 
[\[3a.2\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[3a.3\]]ji lta bu'i mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang 
[\[3a.4\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du 
[\[3a.5\]]mdzad do/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lus 'phags ri la dbang po'i brag phug na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/_bsod snyoms pa/_phyag dar khrod pa/_chos gos gsum pa/_cog pu pa/_rtswa'i gding ba pa/_shing drung pa/_'dod pa nyung ba/_chog 
[\[3a.6\]]shes pa/_rab tu dben pa pa/_chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba sha stag dang lhan cig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dge slong lnga brgya tham pa de dag dang lhan cig tu lus 'phags 
[\[3a.7\]]ri'i dbang po'i brag phug nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'dug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs te/_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gnas brtan 'od srung chen po 'ong ba 'di ni dgon pa pa/_bsod snyoms pa/_phyag dar khrod pa/_chos gos gsum pa/_chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba/_bas mtha'i gnas 
[\[3b.2\]]mal la gnas pa/_'dod pa chung ba/_chog shes pa/_rab tu dben par gnas pa/_ma 'dres pa/_chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa ste/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ji snyed pa ni dge slong dag da ltar dge slong 'od srung chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag 
[\[3b.3\]]dang mtshungs pa'am 'dra ba ni ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung chos gos gsum pa ni lha rnams dang yang smra ba dang kun du smra bar mi 'dod na mi rnams dang lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring 
[\[3b.4\]]po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_'od srung tshur shog 'od srung khyod legs par 'ongs so/_/kye ma gnas brtan 'od srung gis ni 'di lta ste/_'dir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas rnam grangs byas so/_/'od srung khyod gdan 'di'i phyed la 'dug shig 
[\[3b.5\]]ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bskyod pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun 
[\[3b.6\]]du rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg cing 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni 'di lta ste/_dper na yul ma ga d+hA'i khar ba'i snod la lcags kyi thu lum gyis bsnun na 'ur 'ur zer ba de 
[\[3b.7\]]bzhin du btsun pa 'od srung chen po la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan las bskyod nas/_de nas de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgra skad chen po 'byin to/_/de nas 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[4a.2\]]la mgo bos gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags la bdag ni nyan thos lags pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gos 
[\[4a.3\]]sam/_lhung bzed dam/_gdan nam/_de las gzhan pa'i longs spyod rnams nyan thos rnams kyis longs spyad par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa 
[\[4a.4\]]lags shing /_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod pa gang dag blangs pa de dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das mchod rten du gyur pa lags pa'i slad du ste/_de dag bdag gis ma spyad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de slan chad 'dod pa'i 
[\[4a.5\]]rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa'am/_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa'am/_'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdungs par gyur pa'am/_zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi 
[\[4a.6\]]yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs par gyur par ma dran lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mdor na slob par gyur pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod ma nos pa rnams mi slob pa'i sa la thug gi bar du spyi bos mnos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[4a.7\]]bdag gis longs spyad pa'i slad du blangs pa ni ma lags kyi gdams pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa las brtsams nas blangs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag blangs nas sems mtho ba'am dma' bar gyur par mi dran lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]phyag dar khrod de dag chos gos ma mchis pa'i lus la spyad par mi dran lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod de dag sug pa ma ser bas reg par mi dran lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag mgos 'tshal 
[\[4b.2\]]cing mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag yan lag mi gtsang ba gang gis kyang reg par mi dran lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mchod rten du gyur pa de dag bcangs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bcom ldan 
[\[4b.3\]]'das kyis spangs shing gnang ba lags te/_de dag ni bdag gis bcangs lags so/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ma lags par de las gzhan snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis bdag gzhan du gnas par mi dran lags so/_/bdag ji ltar gnas pa na sa la sa'i 'du 
[\[4b.4\]]shes su ma gyur pa dang /_chu la chu'i 'du shes dang /_me la me'i 'du shes dang /_rlung la rlung gi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang /_'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das gang mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_
[\[4b.5\]]bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rjes su brtags pa dang /_rjes su bsams pa de la yang bdag 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang /_'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang /_
[\[4b.6\]]gang 'du shes las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang /_gang 'du shes med pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang /_gang 'du shes kyi gnas pa dang /_gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang /_gang 'du shes thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i 
[\[4b.7\]]gnas pa de yang slob pa'i gnas pa dang /_/mi slob pa'i gnas par bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams dang /_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags te/_bdag ni de ltar gnas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na nam mkha' bla gab ma mchis pa la ming dang brda dang gdags pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag_/bcom 
[\[5a.2\]]ldan 'das ming dang brda dang gdags pa gang dag gis nam mkha' zhes tha snyad du btags pa dang /_nam mkha' zhes brdar btags pa dang /_nam mkha' zhes rten du bgyis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' zhe'am/_bla gab ma mchis pa zhe'am/_stong pa zhe'am/_
[\[5a.3\]]gsog ce'am/_gsob ce'am/_yam brla zhe'am/_gzung ba ma mchis pa zhe'am/_tshad ma mchis pa zhe'am/_rten pa ma mchis pa zhe'am/_blang ba ma mchis pa zhe'am/_dor ba ma mchis pa zhe'am/_lus ma mchis pa zhe'am/_ji lta ba bzhin zhe'am/_yongs 
[\[5a.4\]]su dag pa zhe'am/_bar snang zhe'am/_thogs pa ma mchis pa zhe'am/_dngos po ma mchis pa zhe'am/_bstan du ma mchis pa zhes de dag dang /_gzhan yang tha snyad kyi brda tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_tshad 'di tsama'am/_
[\[5a.5\]]yongs su bcad pa 'di tsam 'am/_mnyam pa'am/_mi mnyam pa zhes ming ngam/_brda'am/_rten rnams kyis 'tshal bar mi nus lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag de'i phyogs tsam zhig 'tshal ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang kha dog gam/_dbyibs sam/_
[\[5a.6\]]dmigs pas nam mkha' de tshad 'di tsam dang /_mchog 'di tsam zhes bgyi ba ma 'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'am/_sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'am/_ston pa zhe'am/_skyabs zhe'am/_dpung 
[\[5a.7\]]gnyen zhe'am/_gnas zhe'am/_'dren pa zhe'am/_rnam par 'dren pa zhe'am/_yongs su 'dren pa zhe'am/_sman pa zhe'am/_gso ba pa zhe'am/_lam ston pa zhe'am/_lam brjod pa zhe'am/_gzhan yang tha snyad tha dad pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]brjod pa'i tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis mkhas pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bstod pa dang /_bkur ba dang /_bsngags pa dang rab tu bstod pa dang /_rab tu bsngags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis 'jig rten mngon par brjod 
[\[5b.2\]]pa'i chos de dag ni bcom ldan 'das bdag ma 'tshal mi rten ma mthong lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brla dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis gsob lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na 
[\[5b.3\]]sgyu ma mkhan gyis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhig sprul par gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 
[\[5b.4\]]gtogs pa'i sems can rnam par rgyal bar bgyi ba la gnas pa/_mtha' yas pa de dag thams cad lhags shing bcom ldan 'das de la lus tha dad par yang gda' la/_bcom ldan 'das de la sems can lus tha dad par yang mthong lags mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[5b.5\]]sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag gis ni dpung gi tshogs 'di'i bdag po bya zhing /_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/snyam du mi sems lags la/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po de yang 
[\[5b.6\]]'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di ni bdag cag gi gtso bo yin pas bdag cag ni 'di'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/snyam du mi sems lags mod kyi/_de dag de'i rjes su 'jug par bgyid par yang gda' lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos 
[\[5b.7\]]de dag gis chos nyid gang lags pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_nyan thos sam/_slob pa'am/_mi slob pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_so so'i skye bo ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]pa'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rten pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid dmigs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mngon pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[6a.2\]]nyid rten pa'am/_nyan thos kyi chos nyid dmigs pa'am/_nyan thos kyi chos nyid mngon pa'am/_nyan thos kyi chos nyid rten pa'am/_so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/_so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/_so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid rten pa'am/_gzugs 
[\[6a.3\]]kyi chos nyid dmigs pa'am/_gzugs kyi chos nyid mngon pa'am/_gzugs kyi chos nyid rten pa'am/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/_rnam par 
[\[6a.4\]]shes pa'i chos nyid rten par mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la gzugs stong pa dang /_'dis gzugs stong pa dang /_'di la gzugs stong pa dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa dang /_
[\[6a.5\]]'dis rnam par shes pa stong pa dang /_'di la rnam par shes pa stong pa dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang /_'dis de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang /_'di la de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin 
[\[6a.6\]]gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang /_'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang /_'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs par mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de la nyan thos ma mchis/_nyan thos kyi chos nyid ma mchis/_
[\[6a.7\]]so so'i skye bo ma mchis/_so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid kyi bar du ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/_sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'am/_dpung gi tshogs sprul pa de la 'khor los sgyur ba ma mchis/_dpung gi tshogs ma mchis lags 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]so/_/sgyu ma la ma mchis/_sgyu ma'i chos nyid la ma mchis/_sgyu ma mkhan rnams la ma mchis lags so/_/sa la ma mchis/_chu la ma mchis/_me la ma mchis/_rlung la ma mchis/_nam mkha' la ma mchis/_rnam par shes pa la ma mchis lags so/_/sa 
[\[6b.2\]]dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha'i khams rnams la ma mchis/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni de dang 'dra lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de dag la/_bdag ni rlom sems su mi bgyid/_
[\[6b.3\]]de dag la bdag ni byung bar ma gyur/_de dag bdag gis ni ma smras lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag ni yon tan gyi chos rnams nyid las dben pa lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams rjes su dran par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni 
[\[6b.4\]]lam lags/_de ni tshul lags te/_lam de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo lam de rjes su thob pa rnams ni 'di snyam du gzhan yang dag par blangs la 'jug par bya zhing /_ston pa yang gzhan btsal bar bya la/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze gzhan smra ba'i gdong 
[\[6b.5\]]du gyen du blta bar bya zhing /_tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni shes bzhin pas shes/_mthong bzhin pas mthong /_yang dag pa'i lta ba yang 'dogs bzhin pas 'dogs par byed do snyam du mi sems lags te/_de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas pa 'di la ni 
[\[6b.6\]]bdag som nyi ma mchis pa thob pas gnas lags so/_/chos kyi sgo de yang rjes su thob pas gnas lags so/_/chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_dben pa'i tshul dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dag gis tshul gcig pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[6b.7\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tshom zhu bar 'tshal ba lags la/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag la skabs phye ba lags te/_dbang po'i brag phug nas 'od ma'i tshal 'dir phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]bdag 'dir mchis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan gyi phyed gnang ste/_bdag la gnang ba dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu 'ur 'ur zhing rnam pa drug tu yang g.yos/_rab tu g.yos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[7a.2\]]ni 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag nyid chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang /_rgya chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang /_slob dpon ma mchis shing rang byung ba lags kyang thugs rje chen po'i tshul la bzhugs shing /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang /_nga rgyal 
[\[7a.3\]]ma mchis pa la bzhugs nas bdag la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ngo mtshar lags so snyam bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na mi dbul po 'tsho ba ngan pa tshegs kyis 'tsho ba zhig tshegs kyis khyim gyi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs nas/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo 
[\[7a.4\]]nas dbang bskur ba/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i gan du blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_dri bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchis par gyur la/_mchis pa de la des stan gyi phyed stsal na/_de nas de 'di snyam du sems lags te/_
[\[7a.5\]]rgyal po la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir bdag song du zin kyang bdag gis blta ba'am/_phyag bya ba yang dka' bar 'gyur na gsol ba lta ci smos/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bdag phyin ma thag pa la stan gyi phyed byin du zin kyang 'di ni ngo mtshar ro snyam 
[\[7a.6\]]bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rang byung ba slob dpon ma mchis pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba lags na/_
[\[7a.7\]]lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tshom zhu ba dang /_blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]slad du bdag ji lta ji ltar mchis pa na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/_bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba rnyed cing phyag bgyi ba rnyed la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_zhu ba dang /_yongs su zhu bar bgyi ba rnyed de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi da ltar 
[\[7b.2\]]bdag 'dir lta mchis pa la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi dbul po des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de la blta ba nyid dang /_phyag bgyi ba nyid yang ngo mtshar lags pa de bzhin du/_
[\[7b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni byams pa chen po dang ldan zhing /_thugs rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa lags kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gang dag lags pa de dag ston pa 
[\[7b.4\]]ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du bdag ni phul dang /_bdag ni mchog dang /_bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o snyam du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/_bdag ni 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[7b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags so/_/snyam bgyid lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung legs so legs so/_/'od 
[\[7b.6\]]srung khyod yang legs so/_/'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med cing /_dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan te/_de ni sbyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /_shes rab kyi bar gyi tshad de lta bu dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[7b.7\]]tshad de lta bu dang /_smon lam rnams kyi tshad de lta bu dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /_thabs kyi tshad de lta bu dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /_spyod pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /_spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]dang /_rnam par grol ba'i tshad de lta bu dang /_rnam par grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i tshad de lta bu dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bus dpag par mi nus so/_/
[\[8a.2\]]'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi mnyam pa'i ye shes rnams yin te/_de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang /_shes 
[\[8a.3\]]rab mnyam pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/_'od srung mnyam pa'i ye shes bzhi po de dag ni gang dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 
[\[8a.4\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten bsam yas na/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te/_/sems kyi las ni sbyangs pas na/_/de dag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs byed/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs byed pa ni/_/mu stegs gzhan rnams skrag par 
[\[8a.5\]]'gyur/_/chos kyi chos nyid thos nas su/_/g.yang sar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/_/bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas dang /_/sems can 'du shes gang gnas pa/_/'od srung de dag bstan 'di la/_/mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do/_/dngos po'i 'du shes gang gnas 
[\[8a.6\]]dang /_/nga yi nga zhes rten pa dang /_/'od srung de dag bstan 'di la/_/mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do/_/gang dag tshul khrims phung po dang /_/bsam gtan rnams dang thos mang gis/_/rlom sems rnam rmongs de dag ni/_/'od srung mu stegs can rnams so/_/
[\[8a.7\]]bdag ni chog shes 'dod chung dang /_/rab tu dben la gnas pa dang /_/chos gos ngan pa 'chang snyam pa/_/'od srung de ni mu stegs so/_/dper na nam mkha' 'di la ni/_/lag pa bskyod kyang thogs med cing /_/dper na mkha' la rdul gyis kyang /_/nam yang gos par 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin 'od srung ngas bstan pa'i/_/chos 'dir gang dag gnas de dag_/nyon mongs rnams kyis mi gos te/_/mkha' las rdul dang sprin bzhin no/_/ji ltar mkha' la mi yis me tog spos rnams dang /_/de bzhin phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis 
[\[8b.2\]]'dir mchod kyang /_/bdag mchod la la skye 'gyur 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes/_/de la blo gros kyang ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang /_/ji ltar nam mkha' de la gos par mi 'gyur dang /_/ji ltar de yi rang bzhin gos par mi 'gyur dang /_/ji ltar de yi rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyis 
[\[8b.3\]]gsob/_/de bzhin dge sbyong dag la stong pa'i chos rnams so/_/ji ltar gang gis nam mkha' bsdigs pa dang /_/ji ltar nam du yang ni gshe bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin dge sbyong dag la chos rnams gang dag yin/_/de dag nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med 
[\[8b.4\]]chos rnams/_/chos 'dir dge sbyong gang dag legs par bslabs rnams dang /_/gzhan dag slob pa rnams dang slob par 'gyur ba rnams/_/'di la nam du'ang gang dag 'chags par mi 'gyur ba/_/nga yis de dag dge sbyong legs bslabs rnams su bstan/_/
[\[8b.5\]]ji ltar mkha' la nam yang lag pa mi thogs dang /_/rdul dang du ba rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur dang /_/ji ltar lam ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ba/_/chos la de bzhin mos pa rnams ni dge sbyong yin/_/ji ltar sprin dang bral bar gyur pa'i nam mkha' la/_/
[\[8b.6\]]zla ba thogs pa med par mkha' la 'gro byed kyang /_/bdag gis bar snang la ni snang bar bya snyam du/_/de la rnam rtog de ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin/_/rgod med bdag nyid dge slong zla ba lta bu yis/_/sbyin pa'i bdag po'i khyim rnams su ni 'gro bar bya/_/rgod med nga rgyal 
[\[8b.7\]]rnam grol sems dang ldan pa dang /_/'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni ma gos sems ldan bya/_/khyim rnams la ni nga rgyal spangs nas bsten par bya/_/der phyin nas kyang chos nyid rab tu brjod par bya/_/bde dang rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dod pa'ang spangs nas su/_/'jig rten 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]rnam dag tshul khrims can du gnas par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung longs shig_/longs la rang gi stan la 'dug shig_/'od srung khyod la chos kyi the tshom ji snyed yod pa de dag de bzhin 
[\[9a.2\]]gshegs pa la dris shig dang /_'od srung ngas dris pa lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po sa'i steng de nas langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[9a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 
[\[9a.4\]]ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[9a.5\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par zhugs te/_de dag zhugs nas mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon 
[\[9a.6\]]par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_tshangs 
[\[9a.7\]]pa chen po dang /_'od gsal dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_'og min gyi lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul 
[\[9b.2\]]ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_ma dros pa dang /_snam bu'i dbang phyug dang /_gau ta ma dang /_dga' bo dang /_nye dga' dang /_gzi can dang /_'jog po dang /_rab mdzes dang /_e la'i 'dab dang /_de dag dang 
[\[9b.3\]]gzhan yang klu bye ba phrag stong sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing rgya chen po'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[9b.4\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par zhugs nas gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med pas 
[\[9b.5\]]'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod longs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig_/de bzhin 
[\[9b.6\]]gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim pa'i chos kyi 
[\[9b.7\]]rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad chos la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]kyi chos sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa'i bar du yang dag par 
[\[10a.2\]]ston par 'gyur/_chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyi gnas pa'i spyod pa sgrub pa yang dag par ston par yang 'gyur/_'khor bzhi yang dag 
[\[10a.3\]]par tshim par byed par 'gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor yang yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur/_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong 
[\[10a.4\]]ba dang /_de bzhin du da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_smon lam rnams dang /_ye shes kyi phyogs tsam zhig yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[10a.5\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan 'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten srid cig bshams so/_/steng gi bar snang la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa rin po che sna bdun las 
[\[10a.6\]]byas pa ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/_srid kyi tshad ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang ldan pa/_rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang ldan pa zhig byas so 'chag sa de la yang rtsig pa rim pa bdun dang /_rta babs rim pa bdun dang /_stegs bu rim pa bdun dang /_
[\[10a.7\]]dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba sprul to/_/'chag sa de'i g.yas g.yon du yang 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_bai dUr+ya rin po che sna bzhi'i shing ljon pa dag mngon par sprul to/_/gser las byas pa'i shing ljon pa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]rnams la dngul gyi lo ma dag dang /_shel gyi me tog dag dang /_bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang /_dngul las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang /_bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i me tog dag dang /_shel las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang /_bai dUr+ya 
[\[10b.2\]]las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang /_dngul gyi me tog dag dang /_shel gyi 'bras bu dag dang /_shel las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang /_dngul gyi me tog dag dang /_bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag mngon 
[\[10b.3\]]par sprul to/_/shing ljon pa thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ba'i rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/_them skas de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa/_gser gyi phye ma bdal 
[\[10b.4\]]ba/_ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos khebs pa/_steng gi bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to/_/'chag sa de yang dar gyi lda ldi mang pos spyangs pa/_bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa/_
[\[10b.5\]]mi bdun gyi srid tsam du me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal bkram pa zhig mngon par sprul to/_/ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po de dag la yang maud gal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mngon par sprul to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[10b.6\]]chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis byas pa'i gdan de lta bu de mngon par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gdan bshams lags na/_de'i dus la dbab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[10b.7\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis gdan bshams zin tam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshams lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa sgrub pa nges par ston pa la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri shoms shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par 
[\[11a.2\]]byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa sgrub pa nges par ston pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gdan bshams so/_/gdan 
[\[11a.3\]]de shom pa na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis seng ge'i gdan der rang rang gis bla gos dag bting ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag gis ni 'di lta ste/_the tshom dang som nyi bsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon 
[\[11a.4\]]par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad pa bsgrub pa dang /_'jug pa bsgrub pa dang /_smon lam bsgrub pa dang /_zhing bkod pa bsgrub pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bsgrub pa gang dag yin pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[11a.5\]]sems dpa' de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa 'byung ba dang /_nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang /_chos bstan pa phun 
[\[11a.6\]]sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang /_tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mdog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yang dag pa'i sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dam pa'i 
[\[11a.7\]]chos rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi chos gos dag las mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba des nges par mngon par 'du bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bzhin du gdan de la bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas kyang yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[11b.2\]]nas/_de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bting ngo /_/de dag gis rang rang gi chos gos de dag la bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa nas/_
[\[11b.3\]]rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du yang mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag par tshim zhing yi rangs te/_dga' ba dang dang ba la gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la sgra skad 'thun par tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/_cho ga spyod 
[\[11b.4\]]pa yon tan gnas gyur pa/_/chos rnams kun la dbang ldan bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/yon tan kun la gnas pas khyod mdzes te/_/rgyal ba dbang ldan ting 'dzin yang dag gnas/_/g.yo dang sgyu ni khyod la yongs mi mnga'/_/nga rgyal rgod dang tshul 'chos mi mnga' 
[\[11b.5\]]ste/_/rig dang rnam grol dag gi spyod pa mkhyen/_/ting 'dzin de la gnas pas khyod mdzes so/_/dbang ldan bsnyengs bral ting 'dzin gnas nas su/_/rdzu 'phrul mi mtshungs bla na med pa bstan/_/chags med ye shes bstan phyir dbang ldan pa/_/ma 'ongs 
[\[11b.6\]]dus ni khyod kyis deng bstan to/_/mi g.yo go 'phang zhi ba thob snyam bgyid/_/de ring byang chub la ni mchis snyam bgyid/_/bdud dpung bcas pa rab tu bcom snyam bgyid/_/de ring rig pa rjes su thob snyam bgyid/_/rgyal bas gang gis 'dus byas stong gzigs pa'i/_/
[\[11b.7\]]bla med mig ni thob par 'gyur snyam bgyid/_/chags med ye shes khyod kyi bka' drin la/_/mig kyang chags pa mchis pa yod ma lags/_/rnam par mthong yang ci yang ma mthong zhing /_/chos ni gang la'ang zhe 'gras ma mchis te/_/gang la yid ni zhe 'gras ma 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]mchis pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas spyan mchog de lags so/_/ji ltar rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyan mchog gis/_/khams gsum shes la ma chags 'jug pa bzhin/_/dngos dang dngos med mnyam mtshungs yid dang ldan/_/yang dag brtson zhing 
[\[12a.2\]]rang gi mig la gnas/_/gang tshe rgyal ba ting 'dzin der gnas te/_/de ring de dag kun gyis thob snyam bgyid/_/de dag gis ni gzungs sgo de dag dang /_/chos la rnam par grol ba'i sgo mchog thob/_/sgor 'jug yongs su sbyang byas rnam dag pa/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[12a.3\]]blo ni yong ye nyams mi 'gyur/_/sbyin pa chen po'i rnam smin de 'dra ste/_/khrims chen yon tan de dag de 'dra lags/_/shes rab chen po'i yon tan de 'dra ste/_/sngon chad chos de dag ni bsten pa mdzad/_/khyod ni gdan bzhugs bsam gtan mdzad pa na/_/
[\[12a.4\]]mi yi dbang po phyogs bcur lhang nger gyur/_/rgyal sras thugs kyi sras po 'dus de dag_/gang nas shi 'phos las ni ci mchis pa/_/lha dang klu dang mi min mi'am ci/_/kun la de ring shes pa de 'jug go/_/kun du snang bar gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la/_/gang gis 
[\[12a.5\]]bskal byer shes pa de bskyed pa/_/som nyi gcod cing the tshom sel ba yis/_/mi mchog seng ge bzhin du sgrogs par 'gyur/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan pa tshol ba na/_/'di ltar sngon chad sbyin pa stsal lags te/_/'di la sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson gang /_/
[\[12a.6\]]sems can kun la de 'drar bskal pa mnyam/_/sems can de dag thams cad ma btud par/_/'di ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson gang /_/sems can kun la kun tu mkhas pas na/_/'di la ting 'dzin 'jug dang shes rab mchog_/des na khyod kyis ting 'dzin rnam 
[\[12a.7\]]par sbyangs/_/dpa' bo de ring gdan la bzhugs pa la/_/thal mo sbyar nas khyod la zhu lags na/_/som nyi bcad cing the tshom bsal du gsol/_/deng 'dir chos la kun tu snang thob cing /_/the tshom bral te snang ba thob gyur pas/_/sems can gang dag 'byung dang bdag 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]cag la/_/chos kyi tshul ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur/_/gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o//_//yang de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du pad ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gzhon nur gyur pa zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas pad ma dpal gyi snying po 
[\[12b.2\]]gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dug go/_/de ltar 'dug pa de'i sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/_bdag 
[\[12b.3\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi sgo rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/_rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang /_rgyun mi gcod pa sgrub pa'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/_smra ba thams cad tshar gcad pa sgrub pa'i tshig rnams dang rim par phye ba'i tshig rnams dang /_chos thams cad bsdu ba'i tshig 
[\[12b.4\]]rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin na/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dag phyag rgya'i sgo gang dag la bslabs na/_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mig dang shes pa la mkhas pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag gis bsam pa'i tshogs gang dag dang 
[\[12b.5\]]'jug pa sgrub pa gang dag gis go cha bgos pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs skye ba la bsam pa sgrub pa'i tshogs la dgongs par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing smon lam dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[12b.6\]]tshogs bsgrub pa thugs su chud nas/_de'i tshe phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs so/_/phyogs bzhir gzigs pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer chen po bzhi byung ste/_de dag byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dong ngo /_/'od 
[\[12b.7\]]zer de dag kyang shing ljon pa'am/_rtsig pa'am/_ri'am/_sa'am/_bar snang gang du bab pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig tu gyur to/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du yang 'od zer de dag thogs pa med par rab tu dong ste/_de ltar 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od de dag gis reg pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang gi lus dag gser gyi lus lta bur shes so/_/gang dag 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang /_zhe 
[\[13a.2\]]sdang gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang /_gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa de dag thams cad kyis ni bdag nyid 'dod chags chung ba dang /_zhe sdang chung ba dang /_gti mug chung bar mngon par shes so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[13a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba ji snyed yod pa de dag tu sems can skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal tsha ba mi bzad pa 'chi ba'i mthar byed pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba de dag thams cad kyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi 
[\[13a.4\]]smon lam gyi mthus bde ba snyam du shes par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa'i sems can ji snyed 
[\[13a.5\]]yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba cher gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 
[\[13a.6\]]'od zer dag phyung ste/_'od zer de dag kyang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_steng dang /_'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de dag 
[\[13a.7\]]phyung nas gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad do/_/gsung bsal ba'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par go bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod 
[\[13b.2\]]pa gcig pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od 'di ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas de bcom 
[\[13b.3\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang /_'od kyi snang ba chen po gda' ba de su'i lags/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[13b.4\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi 
[\[13b.5\]]khams tshad med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[13b.6\]]dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[13b.7\]]shAkya thub pa de la 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyag rgya yi ge mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo zhu bar 'dod do/_/dra ba can gyi 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/_tha mi 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod do/_/dra ba can gyi 'od byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de dag dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang stongs so/_/dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs 
[\[14a.2\]]pa shAkya thub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag mthong ba dang thos pa yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gces spras byed par nga smra na/_dra ba can gyi 'od gang dag gis de dag mthong nas bkur sti byed dam/_bla mar byed dam/_ri mor byed dam/_mchod 
[\[14a.3\]]par byed dam/_'dri bar byed pa lta ci smos/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[14a.4\]]thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de yang blta bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[14a.5\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes 
[\[14a.6\]]bzhin du yang spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub 
[\[14a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la byin te/_dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la khyod kyis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'dis mchod cig_/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]bkod pa gcig pa de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo/_/zhes de skad ces gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba 
[\[14b.2\]]can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu 
[\[14b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der song ste/_sems kyi skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der 
[\[14b.4\]]song nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yang song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[14b.5\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[14b.6\]]dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dra ba can gyi 'od khyod yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig_/khyod bde ba dang nad med par gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[14b.7\]]phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin 
[\[15a.2\]]po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des bcom ldan 'das la lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di yang bskur lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od las lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la bzhes su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i ud 
[\[15a.3\]]pa la bzhes nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa lnga brgya la smras pa/_rgan rabs dag lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di ni de bzhin 
[\[15a.4\]]gshegs pas byin pa'o/_/de nas bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa lags na/_
[\[15a.5\]]ci bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can gang dag gis ming thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di ni byang chub 
[\[15a.6\]]sems dpa' ma pham pas bdag cag la stsal lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang /_spyod pa'i stobs dang /_bsam pa'i stobs dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i 
[\[15a.7\]]stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i slad du lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de gtor bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]pa dag dang /_gang dag ma byung ba dag dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ba dag dang /_'byung ba'am/_'jig pa der yang bcom ldan 'das gtor bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin 
[\[15b.2\]]du 'og gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed byung ba dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang gtor bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[15b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gang su dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ud pa la'i dri snom par gyur cig_/de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[15b.4\]]cad du yang mchi bar gyur cig_/de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de gtor nas de nas de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas reg ste/_lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de bcom ldan 'das kyis reg nas kyang de nas de ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la ud 
[\[15b.5\]]pa la de'i nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung zhing ud pa la re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed po de dag gis gang dag chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mi shes shing mos par mi byed 
[\[15b.6\]]la/_chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mi shes shing mos par mi byed/_khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag gi ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin zhing /_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag kyang ma yin no zhes de lta 
[\[15b.7\]]bu'i tshig de dag gsungs te/_gsungs nas kyang bzhud do/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to/_/sgyu ma 'dra chos gzung du med pa ste/_/gzung min thams cad chu zla 'dra ba yin/_/stong pas stong pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa/_/chos nyid 'di 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ni rgyal bas de 'drar gsungs/_/mtshan nyid med chos rnam dag mtshan nyid yin/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ste/_/brtags pas stong zhing bdag med chos rnams la/_/'dzin pa med cing rtsod pa med par 'gyur/_/gang dag de ltar chos 
[\[16a.2\]]nyid de 'dod pa/_/de dag ston pa rgyal ba mthu bo che/_/phyogs bcur 'jig rten spyod pa thams cad la/_/de 'dra 'di ni de yis byin rlabs so/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas phyogs 
[\[16a.3\]]bcur bzhud do//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji tsam du smon lam dag shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang 
[\[16a.4\]]sems can gang dag gis de dag gi smon lam de dag thos pa dang /_ming yang bsgrags pa de dag sdug bsngal mang pos reg pa'i sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar 
[\[16a.5\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das dang rigs kyi bu de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'byung ba'i cha ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che 
[\[16a.6\]]dri ma thams cad dang bral ba/_phan pa dang bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan bsgrags pa thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems shing /_nor bu rin po che de'i mtshan ma dag kyang legs par 'dzin par bgyid la/_chab khungs 'am 
[\[16a.7\]]de las gzhan mi gtsang ba dang 'dres pa'i phyogs dag na nor bu rin po che shin tu yongs su byang ba de 'dam bu bsal ba mthong zhing /_lhag par yang nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/_gdol pa'i rigs sam/_g.yung po'i rigs sam/_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]de dag las gzhan yang tshegs kyis 'tsho ba dma' ba'i rigs dag mchis par gyur na/_de dag ni nor bu rin po che de'i ming yang ma 'tshal na yon tan 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/de nas mi des mi gtsang 
[\[16b.2\]]ba bsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas nor bu rin po che de'i snod ni mdzes pa ma yin no zhes de skad ces smra bar bgyid la/_de nas dma' ba'i mi de dag 'di skad ces smra bar bgyid de/_khyod kyis gang gis bsngags pa smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de gang yin 
[\[16b.3\]]zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /_mi des nor bu rin po che de bstan la/_de ston pa na mi byis pa'i rang bzhin can de dag ma 'tshal bzhin du/_kye mi khyod kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan ci'i phyir smras/_khyod kyis gang smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan 
[\[16b.4\]]de dag ni yod pa ma yin no/_/khyod ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba/_gzhan du smra ba ste/_khyod kyi tshig de dag yid mi ches so zhes smras la/_de'i tshe mi des nor bu rin po che de mi gtsang ba'i gnas de nas mngon par bteg cing blangs nas mchis te/_de nas nor bu rin po che 
[\[16b.5\]]de phyung nas mi de mchis ma thag tu mi dbul po'i rang bzhin can de dag gcig la gcig shin tu rab tu rnam par 'khrug par gyur nas/_de'i rjes la gnod pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan 
[\[16b.6\]]pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dbul pos bltam par mchis lags te/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]snod du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi des ngo 'tshal ba de lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 
[\[16b.7\]]gyi khams mi mjed na bdag cag blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de legs par sbyangs shing rnam par dag pa de lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na dma' bas 'tsho ba dbul bos dma' ba'i mi de dag gnas pa de lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 
[\[17a.2\]]gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes pa'am/_bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas/_nor bu rin po che de yongs su btsal bar sems shing /_mi gtsang ba'i snod 
[\[17a.3\]]na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas kyang /_nor bu rin po che de'i snod de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lags pa de dag 
[\[17a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper 
[\[17a.5\]]bgyi na skyes pa'am/_bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems shing /_mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa de yang mthong nas/_snod de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes tshig smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[17a.6\]]cag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas blta ba'i slad du bdag cag 'dir mchis 
[\[17a.7\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis nas bdag cag gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod pa brgya phrag du mas bltam zhing sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa dag gis bltam par mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]na 'dam du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de'i 'od de mi 'dor ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi 'od de mi 'dor lags te/_
[\[17b.2\]]'dir ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa chung ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlab par mdzad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na mi de nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag sgrogs pa na mi dbul ba'i rang 
[\[17b.3\]]bzhin can de dag mngon par yid mi ches pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od shin tu rgyas pa'am/_smon lam chen po'am/_rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'am/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dag la'ang yid ches 
[\[17b.4\]]par mi bgyid na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na mi des mi gtsang ba'i snod de nas nor bu rin po che de blangs nas mchis la/_de mchis ma thag tu yang sems can de dag gnod 
[\[17b.5\]]pa rnam pa du mas shas cher yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis nas/_'di lta bu'i 
[\[17b.6\]]mdo sde 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba rnams gcig la gcig rab tu rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur zhing /_chos kyi sgra yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_chos ma lags pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ba kho nar bas so zhes de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[17b.7\]]lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar sems can de dag ni chos ma lags pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing chos ma lags pas 'tsho ba nyid yang dag par blangs nas gnas par 'gyur la/_gcig la gcig 'thab mo dang /_sun 'byin pa dang /_mtshang 'dru 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ba dang smod pa la 'jug par bgyid par 'gyur te/_de dag gcig la gcig dge ba'i chos las nyams nas sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing /_de dag chos [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa dang /_dge ba [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lhur len par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[18a.2\]]'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo don 'tshal ba/_don yongs su tshol bar 'tshal ba/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par sgrub par 'tshal ba dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar mi bgyi na/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[18a.3\]]theg pa pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dang /_yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_de dag las gzhan pa sems can dmyal ba chen po 
[\[18a.4\]]dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag la skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang bde ba mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa na byang chub 
[\[18a.5\]]sems dpa' gang dag mchis pa de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sems can mnar med par skyes pa rnams dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dir skyes pa de dag la yang bde ba ci yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/_/
[\[18a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba gcig pu mchog tu gyur pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag ni rang bzhin gyis bde ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can 'dir skyes pa rnams kyis de mngon par yid ches par dka' bar 'gyur bar 
[\[18a.7\]]smra lags te bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang chos kyi the tshom gcad pa dang /_chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mnyan pa'i slad du gang gi don du bdag 'dir mchis pa de bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag thos par 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bde ba 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dang sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mi rtag pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las gang la bde ba ma mchis pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang /_rtag pa ma mchis 
[\[18b.2\]]pa dang /_mi rtag pa ma mchis pa dang /_rtog pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang /_'dus byas ma mchis pa dang /_'dus ma byas ma mchis pa dang /_gdags pa ma 
[\[18b.3\]]mchis pa dang /_gdags pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jig rten pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa ma mchis pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa ma mchis pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang /_bden pa ma mchis pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa 
[\[18b.4\]]ma mchis pa dang /_byang chub ma mchis pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis pa dang /_stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang /_snang ba ma mchis pa dang /_mun pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par rig pa ma lags 
[\[18b.5\]]pa ma mchis pa dang /_'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /_'bras bu ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang /_lam ma mchis pa dang /_lam ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jug pa ma mchis pa dang /_mthar thug pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jig rten ma mchis pa 
[\[18b.6\]]dang /_'jig rten nas nges par 'byung ba ma mchis pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos thos par 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs las yang dag par byung ba/_kun tu rtog pa las byung ba'i bde ba de dag dang gzhan thams 
[\[18b.7\]]cad 'jig rten la bstan par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bstan du mi rung lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de la stobs rnams ma mchis/_mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis/_rdzu 'phrul ma mchis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]cho 'phrul ma mchis/_kun brjod pa ma mchis/_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis/_rjes su bstan pa ma mchis/_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis lags so/_/mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis shing stobs rnams ma mchis la/_bde 
[\[19a.2\]]ba ma mchis shing sdug bsngal ma mchis lags te/_de dag thams cad ni rlom sems lags shing /_de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid rjes su thob pa dang /_rjes su ma thob pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[19a.3\]]pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi ba ma lags te/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems dang /_g.yos pa dang /_spros pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas ni bden pa'am/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'am/_'dus 
[\[19a.4\]]byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/_zag pa ma mchis pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_tshul khrims sam/_'chal pa'i 
[\[19a.5\]]tshul khrims sam/_stobs rnams sam/_stobs ma mchis pa'am/_mi 'jigs pa'am/_mi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'am/_sbyin gnas sam/_sbyin gnas ma lags pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_sangs rgyas sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[19a.6\]]'am/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_smon lam rnams sam/_byin gyi rlabs rnams kyi rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom zhing lam yongs su mkhyen te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar seng ge lta bu dang /_glang 
[\[19a.7\]]po che lta bu'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na mi 'thun pa rnams la mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad/_'thun pa rnams la 'thun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du de gnyi gas kyang btang snyoms par gnas par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa dag dang /_rang byung gi gnas pa dag dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[19b.2\]]rgyas rnams dang /_yang thun mong ma lags pa'i gnas pa dag lags na/_de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad rnams dang thun mong ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thun mong ma lags she na/_de las gzhan 
[\[19b.3\]]pa'i sems can tha chad kyis de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang /_de snyed kyi gnas pa de dag dang /_yun ji srid nas gnas pa de dag dang /_sbyor ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang /_bde ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog cing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[19b.4\]]gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnas de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can gzhan dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de lta bu de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[19b.5\]]thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das spyod yul ma lags zhes bgyi ba ni spyod pa ma mchis shing /_rnam par spyod pa ma mchis pa ste/_des na spyod yul ma lags zhes bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos 
[\[19b.6\]]dag gam/_rang sangs rgyas dag gi spyod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de mtha' yas pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnas pa mtha' yas pa lags she na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[19b.7\]]gshegs pa dag gi mos pa ni mtha' yas te/_gang gis kyang 'tshal bar rngo mi thog lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/_yi ge ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags la/_yi ge 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]ni brjod pa kho na lags pas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de ni rang byung gi gnas pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag gnas pa de la rnam par lta bar mi 'gyur zhing rab tu 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan 
[\[20a.2\]]nas shi 'phos pa lags so/_/gang dag gnas pa de glo bar chud par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de ni bcom ldan 'das don gyi sgo dang /_chos kyi sgo de lags te/_
[\[20a.3\]]'khor sgo drug khri brgyad stong dang ldan pa lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa'i byang chub ni nam mkha' lta bur tshad ma mchis shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sgo gcig pa'i tshad las rjes su thob pa lags so/_/
[\[20a.4\]]sgo'i tshig 'di bstan cing bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun khri bdun stong gis ni sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo rjes su thob ste/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de nyid do/_/de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag gis deng byang chub 
[\[20a.5\]]thob po/_/bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob po zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang smras so/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na 
[\[20a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig sa ya phrag brgyad ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/dge slong sum stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/
[\[20a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang /_de nas de ma thag tu de'i tshe 'jig rten du 'od chen po byung bar gyur cing /_sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chos 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /_'jig 
[\[20b.2\]]rten du snang ba chen po byung ba dang /_'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis chos kyi sgo de bstan cing bshad pa na/_byang 
[\[20b.3\]]chub sems dpa' bdun khri bdun stong gis sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo thob par gyur cing /_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis chos kyi sgo'i tshig bstan pa de ni nam mkhas yongs su zin pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du sangs rgyas brgyad 
[\[20b.4\]]stong las blangs te/_blangs nas kyang de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgos nges par byung ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas par gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/yang de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[20b.5\]]grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa gcig pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor 'bum 
[\[20b.6\]]phrag du ma la chos kyang ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i rgyal tshab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba de 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug nas/_des gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[20b.7\]]par shAkya thub pa'i 'od de yang mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang 'od gda' ba de su'i lags/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon de la bka' stsal pa/_don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa 
[\[21a.2\]]bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/_'di lta ste/_sems pa dpe med pa'i byang chub 
[\[21a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/_sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[21a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[21a.5\]]shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_sems pa dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[21a.6\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la da bab par shes na rigs kyi bu 
[\[21a.7\]]khyod song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du gnas par yang byos shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa de dag bsnyen par 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la lag pa lta bu'i pad ma 'di yang phul cig_/de nas 
[\[21b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bskor ba yang byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten 
[\[21b.3\]]gyi khams mi mjed du 'ongs te/_de 'ongs nas de ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na me tog gi shing ngam/_'bras bu'i shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag dang /_dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bu dag gtor to/_/
[\[21b.4\]]me tog gi char pa yang bab po/_/spos kyi char pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang bab po/_/rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang grag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal 
[\[21b.5\]]bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lag pa gnyi gas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bzung ngo /_/gdong gis kyang yongs su gtugs te/_tshig de skad ces kyang gsol to/_/
[\[21b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam 
[\[21b.7\]]par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bkur sti byas pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_ri mo byas par gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon sa las langs 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]te spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam 
[\[22a.2\]]nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes bsnyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i pad ma bskur ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar 
[\[22a.3\]]bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las lag pa lta bu'i pad ma de bzhes te/_bzhes nas kyang byang chub 
[\[22a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la bka' stsal pa/_don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ci bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_'gyur ba 
[\[22a.5\]]mi mnga' 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de gnod pa chung zhing stobs dang ldan la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bde bar reg pa la gnas lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[22a.6\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la lag pa lta bu'i pad ma de byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i pad ma de blangs nas tshig gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rigs kyi 
[\[22a.7\]]bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyur cig_/sems can yongs su smin par gyur cig_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]yongs su ma smin pa rnams la chos bstan pa dang /_sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams dang /_dman pa la mos pa rnams la chos bstan pa dka' ba'i slad du ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das lag pa 
[\[22b.2\]]lta bu'i pad ma 'di las 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed mthong bar 'tshal ba de snyed kyang mthong ba dang /_lag pa lta bu'i pad ma 'di nyid las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phung po zhes bgyi ba gang 
[\[22b.3\]]lags pa de yang mthong ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang mthong ba dang /_de na gang nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa phal cher rig pa gsum dang ldan pa dang /_rig pa drug dang ldan 
[\[22b.4\]]pa de dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der pad ma de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa chen pos mngon par grub pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni byang chub 
[\[22b.5\]]sems dpa' dag chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang byang 
[\[22b.6\]]chub tu sems bskyed pa'i slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_'khrug pa ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[22b.7\]]rgyas par de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong khyod kyis byams pas gang smras pa shes sam/_de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]rgyas pa'i chos de dag gang yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /_mi 'khrugs pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de dag gang yang ma 
[\[23a.2\]]mchis lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos de dag dmigs pa ma lags shing /_de dag ni chos kyang ma lags chos ma mchis pa yang ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos shig dmigs par gyur na ni de 
[\[23a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'du shes dmigs pa kho nar 'gyur ba zhig na 'du shes ni mi dmigs lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'du shes thams cad ma mchis lags te re zhig de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nyid kyang ma dmigs lags na 'du shes rnams yang 
[\[23a.4\]]dag par dmigs par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_chos rnams la chos kyi 'du shes yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das chos de dag kyang 'du shes ji lta ba bzhin lags te/_de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang yang gzung bar ma gsungs/_
