[\[44b.1\]]ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa dag yod pa dang sems can gyi khams su gdags pas gdags pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur cing /_sems can de dag la bde bar bya ba'i phyir gang sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can de dag la 
[\[44b.2\]]gzugs rnams sam/_sgra rnams sam/_dri rnams sam/_ro rnams sam/_reg bya rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i mi la la zhig byung bar gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang phrag pa'am/_mgo bos blangs nas bskal pa'am/_bskal 
[\[44b.3\]]pa las lhag par 'dzin par byed la/_sems can de dag spyod lam ji lta bus de la 'dug par 'dod pa de lta bus kyang 'dug par gyur cing /_sems can de dag gi bshang gci yang lag pa ya gcig gis blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'dor na brtan pa'i 
[\[44b.4\]]blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/_'o na mi des sems can de dag la bde ba'i yo byad mang pos so sor rim gro byas par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi des bde ba'i yo byad mang pos rim gro bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[44b.5\]]stsal pa/_brtan pa'i blo gros khyod mos par bya/_khong du chud par bya ste/_mi des bde ba'i yo byad de lta bus rim gro byas la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[44b.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_'di lta ste/_gang las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mnyan par bya ba'i phyir tha na byang 
[\[44b.7\]]chub sems dpa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i phyir ram/_de la brtson par bya ba'i phyir gom pa 'dor ba gcig gis 'gro bar yang byed na/_brtan pa'i blo gros dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni bla na med pa 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bar ma dor zad pa'am/_yongs su gtugs par nga mi smra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtan pa'i blo gros bde ba'i yo byad 'di la bde ba'i yo byad snga ma des brgya'i char yang 
[\[45a.2\]]nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtan pa'i blo gros bde ba'i yo byad snga ma de thams cad ni 
[\[45a.3\]]rdzas las byung ba dang bcas pa yin te/_shin tu mthar thug par mi 'gyur zhing /_shin tu yongs su byang bar mi 'gyur la/_brtan pa'i blo gros chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas ni tshul khrims rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin rnam par 
[\[45a.4\]]'phel bar 'gyur/_shes rab rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur/_thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su smin par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de'i phyir de 
[\[45a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mang du thos pa la rag las par bstan pa yin no/_/brtan pa'i blo gros gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di lta ste/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'bras kyi zhing ngam/_til 
[\[45a.6\]]gyi zhing ngam/_'od ma'i tshal bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas 
[\[45a.7\]]mchod pa byas shing /_na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_bsnyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur byas la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_so so so sor khor yug 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]tu dpag tshad dang ldan pa'i mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa gdugs bsgreng ba dang /_stegs bus brgyan pa/_bskal par gnas pa'i snang ba kun du 'bar rab tu 'bar ba'i mar me dang /_mchod yon dag gis brgyan pa dag byas par gyur na/_brtan 
[\[45b.2\]]pa'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/_'o na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des bsod nams kyi phung po grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa 
[\[45b.3\]]skyed lags so/_/brtan pa'i blo gros khyod mos par bya/_khong du chud par bya ste/_gang mi des ji skad bshad pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu sogs par byed la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 
[\[45b.4\]]'di lta ste/_gang las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mdo sde de lta bu dag mnyan pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba'i phyir yongs su btsal ba la brtson par 
[\[45b.5\]]byed na/_brtan pa'i blo gros bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod 
[\[45b.6\]]do/_/brtan pa'i blo gros de lta bas na khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la mdo sde de lta bu de dag mnyan pa dang /_bzung ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba'i phyir go cha gyon par sems na brtan pa'i blo gros bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tshad nga mi smra'o/_/yongs su gtugs 
[\[45b.7\]]par yang nga mi smra/_yongs su zad par yang nga mi smra'o/_/brtan pa'i blo gros khyod sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i dpe tsam thos pa'am/_phyogs tsam khong du chud par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang thos pa'am/_yid ches par nus sam/_gsol 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rngo thogs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_brtan pa'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de che ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[46a.2\]]lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brtan pa'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yungs 'brus yongs su gang bar gyur cing /_yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kho na'i stong gsum gyi 
[\[46a.3\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad kyi bre bo dag yod par gyur la/_de dag kyang bye ma dag gis so sor gang bar gyur na/_brtan pa'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/_bye ma'i phung po de mang ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bcom 
[\[46a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/brtan pa'i blo gros gal te bye ma'i phung po de lag pas blangs nas phyogs bzhir 'dor bar byed pa'i mi la la zhig byung bar gyur la/_de 'phangs nas de ma thag tu gang dag bye ma'i phung po de las bye ma'i 'bru re re 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'phen 
[\[46a.5\]]par byed pa'i rlung dag mngon par byung bar gyur na/_brtan pa'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji snyed yod par 'gyur/_phyogs thams cad du yang de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis lags so/_/
[\[46a.6\]]bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_brtan pa'i blo gros khyod mos par bya/_brtan pa'i blo gros khyod khong du chud par bya ste/_brtan pa'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni spyod lam gyi dpag 
[\[46a.7\]]tu med pa/_lam gyis dpag tu med pa/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dpag tu med pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas dpag tu med pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dpag tu med pa ste/_brtan pa'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]khams de dag tu gom pa gcig gis gshegs par mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam rnam par 'khrug par yang mi 'gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pas da dung rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa thams cad kun tu bstan pa yang ma yin no/_/se gol gtogs 
[\[46b.2\]]pa tsam gcig gis kyang bye ma'i phung po de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kho na'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu gom pas gshegs pa gcig gis gshegs par mdzad do/_/se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi tshul des kyang shar phyogs su gshegs pa nas/_phyogs bcur 
[\[46b.3\]]gshegs pa'i bar gyis zhag gcig gam/_zla ba phyed dam/_zla ba gcig nas lo gcig gi bar du'am/_lo brgya nas lo stong ngam/_lo 'bum gyi bar du gshegs par mdzad cing /_phyogs re rer yang lo bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du gshegs par mdzad do/_/brtan 
[\[46b.4\]]pa'i blo gros 'o na de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji snyed yod par de bzhin gshegs pas byon pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mang ba yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brtan pa'i blo gros gal te 
[\[46b.5\]]bsod nams kyi phung po de gzugs can zhig tu gyur na ni re zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du yang mi shong ste phal cher lhag par 'gyur ro/_/brtan pa'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams kyi phung po 
[\[46b.6\]]grangs med pa de rab tu mkhyen te/_dpag tu med pa/_bgrang du med pa/_tshad med pa/_brjod du med pa/_bgrang ba las 'das pa rab tu mkhyen to/_/brtan pa'i blo gros gang gis bsod nams kyi phung po de shes par nus pa'i yi ge'i grangs sam/_yig 'bru'i grangs 
[\[46b.7\]]sam/_bgrang ba'i grangs de ngas rab tu mi shes te/_gzhan du na grangs med pa'i grangs kho na dang /_dpag tu med pa'i grangs kho nar 'gyur bar zad do/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i bsod nams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o//_//de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa'i sgra zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[47a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po des kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid 
[\[47a.3\]]phung po zhes bya ba nga'i 'og tu 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung 
[\[47a.4\]]pos snang ba chen po de mthong ste gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos shing sa g.yos pa chen po de yang kun du shes nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phung po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /_gsung 
[\[47a.5\]]bsal ba'i sgra de dang /_dog sa g.yos pa de su'i lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phung pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[47a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[47a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpe med pa sems pa zhes bya ba dag yod de 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'khod do/_/
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]rigs kyi bu phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed go cha gang dag gis skyes bu dam pa de dag go cha bgos pa'i go cha de lta bu dag gis stong ste/_rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag thos pa yang mchog tu rnyed par dka' na blta ba'am/_bsnyen bkur 
[\[47b.2\]]bya ba lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 
[\[47b.3\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song 
[\[47b.4\]]la/_bcom ldan 'das de la pad ma bdun po 'di dag kyang phul te phul nas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phung po gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_
[\[47b.5\]]zhes snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phung po de la rnam par bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[47b.6\]]'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das de'i thad nas song ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung po de 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig des 'jig rten 
[\[47b.7\]]gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa'i sgra nas mi snang bar gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/_/de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phung po gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar 
[\[48a.2\]]reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des pad ma 'di dag kyang bskur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma de dag bzhes te bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung 
[\[48a.3\]]po ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga'a'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga'a'am/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na snyun mi mnga' zhing stobs dang ldan te 'gyur ba mi mnga' la 
[\[48a.4\]]bde bar reg pa la gnas lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la ma pham pa khyod kyis byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir pad ma 'di dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed cig ces pad ma de dag byin no/_/de nas 
[\[48a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas pad ma chen po bdun po de dag blangs nas bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dpe med pa sems pa dag la byin te/_'di lta ste/_dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_ded dpon bzang po dang /_yon tan sbas dang /_'dam 
[\[48a.6\]]bus byin dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_chu lha dang /_stobs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_bla ma'i blo gros dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_'phel ba'i blo gros dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_legs par yang dag zhugs dang /_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang /_rtag tu brtson 
[\[48a.7\]]dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_'gro ba 'dzin dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_legs par gnas pa'i blo gros dang /_mtha' yas blo gros dang /_'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang /_mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang /_dpag med rnam par gnon 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]dang /_dmigs pa thams cad ston pa'i khyu mchog dang /_brtan pa'i blo gros dang /_mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang /_dpag yas rnam par gnon dang /_don yod brtson 'grus dang /_seng ge'i brtson 'grus rtsal gyis 'gro dang /_don yod gom pa'i rtsal gyis 'gro dang 
[\[48b.2\]]dga' ba'i spobs pa dang /_spobs pa rnon po dang /_spobs pa zab pa dang /_spobs pa mtha' yas dang /_spobs pa dpag med dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_pad ma'i snying po dang /_mtha' yas glang po che dang /_spar 'chums ma yin dang /_chos 
[\[48b.3\]]'phags dang /_lag na rin chen dang /_rin chen lag pa dang /_don yod dpal dang /_mi g.yos rnam par gnon dang /_mya ngan med pa dang /_mya ngan bral dang /_tha mi dad par spyod par yang dag zhugs dang /_brtson 'grus skyo med dang /_mngal 'gyur dang /_bud med 'gyur dang /_
[\[48b.4\]]skyes pa 'gyur dang /_sems can 'gyur dang /_dra ba can gyi 'od dang /_mtha' yas snying po dang /_sangs rgyas phyag na pad ma skyes dang /_lag na pad ma dang /_spos kyi glang po che dang /_don grub dang /_seng ge'i legs par brtags pa'i go cha dang /_don yod go cha dang /_
[\[48b.5\]]ma smad pa'i go cha dang /_kun 'gyur ba'i go cha dang /_spyod pa zab pa'i go cha dang /_'gyur ba skyo ba med pa'i go cha dang /_me tog rab gtor dang /_me tog rin chen dang /_don yod ming sgrol dang /_don yod ming sgrogs dang /_dmigs pa kun gyi go cha bgos dang /_'gro ba 
[\[48b.6\]]kun 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos dang /_spyod pa zab pa'i go cha bgos dang /_'gyur ba skyo ba med pa'i go cha bgos dang /_rtag tu rab tu dga' ba'i go cha bgos dang /_rtag tu gdung ba'i go cha bgos dang /_mi lta ba'i go cha bgos dang /_dpal ma nyams pa'i go cha bgos dang /_
[\[48b.7\]]drag shul 'chang dang /_dga' ba'i sde dang /_bzang po'i sde dang /_dga' ba'i lha dang /_dga' byed dang /_byang chub yan lag rtogs dang /_sangs rgyas dang ma bral ba'i go cha bgos dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i go cha bgos dang /_'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i go 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]cha bgos dang /_thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i go cha bgos dang /_ma blangs pa'i go cha bgos dang /_rnam par ma 'khrugs pa'i go cha bgos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i go cha bgos dang /_zla ba snang dang /_yon tan dpal snang dang /_
[\[49a.2\]]ded dpon dang /_ded dpon chen po dang /_mchog gi tshogs can dang /_mchog gi bkod pa dang /_rin po che'i bkod pa dang /_don kun 'grub dang /_don dpal dang /_'dren pa'i dpal dang /_'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_nges par 'dren dang /_zhi ba dang /_rab tu 
[\[49a.3\]]byed dang /_sangs rgyas bzang po dang /_shin tu dga' ba dang /_rgyal dga' dang /_dbang po thul dang /_rgyal ba'i sde dang /_gzhom thul dang /_bdud 'joms dang /_dgra 'joms dang /_dgra la zhe 'gras med dang /_phyogs su rnam par bsgrags dang /_rnam par 
[\[49a.4\]]bsgrags pa'i rgyal po dang /_nor 'phel dang /_bshes gnyen dang /_bshes gnyen lha dang /_bshes gnyen 'phel dang /_gdugs gcig pa dang /_rin chen gdugs dang /_rgyu skar bzang po dang /_chos dang /_chos lha dang /_dri med dang /_dpa' bo dri med dang 
[\[49a.5\]]dpa' ba'i rtsal gyis 'gro dang /_mtha' yas rtsal gyis 'gro dang /_don yod rtsal gyis 'gro dang /_gom pa med kyis rnam par gnon dang /_shin tu rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang /_tha mi dad par spyod pa dang /_de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang 
[\[49a.6\]]bdun khri bdun stong la rgan rabs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir pad ma bdun po 'di dag byin pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag gis pad ma chen po 'di dag longs shig dang /_thams cad gyur nas bcom ldan 
[\[49a.7\]]'das la dbul bar bya/_thams cad gyur nas rang rang gi thabs la mkhas pa gsal bar bya'o/_/zhes pad ma bdun po de dag byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri bdun stong po de dag gis pad ma de dag blangs nas rang rang gi thabs la mkhas pa gsal 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir pad ma chen po bdun po de dag bzhes te/_bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 
[\[49b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar khyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir rtul bar mdzad/_mchog tu rtul bar mdzad do/_/ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni shin tu rnyed par dka' zhing mchog 
[\[49b.3\]]tu rnyed par dka'o/_/ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang shin tu mchog tu rnyed par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma pham pa sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/_/ma pham pa gal te sngon ngas byang chub tu 
[\[49b.4\]]sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_ma pham pa 'o na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu skye bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa 
[\[49b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi skye bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa 
[\[49b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du 
[\[49b.7\]]sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du snying rje chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_de bzhin du 'jig rten du dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o 
[\[50a.2\]]na da ltar 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas bla na med 
[\[50a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa'i don yod rnam par gnon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du 
[\[50a.4\]]sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' 
[\[50a.5\]]stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa'i glang po che'i lta stangs kyis lta ba nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[50a.6\]]ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge ltar bsgyings pa nyid 
[\[50a.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du de bzhin 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_
[\[50b.2\]]'o na da ltar 'jig rten du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[50b.3\]]bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[50b.4\]]chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du chos kyi mur 'gram 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te sngon ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[50b.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na/_'o na da ltar 'jig rten du nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa de lta bas na gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyed yod 
[\[50b.6\]]pa de dag thams cad ni sems dang po bskyed pa la rag las pa yin no/_/ma pham pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed par dka' ba yin no/_/ma pham pa 'di lta ste/_dper na mar med pas mar gyi snying gu'i rgyun 'chad 
[\[50b.7\]]par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_ma pham pa byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa 'di lta ste/_dper na mar yod pas mar gyi snying gu'i rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_ma pham pa 'jig rten 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]na byang chub sems dpa' yod pas 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa 'di lta ste/_dper na sa bon yod pas myu gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa' yod pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[51a.2\]]pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed par dka' ba nyid do/_/ma pham pa 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po na gang dag rin thang med par gyur pa'i nor bu rin po che de dag ni nyung gi gang 
[\[51a.3\]]dag rin thang yod par gyur pa de dag ni ches mang ba de bzhin du/_ma pham pa sems can gyi ris na gang dag byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung ngu 'byung gi_/gang dag de las gzhan pa'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems 
[\[51a.4\]]dang lhan cig gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni ches mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa de lta bas na sems bskyed pa de dag ni rnyed par dka' zhing mchog tu rnyed par dka'o/_/sems bskyed pa de dag ni rnyed par dka' zhing mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir u dum 
[\[51a.5\]]bA ri'i me tog dang mtshungs so/_/sems bskyed pa de dag ni rin thang med pa'i phyir rin po che dang mtshungs so/_/sems bskyed pa de dag ni shin tu 'phags pa'i phyir ri rab dang mtshungs so/_/sems bskyed pa de dag ni rab tu g.yo ba med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 
[\[51a.6\]]mtshungs so/_/sems bskyed pa de dag ni gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir rgya mtsho lta bu'o/_/ma pham pa sems bskyed pa des ni rin po ches bkang ba'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bzod do/_/ma pham pa gal te sems bskyed pa de dag ni gzugs can 
[\[51a.7\]]du gyur na ni de dag phyag bya ba'i 'os yin te/_ma pham pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'bum phrag du mas bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa de lta bas na byang chub kyi sems de bskyed pa'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya/_spro bar bya/_mthu yod par bya/_gsal bar bya/_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]spobs par bya/_'thun par bya/_'dun par bya'o/_/ma pham pa sems bskyed pa de yang gang zhe na/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/_de ni bgrang ba'am/_gzhal bar mi nus so/_/ma pham pa 'on kyang sems bskyed pa de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'jal 
[\[51b.2\]]ba tsam dang /_dpe tsam zhig brjod par bya'o/_/ma pham pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa/_rgya chen po byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa 
[\[51b.3\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/ma pham pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe'i tshad ni 
[\[51b.4\]]lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur to/_/ma pham pa bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gcig ni dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug byung bar gyur/_'dus pa gnyis pa ni bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug byung bar gyur/_'dus pa gsum pa ni bye ba phrag brgyar tshang ba 
[\[51b.5\]]byung bar gyur te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_mnyam pa nyid kyi shes pas rnam par grol ba sha stag go/_/ma pham pa 
[\[51b.6\]]de'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang shin tu mthong zhes bya bar rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba seng ge'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal po seng ge'i dpal de'i btsun mo dam pa mchog las bu gnyis mtshe mar byung bar gyur te/_gcig ni mya ngan med ces bya/_
[\[51b.7\]]cig shos ni mya ngan bral zhes bya'o/_/ma pham pa de'i dus na khye'u de gnyis skyes nas lo bdun lon pa 'dra zhing gnyi ga khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na 'dug par gyur te/_de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po nyan thos kyi tshogs dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i pho brang shin tu mthong 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]bar gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas khye'u mya ngan med kyis phu bo mya ngan bral la smras pa/_mya ngan bral de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i rgyal po thag ring po kho na nas tshur gshegs pa gzigs sam/_smras pa/_
[\[52a.2\]]nu bo mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_mya ngan bral bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i rgyal po de ci 'dra ba de lta bu kho nar 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/de nas khye'u mya ngan med kyis phu bo mya ngan bral de la tshigs su bcad 
[\[52a.3\]]pa dag gis smras pa/_mgon po chen po mi yi mchog_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun bdar ba/_/bde ba'i rgyal po tshur gshegs la/_/mya ngan bral ba khyod gzigs shig_/mi yi khyu mchog de 'dra bar/_/bdag ni 'gyur ba kho nar bgyi/_/bdag la byang chub sems 
[\[52a.4\]]skyes te/_/'jigs las 'gro ba thar bar bgyi/_/'gro 'di chags rgyags zhe sdang dang /_/chags pas sdug bsngal las bgyid de/_/bgyis nas dmyal ba'i g.yang sar ltung /_/ngan 'gro dag las de thar bgyi/_/'jig rten 'dren pa 'jig rten na/_/u dum bA ra'i me tog 
[\[52a.5\]]bzhin/_/rnyed dka' mchog tu rnyed dka' yis/_/khyod kyis 'dun pa bskyed par mdzod/_/de nas khye'u mya ngan bral gyis nu bo la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/_mang po tshig tu smra byed kyang /_/tshig gis grub pa yod ma yin/_/bdag ni sgrub la gnas pas na/_/
[\[52a.6\]]ci yang rab tu smra mi bya/_/mang po rab tu smra byed kyang /_/lus kyis byed pa yod ma yin/_/de yi 'bras bu mi snang bas/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig tu smra ba nyid/_/gal te tshig gis thob 'gyur na/_/bdag 'od rir chen dkris par 'gyur/_/yon tan nyams pa de kun kyang /_/tshig 
[\[52a.7\]]gis rgyal ba rnams su 'gyur/_/de nas khye'u mya ngan med kyis khye'u mya ngan bral la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/_bdag nyid yin gyi gzhan min par/_/gang phyir de 'dra smra byed cing /_/de phyir ci yang mi smra ba/_/sems de ser sna can gyi lags/_/bdag gis 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]sems can 'gron du gnyer/_/bdag ni kun tu bged par bgyid/_/bdag la ser sna gzhar ma mchis/_/srog chags 'dren pa rnams su shog_/mkhas pa byung bar gyur pa rnams/_/de dag tshig tu smra mi byed/_/tshig mang rab tu smras nas su/_/ji ltar don bzhin byed 
[\[52b.2\]]ma yin/_/de dag sngon chad nyid nas kyang /_/ser sna'i sems dang ldan par gyur/_/des na 'byung bar 'gyur zhig gam/_/'on te mi 'byung tshig tu smra/_/de nas khye'u mya ngan bral gyis nu bo mya ngan med la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/_gcig tu gyur nas song byas te/_/
[\[52b.3\]]nu bo khyod dang kho bo yi/_/sems bskyed pa ni gang che zhes/_/mgon po de la zhu bar bya/_/de nas khye'u mya ngan bral khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng de nas babs te/_nor bu las byas pa'i mchil lham thogs shing gos bye ba ri ba yang thogs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po 
[\[52b.4\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/khye'u mya ngan med kyis ni khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}(]gyi [,]kyi [)]steng de nyid nas bdag nyid bor ro/_/de nas khye'u mya ngan med bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal 
[\[52b.5\]]po de ga la ba der song ngo /_/khye'u des kyang gos rin po che dang /_gtsug gi nor bu yang thogs par gyur te/_khye'u des gos de dang gtsug gi nor bu de bcom ldan 'das de la phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das des khye'u mya ngan med kyi lag pa nas bzhes so/_/khye'u mya ngan bral ni 
[\[52b.6\]]phyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der son gyi khye'u mya ngan med ni ches sngar son to/_/des khye'u mya ngan med de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po'i spyan snga na 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_mya ngan med khyod lam gang nas ches sngar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[52b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i rgyal po'i thad du song /_/des smras pa/_phu bo khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de nyid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bdag nyid bor te/_bdag ni lus ma snad ma smas pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis so/_/de nas khye'u mya ngan bral 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]gyis khye'u mya ngan med las lan thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la mchil lham de gnyis dang /_gos rin po che de phul nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_lam ngan nas ni 'gro ma 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'dren pa mthong gyur cig_/sangs 
[\[53a.2\]]rgyas kyis ni gang bstan pa'i/_/lam la rtag tu bsten par shog_/de nas khye'u mya ngan med kyis kyang phu bo la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis smras pa/_/gang dag lus dang de bzhin du/_/srog gi dbang po srung byed pa/_/de dag rtag tu lam tshol 'gyur/_/phu bo de ni khyod bzhin 
[\[53a.3\]]no/_/gang dag rtag tu bde ba don gnyer ba/_/de dag gzhan gyi bde ba tshol mi byed/_/lus srog dbang po bor nas gzhan du ni/_/sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams kyi ni rgya chen don kyang bya/_/sdug bsngal dra ba las ni yongs sgrol bya/_/
[\[53a.4\]]lam 'di nyid de sangs rgyas mthong ba 'di/_/sangs rgyas mthong nas phyi nas lam ma tshol/_/bdag cag lam nas bde bar 'gro bya zhes/_/ma rtogs mi mkhas gzhan dag rlom sems 'gyur/_/de nas lam ngan lam der 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de dag gis ni yang dag 
[\[53a.5\]]lam mi shes/_/lam ngan 'gro ba don dam blo can rnams/_/lam la de ni lam ngan zhes 'jug pa/_/de ni rtag tu bdud kyi 'ching bas zin/_/de 'dra de ni lam mchog 'di las ring /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas dag dang phrad gyur cig_/_rtag par rgyun tu ngur smrig gyon par shog_/
[\[53a.6\]]rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa thob gyur cig_/skyes nas shin tu sems can don byed shog_/dam chos spyod la rtag tu gnas gyur cig_/rtag tu chos kyang kun tu 'dzin par shog_/rtag tu rgyal ba rnams kyi chos bzung nas/_/rtag tu srog chags rnams la phan byed shog_/
[\[53a.7\]]rtag tu brtson 'grus brtan por rtsom gyur cig_/thos pa'i chos rnams chud za ma gyur cig_/dus rnams kun tu mnyam par 'jog gyur cig_/yon tan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan par shog_/ma pham pa de nas khye'u mya ngan med dang /_khye'u mya ngan bral gyis tshigs su bcad 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]pa de dag smras nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po'i thad du khyim nas khyim med par 'thun par rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar de dag rab tu byung ma thag tu gcig la gcig smras pa/_bdag ches thog mar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de nas dge slong 
[\[53b.2\]]mya ngan med kyis dge slong mya ngan bral la smras pa/_mya ngan bral khyod kyis bdag ches thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes de skad ces smras na/_khyod kyis sems ji lta bu zhig bskyed/_des smras pa/_mya 
[\[53b.3\]]ngan med 'dir bdag gis ni gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du sems can re re'i don gyi phyir sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal pa 'bum du smin par gyur na'ang de'i tshe yang byang chub kyi sems dor bar mi bya'o 
[\[53b.4\]]snyam ste/_mya ngan med bdag gis sems de lta bu bskyed do/_/mya ngan med 'on kyang bdag gis gal te bdag gi mgo bor shar phyogs dang /_de bzhin du phyogs thams cad nas la la zhig 'ongs te/_bshang ba'i chang bu'am/_me'i ril lu'am/_rdul gyi ril lu'am/_bshang 
[\[53b.5\]]ba'i bum pa'am/_me'i bum pa'am/_rdul gyi bum pa zhig bzhag kyang gzhi de las bdag gis gnod sems su mi bya/_zhe sdang bskyed par mi bya/_sems khros pas mi de la rnam par blta bar mi bya/_sems khros pa dang ldan pas de la ngas gnod pa ci byas zhes de skad ces kyang smra bar 
[\[53b.6\]]mi bya ste/_phyir rgol ba su gang gis las de brtsams pa'i sems can de nyid kyi don gyi phyir bdag gis pha rol du phyin pa dag la spyad par bya ste/_des gang byas pa'i las de ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtsom pa yin/_las de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rtsom pa yin te/_gal te bdag gis 
[\[53b.7\]]rkyen dag byung ba na sems mnyam par ma bzhag na/_bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur/_bdag la gnod sems kyi rkyen dag ma byung bar ni ya mtshan cir 'gyur te/_de lta bas na sems can de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i don gyi phyir go cha bgo bar bya'o snyam nas bzod pa'i go cha de lta bu bgos so/_/gal te gnod sems su byed pa'i sems can de dag la yang gnod sems su byas na bdag la khyad par du 'phags pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[54a.2\]]te/_mya ngan med bdag gis de lta bu de lta bu'i go cha bgos so/_/de nas dge slong mya ngan med kyis dge slong mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smras so/_/phu bo khyod kyis gang gis go cha bgos pa'i sems de khyod kyis gzigs sam/_smras pa/_gal te sems med par gyur na 
[\[54a.3\]]ni go cha bgos pa de lta bu med par 'gyur la/_go cha de yang med na ni rab tu bstan pa yang med par 'gyur te/_mya ngan med gang gi phyir sems de yod pa de'i phyir go cha de rab tu bstan pa yang yod do/_/de nas dge slong mya ngan med kyis dge slong mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[54a.4\]]ji ltar sems de yod pa de bzhin du go cha yang yod do zhes de skad ces khyod ma gsung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mya ngan bral sems ni skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can bas sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir te/_skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can gyi sems sgyu ma lta bu la yod pa'am/_med pa 
[\[54a.5\]]yang med do/_/mya ngan bral gang yod pa'am/_med pa de ni lta ba de yin te/_gang de lta bu'i lta ba de ni log par lta ba'o/_/gang log par lta ba de ni lam gol ba yin zhing lam ma yin la/_de byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas de'i byang chub de thag ring ba yin zhing byang chub de thag nye ba 
[\[54a.6\]]ma yin la/_de'i byang chub bgrod par dka' ba yin te/_mya ngan bral de lta bas na de dag thams cad ni spros pa yin no/_/gang dag chos spros pa dang ldan pa dang /_chos rlom sems dang ldan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par bya ba ma yin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[54a.7\]]dpas bsten par bya ba'i chos kyang gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas chos gang yang bsten par bya ba ma yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams bsten par gyur na ni chos ma yin pa rnams bsten par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]la mngon par zhen par mi bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni gzhi med pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpas de ltar rlom sems su byed na/_de yang chos ma yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni rlom sems med pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te byang chub sems 
[\[54b.2\]]dpa' de ltar gnas par byed na/_de yang chos ma yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni gnas med pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' de ltar mos par byed na/_de yang chos ma yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni mos pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gal 
[\[54b.3\]]te byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rab tu shes par byed na/_de yang chos ma yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' de ltar khong du chud par byed na/_de yang chos ma yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang 
[\[54b.4\]]chub ni 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpas de ltar mngon du bya'o snyam nas de ltar sgom par byed na/_de yang chos ma yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni med pa'i phyir dang /_byang chub de ni yi ge med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas dge slong mya ngan bral gyis 
[\[54b.5\]]dge slong mya ngan med la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mya ngan med byang chub de med dam ci na/_de'i phyir de skad ston/_ji ste mya ngan bral yod cing bdag yod na ni byang chub kyang yod do/_/dge slong mya ngan med kyis smras pa/_phu bo khyod spros pa med pa'i byang chub la byang chub yod ce'am/_med 
[\[54b.6\]]ces rnam par ma rtog shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji tsam du spros pa de ni byang chub ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni spros pa med pa'i phyir te/_'di ni tshul yin no/_/yang na ji tsam du spros pa de tsam du byang chub bo/_/mya ngan bral gyis smras pa/_nu bo ji tsam 
[\[54b.7\]]du spros pa de byang chub bo/_zhes smras pa de'i don bdag gis mi shes so/_/de nas dge slong mya ngan med kyis phu bo la smras pa/_phu bo de'i phyir gnyi ga 'grogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/de nas de gnyis 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po de ga la ba der dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de gnyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de la gtam kun tu 
[\[55a.2\]]brjod pa de ji snyed byung ba de thams cad gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des dge slong mya ngan med la mya ngan med legs so legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_de la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas kyang /_dge slong mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mya ngan bral 
[\[55a.3\]]de de bzhin te/_ji tsam du spros pa de ni byang chub ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_spros pa thams cad ni dben pa yin pa'i phyir te/_byang chub de yang dben pa yin no/_/dben pa nyid kyang gang zhe na/_spros pa gang yin pa'o/_/spros pa gang zhe na/_rtog pa ste/_gzugs spros 
[\[55a.4\]]pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa spros pa dang /_tshul khrims spros pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin spros pa dang /_'dod pa chung ba nyid spros pa dang /_chog shes pa nyid spros pa dang /_dgang sla ba nyid spros pa dang /_ma 'dres pa nyid spros 
[\[55a.5\]]pa'o/_/spros pa de yang gang las byung zhe na/_kun tu rtog pa las byung ste/_gzugs kyi kun tu rtog pa nas ting nge 'dzin gyi kun tu rtog pa'i bar du kun du rtog pa ji snyed yod pa spros pa yang de snyed do/_/de la kun tu rtog pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phyir kun tu rtog pa ni 
[\[55a.6\]]gzugs can ma yin pa'o/_/kun tu rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa med pa'o/_/kun tu rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims ma yin pa nas chog shes pa nyid kyi bar du'ang ma yin no/_/byang chub ni gzugs stong pa nyid do/_/byang chub ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa stong pa 
[\[55a.7\]]nyid do/_/de bzhin du byang chub de ni tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_'dod pa chung ba nyid dang /_chog shes pa nyid dang /_dgang sla ba nyid dang /_gso sla ba nyid stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid ni gcig pa'ang ma yin tha dad pa'ang ma yin te/_byang chub de ni de yin no/_/
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]de nas dge slong mya ngan bral gyis chos kyi rnam grangs de thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/sems gang gis byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod pa'i byang chub kyi sems de yang rab tu shes so/_/de ltar dge slong mya ngan med dang /_dge slong mya ngan bral de ltar chos 
[\[55b.2\]]rnams la lhag mthong dang /_de ltar chos rnams rab tu shes pa dang /_de ltar chos rnams la mos pas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du nam yang rmugs pa dang /_gnyid kyis ma non cing nam yang brtson 'grus ma btang ste/_gzhan du na rtag tu 'chag pa la mngon par brtson pa 
[\[55b.3\]]'ba' zhig tu gyur pa ni ma gtogs so/_/nam yang 'dod chags kyi sems ma bskyed/_zhe sdang gi sems ma bskyed/_gti mug gi sems ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis de nas shi 'phos nas 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dpung mgo zlum pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[55b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rjes su 'thun pa zhes bya bar skyes te/_der yang brtson 'grus brtsom pa yang dag par blangs nas gnas par gyur to/_/ma pham pa rnam grangs des byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad mnyes par 
[\[55b.5\]]byas so/_/skye ba thams cad du yang rab tu byung ste/_thams cad du yang brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag gis gnas so/_/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_
[\[55b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshogs mchog bkod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan bral bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin 
[\[55b.7\]]gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te/_ma pham pa de dag gi gsung rab de yang rgya chen por gyur to/_/ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni tshe yang dpag tu med par gyur to/_/ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa'i sems gang yin pa de ni gang du 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]yang bskur ba ma yin/_gang nas kyang blangs pa ma yin/_bskyed pa ma yin/_bkag pa ma yin/_gnas pa ma yin/_rgyun chad pa ma yin/_song ba ma yin/_'ongs pa ma yin no/_/ma pham pa sems de gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de gnyi 
[\[56a.2\]]ga yang mchog tu rnyed par dka'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang /_/'jig rten snang byed rnams ni dkon/_/u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/_/'jig rten du ni res 'ga' 'byung /_/
[\[56a.3\]]gang dag byang chub phyir zhugs pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems de'ang dkon/_/dpa' bo yi ni sems de yang /_/'jig rten du ni res 'ga' 'byung /_/de lta bas na de 'dra ba'i/_/dag pa'i sems de bskyed nas su/_/sangs rgyas dag gi stobs rnams dang /_/
[\[56a.4\]]de bzhin mi 'jigs rnams kyang snang /_/de las seng ge'i sgra sgrogs dang /_/drang srong smra bar nga yis su/_/yang dag 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'ang de bzhin no/_/nga yi ma 'dres bco brgyad chos/_/ma tshang med pa gang yin dang /_/sangs 
[\[56a.5\]]rgyas rnams kyi mtshan gang yin/_/de dag kyang ni 'dir ltos shig_/rmongs pa med pas gshegs pa dang /_/glang po che yi gzigs stangs dang /_/spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba yang /_/sems de las ni rab tu ltos/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa dang /_/ting 'dzin 
[\[56a.6\]]pha rol phyin pa dang /_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang /_/byang chub sems de'ang 'di las ltos/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rab bstan pa'i/_/chos gzhan gang dag yin pa yang /_/de dag thams cad sems de dang /_/dang po'i sems la gnas pa yin/_/nyan 
[\[56a.7\]]thos tshul khrims gang yin dang /_/nyan thos ting 'dzin gang yin dang /_/shes rab phung po rdzu 'phrul gang /_/de dag thams cad 'dir ltos shig_/sngon chad sems ni bskyed pa de/_/gal te 'jug pa ma yin na/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyang /_/'jug par 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]'gyur ba ga la yin/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams mthong min na/_/thos par yang ni ga la 'gyur/_/'jig rten du ni nyan thos rnams/_/'byung bar srid pa ma yin no/_/rdzogs pa'i rang sangs rgyas gang dag_/gnas nas mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/dge ba'i go cha 
[\[56b.2\]]de yang ni/_/sems de nyid las blta bar byos/_/sems can bde ba gang ci yang rung /_/'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten 'das/_/thams cad kyang ni sems de dang /_/dang po'i sems la gnas pa yin/_/sems de'i rnam par smin pa ni/_/rgya chen yin te 
[\[56b.3\]]de mthong na/_/bskal pa bye phrag stong du yang /_/de ni zad par mi 'dod do/_/skye ba dang ni 'jig ldan la/_/rkyen rnams kyis ni bskyed gyur pa/_/sems kyis dngos po stong pa yi/_/rnam par smin pa ci 'dra ltos/_/rkyen rnams kyis ni sems bskyed la/_/sems 
[\[56b.4\]]de'ang dngos po med pa ste/_/dngos po med dang ldan sems kyis/_/rnam par smin pa ci 'dra ltos/_/dmigs par bya ba de dag gis/_/sems ni nam yang mi skye ste/_/gang gi bsngags pa mi nyams pa'i/_/de yi rnam smin nyid la ltos/_/brtan pa'i blo can mi zhig 
[\[56b.5\]]gis/_/de 'dra'i sems ni rab shes nas/_/rtag tu theg pa dam pa la/_/gnas pa su zhig chud zar 'gyur/_/gang dag mig dang gzugs gnas shing /_/tshor ba dang ni 'du shes gnas/_/'du byed la yang gnas nas su/_/bdag nyid rnam shes ma byas pa/_/blo 
[\[56b.6\]]gros ngan pas nam mkha' la/_/kun du brtags pas 'dag snyam pa/_/yun ring dag par ma gyur pas/_/srid par mi mkhas rnams su 'gyur/_/de phyir sems ni gsob dang gsog_/yod pa min par rab shes nas/_/de la snying por mi bzung ste/_/de dag ngo 
[\[56b.7\]]bo nyid kyis stong /_/brten nas sems ni bskyed gyur pa/_/nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur zhing /_/gang dag de yi rkyen yin pa/_/de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos/_/de dag la ni sgrub pa med/_/chos rnams thams cad brtags 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]pa ste/_/rang bzhin de ltar rab tu bstan/_/gang dag de ltar rab shes pa/_/de de byang chub lung bstan gyi/_/de dag gzugs kyis lung ma bstan/_/tshor bas kyang ni lung ma bstan/_/'du shes 'du byed rnams kyis min/_/rnam shes kyis 
[\[57a.2\]]kyang lung ma bstan/_/'di la chos rnams mi dmigs kyang /_/de dag lung ma bstan pa'ang min/_/gang dag 'di la chos thams cad/_/mtshan med de 'dra'i shes ldan zhing /_/shes pas rlom sems mi byed pa/_/de dag byang chub lung bstan to/_/bzod pa 
[\[57a.3\]]'di 'dra de skyes pa/_/blo gros bstan pas bzod du zad/_/bong ba'i chad pas mtshon chad la/_/de dag mi mjed can du 'gyur/_/gang dag bzod pa de 'dra ba/_/legs par skyes par gyur pa dag_/de dag rnyed dang bkur sti bzod/_/de ni rnyed pas rlom sems 
[\[57a.4\]]med/_/de 'dra ba yi bzod pa de/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis gnod pa yin/_/mtha' gnyis zil gyis mnan nas su/_/mkhas rnams dbu mas spyod par byed/_/de phyir bzod pa bsten par bya/_/ngo bo nyid kyis chos stong pa/_/de ni byang chub lam yin te/_/
[\[57a.5\]]ngas kyang de ni bsten pa yin/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bsngags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[57a.6\]]blo gros rab gnas zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[57a.7\]]rgyas nam mkha'i rigs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla bas snang ba de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla bas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rigs la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de dang /_'od gda' ba de su'i lags/_de skad 
[\[57b.2\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad 
[\[57b.3\]]'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[57b.4\]]kyi chos kyang ston to/_/gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de dang /_'od snang ba de ni bcom ldan 'das de'i yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'jig rten gyi 
[\[57b.5\]]khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des skabs phye nas byang chub sems dpa' zla bas bcom ldan 'das de la rnam par bltas te/_bcom 
[\[57b.6\]]ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'gro bar chas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs des byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lag par lag pa lta bu'i me tog ku mu da byin te/_'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[57b.7\]]kyis lag pa lta bu'i me tog ku mu da 'di bcom ldan 'das de la phul la/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla bas bcom ldan 'das de'i ltar mnyan te/_legs so zhes gsol nas song ste/_de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[58a.2\]]'das ga la ba der 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig des song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla bas phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[58a.3\]]'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_
[\[58a.4\]]stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des lag pa lta bu'i ku mu da 'di yang bskur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lag pa nas lag pa lta bu'i ku mu da de bzhes te/_bzhes 
[\[58a.5\]]nas kyang bka' stsal pa/_zla ba ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 
[\[58a.6\]]bzhi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[58a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes rnam par bsgrags pas snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]de yang thos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[58b.2\]]ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' de la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 
[\[58b.3\]]bzhi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad 
[\[58b.4\]]kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi 
[\[58b.5\]]ba dang /_dpe med pa sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[58b.6\]]'das des skabs phye nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pas bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der chas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po des tsan dan dmar po'i thum po 
[\[58b.7\]]byin nas/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul te/_phul nas kyang nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes snyun gsol cig_/de nas byang chub 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pas mnyan nas legs so zhes gsol te/_'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_
[\[59a.2\]]yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs [(]ste [,]te [)]/_de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[59a.3\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[59a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das des tsan dan dmar po'i thum po 'di yang bskur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/_bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/_ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_
[\[59a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri dgu stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[59a.6\]]sangs rgyas 'od zer rab tu btang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi 
[\[59a.7\]]dkyil 'khor can gyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /_gsung bsal 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]sgra grag pa de su'i lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor can nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri dgu stong 
[\[59b.2\]]'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[59b.3\]]grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 
[\[59b.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 
[\[59b.5\]]zer rab tu btang bas byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can la pad ma chen po gcig byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la pad ma chen po 'di phul la/_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das 'od zer rab tu btang ba gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga 
[\[59b.6\]]ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas/_'di lta ste dper 
[\[59b.7\]]na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis zhes bya ba nas rgyas par skad cig des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab tu btang ba gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes snyun 
[\[60a.2\]]gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des pad ma chen po 'di yang bskur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/_bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can la bka' stsal pa/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor can ci bcom ldan 
[\[60a.3\]]'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri brgyad stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[60a.4\]]khams 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nges par 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des kyang byang chub sems 
[\[60a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas kyis snang ba chen po de dang /_sa g.yo ba chen po de yang mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang 
[\[60a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi snang ba de dang dog sa g.yo ba de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/_
[\[60a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri brgyad stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/_'od kyi snang ba de dang /_gsung 
[\[60b.2\]]bsal ba'i sgra de ni de'i yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[60b.3\]]sems dpa' de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[60b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nges par 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas kyi lag par ka shi ka'i gos gcig byin te/_khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la ka shi ka'i gos 'di phul la/_nga'i tshig gis gnod 
[\[60b.5\]]pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[60b.6\]]te song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan nas mi snang bar gyur te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dug go/_/de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga 
[\[60b.7\]]la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom 
[\[61a.2\]]ldan 'das des ka shi ka'i gos 'di yang bskur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ka shi ka'i gos de bzhes te/_bzhes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rin po che'i go cha mtha' yas 
[\[61a.3\]]ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga'a'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga'a'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bdun stong 'das pa na 'jig rten 
[\[61a.4\]]gyi khams me tog pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sna tshogs me tog tshogs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang byang chub 
[\[61a.5\]]sems dpa' brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas kyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/de nas 
[\[61a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sna tshogs me tog tshogs kyi dpal la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mthu de su'i lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[61a.7\]]des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bdun stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/_mthu de ni de'i yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[61b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i thad du 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs me tog tshogs kyi dpal 
[\[61b.3\]]gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas kyi lag par pad ma chen po zhig byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la pad ma chen po 'di phul la/_nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar 
[\[61b.4\]]reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sna tshogs me tog tshogs kyi dpal gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas 
[\[61b.5\]]nas/_'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang thang cig dang /_yud tsam des song ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dug 
[\[61b.6\]]go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig 
[\[61b.7\]]tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs me tog tshogs kyi dpal gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des pad ma chen po 'di yang bskur ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma 'di bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma de bzhes te/_bzhes nas 
[\[62a.2\]]kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/brtson 'grus mtha' yas ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga'a'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga'a'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten 
[\[62a.3\]]gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri drug stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs pa'i spu zing zhes byed pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[62a.4\]]chos kyang ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs pa'i spu zing zhes byed pa dang bral ba des byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[62a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[62a.6\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri drug stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[62a.7\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/_mthu de ni de'i yin no/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta 
[\[62b.2\]]ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab 
[\[62b.3\]]par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la me tog kha dog lnga pas khal bcu tshad bkang nas byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul la/_nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung 
[\[62b.4\]]ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_snyun mi mnga'a'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de skad ces snyun yang gsol cig/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[62b.5\]]'tshal nas 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis zhes bya ba nas rgyas par skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug ste/_de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom 
[\[62b.6\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[62b.7\]]ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i spu zing zhes byed pa dang bral ba gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]me tog kha dog lnga pas bltam pa'i khal bcu tshad 'di yang bskur ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs 
[\[63a.2\]]dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga'a'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri lnga stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin 
[\[63a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[63a.4\]]lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi stobs kyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/_de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la 
[\[63a.5\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de su'i lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs 
[\[63a.6\]]med pa sum khri lnga stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i 
[\[63a.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/_mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yin no/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]dpa' chen po de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[63b.2\]]chen po ye shes kyi stobs la lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul la/_phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_
[\[63b.3\]]bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi stobs bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[63b.4\]]na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_lag pa brkyang bskum par byed pa'i skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam des song ste 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/_de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[63b.5\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom 
[\[63b.6\]]ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di yang bskur 
[\[63b.7\]]ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de bzhes te bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_bde bar gnas sam/_/stobs dang ldan nam/_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]'gyur ba mi mnga'a'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bzhi stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos brtsegs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[64a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/
[\[64a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang 
[\[64a.4\]]ba de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bzhi stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[64a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/
[\[64a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyi 
[\[64a.7\]]lag par tsan dan gyi thum po byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la tsan dan gyi thum po 'di phul la/_nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi bsung gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes snyun gsol lo zhes kyang gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang 
[\[64b.2\]]ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/_/de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[64b.3\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi bsung gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_
[\[64b.4\]]bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des tsan dan gyi thum po 'di yang bskur ba lags na tsan dan gyi thum po 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[64b.5\]]bzhes te bzhes nas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[64b.6\]]ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' zhing stobs dang ldan la/_'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/_bde bar gnas lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri sum stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dri 'das zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[64b.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mig btud ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po phan 'dod kyis snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan 'dod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud de ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das de la 
[\[65a.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum 
[\[65a.3\]]khri sum stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad 
[\[65a.4\]]kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[65a.5\]]mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud kyis byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod kyi lag par pad ma chen po'i rgyal po 
[\[65a.6\]]mngon par 'phags pa gcig byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la pad ma'i rgyal po 'di phul la nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang
