[\[65a.7\]]bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/_/de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[65b.2\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das 
[\[65b.3\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des pad ma chen po'i rgyal po 'di yang bskur ba lags so bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[65b.4\]]bzhes te/_bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod la bka' stsal pa/_phan 'dod ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs 
[\[65b.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen mtha' yas brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[65b.6\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla mas snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de yang thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de su'i 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[66a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[66a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 
[\[66a.4\]]dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[66a.5\]]des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma'i lag par me tog kha dog lnga pa snyim pa gang byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la me tog kha dog lnga pa snyim pa gang 'di phul la/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung 
[\[66a.6\]]gnas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[66a.7\]]'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang /_thang cig dang yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go/_/de bcom 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[66b.2\]]pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des me tog kha dog lnga pa snyim pa gang 'di bskur ba lags na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[66b.3\]]kyis bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/_bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/_ye shes bla ma ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags 
[\[66b.4\]]so/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[66b.5\]]zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen glang po che zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen glang po ches snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung 
[\[66b.6\]]bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/de nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/_mthu de su'i lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das des de la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nub kyi phyogs kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig 
[\[66b.7\]]rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la/_'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 
[\[67a.2\]]sum khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems 
[\[67a.3\]]dpa' ye shes tshogs can zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum 
[\[67a.4\]]khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[67a.5\]]sems dpa' nges 'dren zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri nyis 
[\[67a.6\]]stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[67a.7\]]rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes 
[\[67b.2\]]khyu mchog ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das 
[\[67b.3\]]pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhur len pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[67b.4\]]byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 
[\[67b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpung mgo zlum pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung 
[\[67b.6\]]bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[67b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[68a.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ud pa la dmar po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' pad ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[68a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu zhi ba 
[\[68a.4\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rin po che'i 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi bkod pa 
[\[68a.5\]]zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na 'jig 
[\[68a.6\]]rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'od 
[\[68a.7\]]zer zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na 'jig 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]rten gyi khams bzod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[68b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs 
[\[68b.3\]]med pa sum khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[68b.4\]]sems dpa' phung po shin tu bshig pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 
[\[68b.5\]]nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad las rgal ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 
[\[68b.6\]]'das des byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten 
[\[68b.7\]]gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams chos zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes 'byung gnas 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri dgu 
[\[69a.2\]]stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bcu las 'phros pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' bcu las 'phros pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba 
[\[69a.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri brgyad stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[69a.4\]]kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu bla ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes 
[\[69a.5\]]bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri brgyad stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kun du spos zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye 
[\[69a.6\]]shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so 
[\[69a.7\]]zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri bdun stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar 
[\[69b.2\]]phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri bdun stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams lam snang dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[69b.3\]]sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 
[\[69b.4\]]nyi khri drug stong 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams bzang po mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' tshangs 
[\[69b.5\]]pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri lnga stong 'das pa na 
[\[69b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[69b.7\]]byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri bzhi stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi gsung zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs 
[\[70a.2\]]te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro//_//bam po drug pa/_de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri sum stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[70a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes 
[\[70a.4\]]bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa la zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[70a.5\]]zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar 
[\[70a.6\]]phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri chig stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub kyi yan lag rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[70a.7\]]sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri 'das pa na 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams pad ma rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rab gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen rab rdzogs zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[70b.2\]]pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri dgu stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[70b.3\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen thub pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags 
[\[70b.4\]]so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri brgyad stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 
[\[70b.5\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i 
[\[70b.6\]]bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri bdun stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston 
[\[70b.7\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sA la'i rin po che zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri drug stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la rin po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sbas zhes bya ba bla na med pa 
[\[71a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri lnga stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod 
[\[71a.3\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' shing rta bzang po can zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes 
[\[71a.4\]]bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri bzhi stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rta zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[71a.5\]]chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi rta zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig 
[\[71a.6\]]rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri sum stong 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa brjod pa don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[71a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' don yod ming rgal ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa khri nyis 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' dpal mtha' yas gzi brjid ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[71b.2\]]pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri chig stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdom pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[71b.3\]]gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' dpas byin zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de 
[\[71b.4\]]lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba don yod ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[71b.5\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' don yod pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar 
[\[71b.6\]]phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dgu stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_/bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snang zhes bya ba 
[\[71b.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]kyi nga ro zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' tha mi dad pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[72a.2\]]chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer ces bya ba yod de 
[\[72a.3\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes 
[\[72a.4\]]bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 
[\[72a.5\]]kyi rtse mo mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye [(]zhes [,]shes [)]kyi stobs zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba 
[\[72a.6\]]dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che mngon par 'phags pa'i 
[\[72a.7\]]dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams chos zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[72b.2\]]des byang chub sems dpa' ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs 
[\[72b.3\]]med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' grags sbyin 
[\[72b.4\]]zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[72b.5\]]sa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[72b.6\]]de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam par bsgrags pa'i 
[\[72b.7\]]go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdun stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams shes 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbas pa'i bdag po sprin gyi dbang phyug mar me zhes 
[\[73a.2\]]bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma 
[\[73a.3\]]bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa drug stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu shin tu smras zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[73a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' snang ba chen po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa lnga 
[\[73a.5\]]stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ye shes mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po snang zhes 
[\[73a.6\]]bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /_de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de dang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma byed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam 
[\[73a.7\]]pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de sgron ma byed ces 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]bya bar bstan ce na/_'jig rten gyi khams de na ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa'i rdzing rgya che zhing yangs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/_pad ma de dag kyang 'dab ma stong chu ba mngon par brtol nas gyen du dpag tshad brgyad cur 'phags 
[\[73b.2\]]pa ste/_pad ma re re las kyang 'od zer 'bum 'byung bar byed cing /_gyen du dang thur du yang 'od zer stong byung bar byed la/_de bzhin du phyogs thams cad du yang 'od zer stong stong 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de yang mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa/_rin po che'i phreng bas 
[\[73b.3\]]brgyan pa/_rin po che'i skud pas brgyan pa/_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris thams cad du yang rin po che las byas pa'i shing ljon pa dag skyes par gyur pa/_gyen du dpag tshad bdun khri bdun stong mngon par 'phags pa/_thad kar ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du yal ga dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo 
[\[73b.4\]]ma rab tu song ba'o/_/rin po che'i shing re re las kyang nor bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu zo ba tsam dag rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na shing ljon pa de dag kyang grangs med dpag tu med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni pad ma'i 'dab ma de dag dang /_nor bu de dag gi 'od kyis rtag tu 
[\[73b.5\]]snang bar byas pa ste/_'od de yang bcom ldan 'das de'i 'od kyis mog mog por byas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go chas snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa de la byang chub sems 
[\[73b.6\]]dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go chas zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang su'i lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das des de la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[73b.7\]]mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/_mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yin no/_/
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems 
[\[74a.2\]]dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha'i lag par pad ma chen po gcig byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul la/_nga'i tshig gis de bzhin du gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la 
[\[74a.3\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_'di lta ste/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[74a.4\]]mjed 'dir 'dug go/_/de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa 
[\[74a.5\]]yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/_zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa snyun gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la pad ma chen po 'di yang bcom ldan 'das des bskur ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i 
[\[74a.6\]]slad du bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/_bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga'a'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags 
[\[74a.7\]]so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]mtshan sa yan zhes bya ba chos kyi skyes byin nas btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog tshogs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[74b.2\]]chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog mngon par 'phags 
[\[74b.3\]]pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na/_'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi phug ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[74b.4\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i lus zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun du bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtsi lta bu zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[74b.5\]]pa don yod ming bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod go cha bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sman 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/_de na 
[\[74b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas brtson 'grus go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yang dag par byin pa'i bslab pa blangs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[74b.7\]]kun nas brgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyan mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na pad ma zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya 
[\[75a.2\]]ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab 
[\[75a.3\]]gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon 
[\[75a.4\]]tan thams cad rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[75a.5\]]des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan mtha' yas bsgrags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[75a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa thams cad 'gyur ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams lhas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[75a.7\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shing thag bzang po can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_
[\[75b.2\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa sel ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa b+ha gi ra sa'i sras zhes bya ba bzhugs te 
[\[75b.3\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs thob ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 
[\[75b.4\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma mchog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba 
[\[75b.5\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na ye shes zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa la zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ud pa la'i 
[\[75b.6\]]dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yul na mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'phags zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[75b.7\]]gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog rab gtor ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu 
[\[76a.2\]]rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rgyal po rab gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 
[\[76a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[76a.4\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[76a.5\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 
[\[76a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mes byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[76a.7\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[76b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun du sbas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snang zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 
[\[76b.3\]]'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun gyis brgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[76b.4\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sman ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub yan lag brgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes 
[\[76b.5\]]la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' legs par bsam pa sems pa khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog 
[\[76b.6\]]'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sprin ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' 
[\[76b.7\]]yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dran pa rnyed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dra bas kun tu g.yogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]gshegs pa sems can thams cad mos pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[77a.2\]]rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[77a.3\]]khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[77a.4\]]kun nas spos zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[77a.5\]]khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan bral zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[77a.6\]]rin chen sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtha' yas sgyur zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags 
[\[77a.7\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]lo zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 
[\[77b.2\]]tshab ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ka ling ka'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[77b.3\]]sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[77b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems 
[\[77b.5\]]dpa' rgyal tshab mes byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[77b.6\]]sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[77b.7\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes 
[\[78a.2\]]la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brag ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[78a.3\]]chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab stobs brtan zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 
[\[78a.4\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtho ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[78a.5\]]zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu dag pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[78a.6\]]zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[78a.7\]]gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa bon 'chang zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje bzhed ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri med rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te 
[\[78b.2\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bkod pa du ma zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad yongs su spangs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phan 
[\[78b.3\]]bzhed ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab glang po che'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas yongs rdzogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[78b.4\]]gshegs pa shin tu yang dag brtags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi bkod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa zhes bya ba yod 
[\[78b.5\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzod pa zhes 
[\[78b.6\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu brtson zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes 
[\[78b.7\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te btang 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas pa'i lhun po spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[79a.2\]]sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na ye shes zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[79a.3\]]sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs dkar po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[79a.4\]]des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brtson pa mi gtong zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang bud med 'gyur bar mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[79a.5\]]ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nga ro mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[79a.6\]]ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na spos zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[79a.7\]]zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od zer du ma zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spos zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kun gyi sems 
[\[79b.2\]]kyi mos pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[79b.3\]]gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos thams cad dben par gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas me tog 
[\[79b.4\]]brgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sbas pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'od zer zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[79b.5\]]khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[79b.6\]]rten gyi khams brtan po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mig g.yo rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab legs pa'i blo zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[79b.7\]]rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]ma'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ston ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rna ba'i me tog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[80a.2\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bden pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa don grub ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[80a.3\]]rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun dga' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[80a.4\]]khams gnod pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[80a.5\]]khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yod pas rgyags pa yang dag bcom zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyal po'i khyu mchog ces bya ba 
[\[80a.6\]]btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog kun tu bltas 
[\[80a.7\]]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rnam 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]par 'byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen 
[\[80b.2\]]tog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs med ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bzang po'i dpal zhes bya 
[\[80b.3\]]ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od gsal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i 
[\[80b.4\]]yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs 
[\[80b.5\]]pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang 
[\[80b.6\]]chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dmigs pa med ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun la dgyes par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[80b.7\]]chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]kyis mi shigs pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu 
[\[81a.2\]]bzod ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spobs pa mi chod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 
[\[81a.3\]]'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mthong zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba 
[\[81a.4\]]btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu blta ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 
[\[81a.5\]]tshab rnam par dag pa'i mig ces bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[81a.6\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[81a.7\]]gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa las rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i mchog ces bya ba 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ud pa la dmar po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad mas rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[81b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su 'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gis rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba 
[\[81b.3\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis thams cad yang dag bcom zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[81b.4\]]khams mar me zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[81b.5\]]'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i dpal 
[\[81b.6\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi nor bu can zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba 
[\[81b.7\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngal med ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nges 'dren zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sman pa'i mchog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog med 
[\[82a.2\]]ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tha mi dad par spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[82a.3\]]kun tu kha dog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[82a.4\]]byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi bsung gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[82a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes spos kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dpe med dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas dpe med me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[82a.6\]]zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[82a.7\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sdom pa la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba zhes bya ba btang ngo //_//bam po bdun pa/_de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[82b.2\]]gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[82b.3\]]gshegs pa lus mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brag ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyo 
[\[82b.4\]]med 'gyur bar mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yongs bsgrags nyon mongs yang dag bcom zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun la rab tu gnas 
[\[82b.5\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyal ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[82b.6\]]lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa kun la rab tu gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[82b.7\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen me zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod 
[\[83a.2\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog 
[\[83a.3\]]kun tu bkram zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu gtor ba'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[83a.4\]]rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nges 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[83a.5\]]khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan btud ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 
[\[83a.6\]]'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin bsregs byas pa'i 'od ces bya ba btang ngo /_/
[\[83a.7\]]de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 
[\[83b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bdug spos bdugs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gnyis gtsug tor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gnyis 'od ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[83b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[83b.4\]]gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa gsum zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[83b.5\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs kyi khyu mchog 
[\[83b.6\]]ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag pa can zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi 
[\[83b.7\]]shes pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu yongs su spangs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[84a.2\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos rab gtong zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[84a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' yul la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 
[\[84a.4\]]'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab tu gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston 
[\[84a.5\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pa ra dzA na zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[84a.6\]]ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dpe med ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dga' byed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[84a.7\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i 
[\[84b.2\]]dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi phreng ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 
[\[84b.3\]]'phags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab legs byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[84b.4\]]gshegs pa pad ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sangs rgyas chos 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[84b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa spos rab khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes dal ba 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu das rab tu 
[\[84b.6\]]khebs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba tog gi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rab byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yangs 
[\[84b.7\]]pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos
