[\[85a.2\]]ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can 
[\[85a.3\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyi bos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsam 
[\[85a.4\]]pa ka dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin 
[\[85a.5\]]chen snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[85a.6\]]mdzangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzangs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab sangs rgyas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog 
[\[85a.7\]]ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 
[\[85b.2\]]ces bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu 'od ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos zhes bya ba 
[\[85b.3\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[85b.4\]]blta na sdug ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[85b.5\]]de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin mos zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/
[\[85b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas kun tu khebs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 
[\[85b.7\]]sbar 'chums ma yin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas kun tu khebs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grong khyer sgrogs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[86a.2\]]chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi khom thams cad 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[86a.3\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i rigs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' 
[\[86a.4\]]yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam 
[\[86a.5\]]mkha'i rna cha gdub 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgrod 
[\[86a.6\]]pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos rigs 
[\[86a.7\]]btsun zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs btsun zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang 
[\[86b.2\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog sna tshogs me tog kun tu rgyas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 
[\[86b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams mthu dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ba lang bdag ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 
[\[86b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam par grol ba'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[86b.5\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par snang byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[86b.6\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[86b.7\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grol ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems 
[\[87a.2\]]dpa' rgyal tshab byams pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rab gtor ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[87a.3\]]rgyal tshab me tog gi gdugs me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gdugs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems 
[\[87a.4\]]dpa' rgyal tshab gser gdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems 
[\[87a.5\]]dpa' rgyal tshab log pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 
[\[87a.6\]]'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skyed byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[87a.7\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog gi rgyal mtshan 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog ces bya ba yod 
[\[87b.2\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser 
[\[87b.3\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sde zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod 
[\[87b.4\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'das pa rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams srid 
[\[87b.5\]]pa med ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro kun rnam par 'joms mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[87b.6\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mthong ma thag tu nges pa'i go cha 
[\[87b.7\]]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mchog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]rnam par bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[88a.2\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gom pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[88a.3\]]gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdo rje rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes 
[\[88a.4\]]bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya 
[\[88a.5\]]ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs mchog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams legs 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs 
[\[88a.6\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i go cha thogs pa med ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdul bral sde zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[88a.7\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu gnon ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[88b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon rtsi'i phung po 
[\[88b.3\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri med 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[88b.4\]]khams skar mda' zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'phel ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten 
[\[88b.5\]]gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa gong na med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 
[\[88b.6\]]'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnga sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 
[\[88b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs snang zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i 
[\[89a.2\]]yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sA la zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thu bo zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 
[\[89a.3\]]'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[89a.4\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags 
[\[89a.5\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sprin ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[89a.6\]]rten gyi khams kun 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[89a.7\]]khams dpal bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yos pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phug sbas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[89b.2\]]khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[89b.3\]]khams spos dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[89b.4\]]rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpal sbas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[89b.5\]]rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i 
[\[89b.6\]]yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbyangs 
[\[89b.7\]]mtha' yas nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang 
[\[90a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjed med nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 
[\[90a.3\]]'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'byor pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid bral zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[90a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phan 'dod ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[90a.5\]]ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs bsgrags don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[90a.6\]]gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab go cha mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 
[\[90a.7\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[90b.2\]]gshegs pa bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen tog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[90b.3\]]gshegs pa nam mkha'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nam mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang byed ces bya ba yod de/_de na 
[\[90b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bzang po dbyangs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[90b.5\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dri zhim zhes bya ba yod 
[\[90b.6\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod 
[\[90b.7\]]de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshad tshogs mtha' yas zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[91a.2\]]rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa phas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phas ma pham pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[91a.3\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags 
[\[91a.4\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams spos 'das zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i 
[\[91a.5\]]yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba 
[\[91a.6\]]btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang 
[\[91a.7\]]ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul bas byin ces bya ba 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang 
[\[91b.2\]]ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mdzes pa chen po'i dpal 
[\[91b.3\]]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro 
[\[91b.4\]]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 
[\[91b.5\]]dbang pos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[91b.6\]]sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan byin zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[91b.7\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsams pa'i smon lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[92a.2\]]gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'od ces 
[\[92a.3\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sbas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams khang 
[\[92a.4\]]pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par sems zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye 
[\[92a.5\]]shes spos zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 
[\[92a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[92a.7\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/
[\[92b.2\]]de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 
[\[92b.3\]]tshab dri ma med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[92b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston 
[\[92b.5\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho 
[\[92b.6\]]zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu brtsams pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa 
[\[92b.7\]]med pa'i 'od zer pad ma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gang gA'i 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 
[\[93a.2\]]'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung 
[\[93a.3\]]bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra 'di su'i lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten 
[\[93a.4\]]gyi khams grangs med pa stong dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/_mthu de lta bu 
[\[93a.5\]]'di ni de'i yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de blta 
[\[93a.6\]]ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[93a.7\]]dpa' kun du bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis pad ma brgyad blangs nas/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/_/de nas pad ma de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]'das te/_'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi po'i 'khor 
[\[93b.2\]]gyi dkyil 'khor gyis de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la pad ma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas pad ma de dag la reg par mdzad nas/_reg pa 
[\[93b.3\]]tsam gyis pad ma de dag las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dag mngon par byung ngo /_/byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to//_//bam po brgyad pa/_mtha' yas mkhyen mnga' gang 
[\[93b.4\]]zag khyu mchog gtso/_/rang byung mtha' yas chos rnams thugs su chud/_/khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rgya chen gda'/_/'jig rten khams rnams kun du snang bar mdzad/_/de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas/_/zhu ba'i khyad par kun tu zhu ba dang /_/sangs 
[\[93b.5\]]rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyi slad du/_/mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mchis/_/byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag_/mi mjed 'jig rten khams su rab gnas pa/_/de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/_/de dag ming dang gzugs dang grags 
[\[93b.6\]]pas 'phags/_/de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi 'jigs shing /_/sems can smin pa'i slad du yang dag zhugs/_/byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg gyur pa/_/'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag zhu/_/ji slad mngon du chos tshol bgyid ces na/_/bdud rnams 
[\[93b.7\]]gzhom dang byang chub 'thob slad du/_/de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams/_/gang yin de la shAkya thub pas gsungs/_/'dren pas yang dag tshig gis de bstan nas/_/mi mchog de yi tshig rnams thos gyur te/_/dga' zhing mgu la rjes su yi rang nas/_/bde gshegs 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur/_/sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs la zhu zhu ba/_/de dag gang nas mchi zhing ming ci zhes/_/de tshe 'khor kyang spu rnams zing zhes byed/_/'khor rnams bzhi po de dag gus pa yis/_/
[\[94a.2\]]rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spro ste/_/de tshe 'jig rten mgon po'i sprul pa sprul/_/de tshe dge slong kun dga' bzang po byung /_/mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu de dag gang /_/zhus nas kyang ni mi gda' ma mthong gyur/_/de dag su lags de dag su yi lags/_/mgon po bshad cing 
[\[94a.3\]]the tshom bsal du gsol/_/smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos/_/de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te/_/shar phyogs kyi ni 'jig rten khams kyi tshul/_/grangs med dag nas de dag lhags pa yin/_/dpa' bo 'jig rten phan phyir gang lhags pa/_/rnam 
[\[94a.4\]]par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste/_/bsam pa dag pa byang chub phyir spyod pa/_/de yi smon lam de ni de 'dra 'o/_/de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong /_/de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi lug_/tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par mi 'gyur te/_/thos pa mang zhing pha rol 
[\[94a.5\]]phyin pas 'phags/_/de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslabs/_/mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_/'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rabs tshe rabs su/_/de dag chos kyi sems rgyud brjed mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du phrad/_/rtag tu 'phags pa rnams 
[\[94a.6\]]dang 'grogs par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo de yis sems can 'dir mthong rnams/_/rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob/_/mthong ma thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste/_/gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mang /_/dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang yod pa/_/mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 
[\[94a.7\]]'gyur ba med/_/dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming /_/de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa/_/de ni phyin chad bud med dngos mi 'gyur/_/sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing /_/thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]la/_/sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa/_/lus zhig nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur/_/zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung /_/gang gis ming thos nam zhig dad byed pa/_/thams cad byang chub ched las nyams 
[\[94b.2\]]mi 'gyur/_/gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par/_/thos nas su zhig dga' ba skye mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yong ma gsungs/_/'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gang dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni/_/ji ltar rtsi yis 
[\[94b.3\]]skyon rnams sel byed bzhin/_/sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ba/_/byang chub don du nges 'gyur the tshom med/_/gang zhig pa la sha yi 'dab thogs shing /_/de dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na/_/de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su/_/sus kyang der ni me la tshig mi 
[\[94b.4\]]'gyur/_/gang tshe sbrul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis/_/dug gang de dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te/_/sa yi steng nas kun tu ston byed na/_/de 'dra'i sman brkos pas ni ci zhig bya/_/sbrul gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa/_/sbrul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur/_/
[\[94b.5\]]de ltar rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi de ni/_/ming gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_/de tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags pa na/_/dpa' bo de yi ming ni sus thos pa/_/de yi ming gis las ni 'di byed de/_/bud med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur/_/gang gis mthong dang bsti 
[\[94b.6\]]stang byed ci smos/_/de ni rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa/_/kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des/_/rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba/_/byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus/_/kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming /_/'jig rten khams 'dir yod 
[\[94b.7\]]ces ngas thos na/_/zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya/_/de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan pa/_/rgyal ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba yi/_/sems can dge ba chung dang ldan pa lhags/_/da ltar nga yi tshe ni cung zad gnas/_/kun dga' 'di na 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]sems can mchog yod de/_/de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i/_/go cha bsngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog mi nus/_/kun dga' bzang skyong rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_/dkon mchog 
[\[95a.2\]]'byung gnas dang ni ded dpon bzang /_/yon tan sbas pa mkhas dang de bzhin du/_/dpa' bo bzang stobs gang yin de la ltos/_/chu zhes bya ba dang ni chu lha dang /_/bzang skyong de bzhin dge slong ci 'dra rnams/_/ji ltar skyob 'gyur dge slong de dag ltos/_/de dag 
[\[95a.3\]]rnams kyi go cha de bsam yas/_/don yod ces ni yongs su bsgrags gyur pa/_/de dag gis ni don yod go cha bgos/_/de dag mthong ba'ang don yod 'gyur ba yin/_/de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos/_/kun dga' gang su dag gis de dag mthong /_/gang 
[\[95a.4\]]dag su yis ming yang thos gyur pa/_/de dag nam yang byang chub dogs pa med/_/de dag nam du'ang log par ltung mi 'gyur/_/de dag thams cad brtson pas tshogs pa yin/_/de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur/_/rtag tu tshul khrims phung pos de rtag 
[\[95a.5\]]gnas/_/thams cad theg pa mchog la de ltar 'dud/_/kun dga' sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yi/_/'jig rten da ltar gang dag su gnas pa/_/dpa' bo de ci go cha 'dod gyur pa/_/de la rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa brjod/_/gang gis bsngags 
[\[95a.6\]]brjod rgyal ba de dag kyang /_/byang chub sems dpas de tshe der shes te/_/shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang /_/byang chub zhugs pa'i dpa' bo dag blta'o/_/de thos nas kyang gsol ba btab gyur pa/_/mgon po mi mjed 'jig rten khams su mchi/_/
[\[95a.7\]]rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la bskor byas nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad lhags/_/dge slong de dag gi yang ming thos nas/_/de tshe byang chub mchog tu 'dun pa bskyed/_/gang dag ming dang 'dun pas byang chub zhugs/_/de dag rgyal bas byang chub der 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]lung bstan/_/bskal pa grangs med dag tu las byas shing /_/mi dge bsgrubs pa gang dag su yod pa/_/de phyir snyigs ma'i dus na de dag ni/_/nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du lhags/_/nga yis byang chub mchog 'di thob gyur kyang /_/de tshe sems can 
[\[95b.2\]]blta bar spro ba med/_/gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung ba/_/rtsub dang gtum dang shin tu rtsub pa yin/_/de tshe kun du 'jigs pa thos nas su/_/yang dang yang du brtson 'grus stobs bskyed cing /_/mu ge'i dus su zan rjen sbyin pa byin/_/de dag rnams kyi 
[\[95b.3\]]sbyin pa rtsub pa yin/_/de dag 'di la gus pa che byas nas/_/phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po de yi tshe/_/srog kyang btang nas don ni bya snyam ste/_/nga yi chos mchog spel zhing 'dzin par byed/_/dus de na ni mi dge'i las rnams kyi/_/smon lam gnas kyang 'jig rten 
[\[95b.4\]]dag na yod/_/'di na las de dag ni byas pa na/_/de yi tshe na brnyas pa'i tshul du 'gyur/_/de dag der ni 'di 'dra'i chos thos nas/_/de tshe der ni chos min 'du shes 'gyur/_/chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin zhes/_/'jig rten phyin ci log la kun dga' ltos/_/
[\[95b.5\]]de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la/_/rtag pa cung zad med ces skyo thob pas/_/de tshe mgo la me 'bar bzhin du rtogs/_/'chi med thob par bya phyir ma lus btsal/_/bstan 'di rab tu rnam par 'jig thos nas/_/der ni lha yang sdug bsngal dag tu gyur/_/de tshe 
[\[95b.6\]]'jig pa mthong na mi rung zhes/_/de lta'i dus su shi yang bla snyam sems/_/bag tsha med pa'i sgrogs pa sgrogs pa yi/_/drang srong che de de ring bdag cag mthong /_/'dren pa mchog gi zhal du lta byed cing /_/kye ma rgyal bas bshad ces yi rang ngo /_/dge slong bsam 
[\[95b.7\]]gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong /_/dbang thob rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mkhas gyur pa/_/'di na ting 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin/_/de dag phyi ma'i dus su ji ltar mthong /_/sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/de tshe tshul ldan shin tu tshar bcad 'gyur/_/
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]gnas khang gnas pa tshegs kyis 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/de tshe lha yid shin tu mi dga' 'gyur/_/kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig_/gang gi don du de tshe dka' spyod pa/_/de dag dge slong sdig pas tshar bcad 'gyur/_/bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 
[\[96a.2\]]'di la ltos/_/'dir ni phan tshun kun du dga' bar 'gyur/_/des pa rnams la de dag bsngags min brjod/_/sangs rgyas la ni 'khrug long byed pa dag_/de dag khyim na gnas par 'dzin par 'gyur/_/dge bsnyen ma dang 'dre bar byed 'gyur zhing /_/de na de 
[\[96a.3\]]dag lag pa gcig tu byed/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la ma gus gyur nas su/_/byang chub mchog kyang spong bar byed par 'gyur/_/dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 'tshe 'gyur te/_/de dag rtag tu des pa rnams kyis spongs/_/khyu mchog rwa chag ma gyur ma rungs pa/_/
[\[96a.4\]]de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pas rnam par spongs/_/de tshe tshul khrims ldan pa dpyas 'gyur zhing /_/de tshe dge slong sdig pas brnyas tshul 'gyur/_/'jigs chen phyin ci log gi dus su ni/_/skyo ba thob byos bag kyang yod par gyis/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la brtson 
[\[96a.5\]]'grus skyed/_/de tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i dge slong rnams dang phrad ma byed/_/de yi tshe na sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos 'di lta ste 
[\[96a.6\]]dper na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_/brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig des de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_/de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 
[\[96a.7\]]song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]zhes de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sku kun tu ston pa'i khyu mchog snyun gsol lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga'a'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[96b.2\]]ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems 
[\[96b.3\]]dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[96b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan nyid gcig pas mchod ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[96b.5\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma rab tu gtor ba'i char pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 
[\[96b.6\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med blo gros zhes 
[\[96b.7\]]bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa 'dzin rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' rnam par dag pa ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[97a.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan 
[\[97a.3\]]ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ud pa la zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying 
[\[97a.4\]]po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems dpa' med ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[97a.5\]]rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag yangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zab mo 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags 
[\[97a.6\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya ba btang 
[\[97a.7\]]ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gnod med ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs par gshegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' 
[\[97b.2\]]bo zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa la dmar pos khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyis rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems 
[\[97b.3\]]dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[97b.4\]]sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs chen zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[97b.5\]]sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung bas mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[97b.6\]]kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[97b.7\]]ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sngon du 'gro zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa me sgron zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[98a.2\]]des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dren ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gyen du gshegs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[98a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[98a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rab kyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[98a.5\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nga ro can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[98a.6\]]ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[98a.7\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog ces bya ba 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams skya reng zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya 
[\[98b.2\]]ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba 
[\[98b.3\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs 
[\[98b.4\]]nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog 
[\[98b.5\]]ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'byung 
[\[98b.6\]]ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[98b.7\]]pa me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes brtson 'grus zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shi 'phos med ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[99a.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba 
[\[99a.3\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dpung mgo mtho ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu spro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[99a.4\]]rtag tu kun du 'khrugs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab snying rje chen po'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[99a.5\]]rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pas gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/
[\[99a.6\]]de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs chen 
[\[99a.7\]]zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]tshad med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 
[\[99b.2\]]tshab mig po che zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 
[\[99b.3\]]tshab dga' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[99b.4\]]sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba can de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 
[\[99b.5\]]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[99b.6\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya 
[\[99b.7\]]ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na pad ma zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal zhes bya 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam par dag ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[100a.2\]]mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[100a.3\]]pa gsung mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon du 
[\[100a.4\]]'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal tshab sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[100a.5\]]thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[100a.6\]]rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar 
[\[100a.7\]]mda' 'dzin ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis rnam par 'joms zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan spos zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]gshegs pa mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bzang po zhes bya 
[\[100b.2\]]ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[100b.3\]]dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[100b.4\]]rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[100b.5\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/
[\[100b.6\]]de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bsgoms zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba 
[\[100b.7\]]btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis mnan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis thams cad yang dag par 'joms 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rim pa'i sras zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[101a.2\]]des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[101a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[101a.4\]]des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[101a.5\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thams cad bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom 
[\[101a.6\]]ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma snang ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_
[\[101a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[101b.2\]]gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes gnyen grags ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i lhun po mngon du 
[\[101b.3\]]'phags zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[101b.4\]]pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[101b.5\]]mthong ba don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[101b.6\]]pa thogs med dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu rab brjod ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[101b.7\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs byed ces bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zas kyi rgyal mtshan zhes 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig 
[\[102a.2\]]rten gyi khams tsan dan dri bsung zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/de'i yang 'dab 
[\[102a.3\]]chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na rin chen zhes bya ba btang ngo /_/
[\[102a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' de la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[102a.5\]]'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 
[\[102a.6\]]'das des nga'i 'og tu 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[102a.7\]]dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi phreng bas snang ba chen po de mthong ste/_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rgyu skar gyi phreng ba 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi 
[\[102b.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/_/'khor der yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa dag 'dus te/_rgyu skar gyi phreng ba 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na ni sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[102b.3\]]de dag ji lta bu'i go cha dag gis go cha bgos pa'i go cha de lta bu dag gis stongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[102b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 
[\[102b.5\]]bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol 
[\[102b.6\]]la/_rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang shes bzhin du spyod par gnas par byos shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi phreng bas bcom 
[\[102b.7\]]ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bskor ba yang byas nas song ste/_de 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug ste/_de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[103a.2\]]ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa snyun gsol lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[103a.3\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/byang 
[\[103a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lho phyogs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig 
[\[103a.5\]]tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[103a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam grol 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa'i go cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas de dag gi dang po byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyi me tog kun tu ston pa'i 
[\[103a.7\]]go cha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_zhes snyun gsol te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci mthong nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 
[\[103b.2\]]'ongs/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis lags mod kyi/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid na mchis kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong zhing 
[\[103b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong lags te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'dong bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan yang blta bar bya'o/_/snyam 
[\[103b.4\]]du mi sems lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid na mchis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bskyed pa tsam gyis de bzhin 
[\[103b.5\]]gshegs pa'i mthus bdag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang dag mchi ba de dag kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus mchis lags so/_/de'i tshe nub phyogs 
[\[103b.6\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od dang /_bkod pa dpag med dang /_'od zer dpag med dang /_'od dpag med dang /_khyu mchog dpag med dang /_rnam par gnon pa dpag med dang /_
[\[103b.7\]]rgyu skar gcig pa dang /_rgyu skar gyi phreng ba dang /_rin chen gdugs dang /_rgyu skar rgyal po dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang /_'od kyi rgyal po dang /_'od zer mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal dang /_'od zer mtha' yas dang /_khyu mchog dang /_khyu mchog mtha' yas rnam 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]par gnon dang /_thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs dang /_sprin chen 'od zer dang /_dra ba can gyi 'od zer dang /_sangs rgyas me tog 'od zer dang /_pad ma'i khyu mchog me tog dang /_ri'i rgyal po dang /_zla ba'i yon tan bdag po dang /_'od zer rab tu 
[\[104a.2\]]btang ba dang /_dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_rtse mo mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /_pad ma'i rtse mo mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/_byang chub 
[\[104a.3\]]sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags te/_lhags nas kyang rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[104a.4\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming sgrogs zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[104a.5\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snang 
[\[104a.6\]]ba chen po de mthong zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming sgrogs de la des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od kun du gda' ba dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi 
[\[104a.7\]]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar nges pa'i go cha la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[104b.2\]]grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/_snang ba de dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de ni de'i yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa dag skyes te/_de dag gis ming brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems 
[\[104b.3\]]dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming sgrogs la byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar nges pa'i go chas 
[\[104b.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' 
[\[104b.5\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song shig_/nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun yang gsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de bcom 
[\[104b.6\]]ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bskor ba yang byas nas song ste/_de 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/_brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi 
[\[104b.7\]]khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug ste/_de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming 
[\[105a.2\]]sgrogs snyun gsol lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/_des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/
[\[105a.3\]]de'i tshe byang phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming sgrogs la sogs te/_bcom ldan 'das don yod rnam par gnon gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_de bzhin du don yod khyu mchog dang /_don yod 'od zer dang /_brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang /_
[\[105a.4\]]sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_brtson pa mtha' yas dang /_sA la rin po che dang /_gdugs gcig pa dang /_rgyu skar bkod pa dang /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_tsan dan khang pa dang /_tsan dan spos kyi 'od dang /_'od mtha' yas dang /_'od kyi dkyil 
[\[105a.5\]]'khor can dang /_lhun po rnam dag dang /_thogs pa med pa'i spyan dang /_spyan mtha' yas dang /_rin chen 'byung dang /_kun gyi dpal dang /_sangs rgyas me tog 'byung ba'i dpal dang /_blo gros rab gnas dang /_mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang /_don yod dpal dang /_
[\[105a.6\]]rin chen rnam par gnon dang /_go cha mtha' yas dang /_bkod pa mtha' yas dang /_nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro dang /_rtsi'i rgyal po dang /_bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba dang /_spu zing zhes byed pa'i 'jigs bral dang /_yon tan rgyal po'i 'od 
[\[105a.7\]]dang /_spyan ras gzigs kyi blo sgrub me tog dang /_nam mkha'i rigs dang /_nam mkha'i nga ro dang /_nam mkha' bkod pa'i nga ro dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang /_gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye 
[\[105b\]]
