[\[186a.6\]]dpung gnyen gzhan med de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas de yang byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa de de lta bu dang theg 
[\[186a.7\]]pa de rmad du byung ba lags kyang /_bdag nyid kyang mdzes par bgyid cing /_gzhan dag kyang mdzes par bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na zhugs shing yongs 'dus brtol yan lag thams cad me tog yongs su rgyas pa ni bdag nyid kyang mdzes par bgyid la/_
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]gzhan dag kyang mdzes par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ni bdag nyid kyang mdzes par bgyid cing /_sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa yang mdzes par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na 
[\[186b.2\]]zhugs shing yongs 'dus brtol ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gar bgyid du stsol cing /_rtse bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[186b.3\]]par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs shing bdag nyid kyis kyang mdzes la/_sems can grangs ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis pas kyang mngon du bgrod par bgyid pa lags te/_der sems can phyin pa rnams kyang dbang po dang /_stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam 
[\[186b.4\]]gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis rtse bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lta bu le lo can gzhan gyi dring la 'jog pa dag ma gtogs par theg pa de la su zhig gnas par 
[\[186b.5\]]mi bgyid/_mngon par 'tshal bar mi bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos gzhan gyis stsal cing /_gzhan gyis bstan pas dbugs phyin pa dang /_bde bar gyur pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das slad kyis ni bcom ldan 'das las thos nas re zhig gang gis sems can 
[\[186b.6\]]'ga' yang bgyid pa de la 'jog pa'i mthu bdag cag la ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni deng slan chad gang la lar chos bstan na/_ches thog mar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las brtsams nas bstan par bgyi zhing nyan thos kyi theg pa ni slad kyis bstan par bgyi'o/_/
[\[186b.7\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyis pas sems can 'ga' zhig byang chub tu bzhag na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag cag gis bgyis pa gsol lags pa'i slad 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po gyon pa ni legs so legs so/_/
[\[187a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu theg pa de lta bu de'i ming yang mi 'byung ba'i dus de dang tshod de 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu theg pa de lta bu de la 'phya bar byed par 'gyur/_bsting bar byed par 'gyur la/_mdo sde de lta bu de dag len pa po ma yin pa dang /_spong bar byed pa 
[\[187a.3\]]'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo don 'dod pas ni don la rton pa dang /_chos la rton par bya'i/_'du 'dzi'i gnas su ni gnas par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe 'dus pa ni mi rigs par 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu nga'i 
[\[187a.4\]]nyan thos rigs pa dang ldan pa ni mdo sde de lta bu de dag la spong ba'am bsting ba'am rnam par g.yeng bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu las de dag ni rigs pa ma yin zhing /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa'i las de dag ni rigs pa'i las ma yin/_mkhas pa'i las ma yin la/_sha ra 
[\[187a.5\]]dwa ti'i bu nga ni mkhas pa'i las byed kyi byis pa'i las mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nga'i nyan thos kyis ni 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na dad pa can dang /_mang du thos pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_
[\[187a.6\]]dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba dang /_chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de'i tshe 'phya bar byed par 'gyur ba yin zhing /_brnyas par 'gyur ba yin/_de dag ni le lo can yin/_de dag ni 'bras bu thob par mi nus pa yin/_
[\[187a.7\]]de dag ni 'dod pa la sten pa yin/_'dod pa sten par 'dod pa yin/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bas dad pas sbyin par bya ba longs spyod par byed pa yin la/_theg pa de kun tu rjod par byed kyang /_de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rigs pa dang grol bar gsungs pa ni ma yin no/_/sha ra 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]dwa ti'i bu nga la mi blun po de dag tshig phra mo ji snyed kyis skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas mchog tu rigs par gsungs shing /_mchog tu grol bar gsungs pa de dag la 'di skad du de dag ni rigs pa ma yin zhing /_de dag ni grol ba ma yin no zhes zer bar 
[\[187b.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la gang dag khyim na gnas pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang kun tu gdungs nas mi blun po de dag la dad par bya ba yin par sems par 'gyur zhing /_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdo sde de lta bu 'dzin pa mthong na yang brnyas pa skyed 
[\[187b.3\]]par 'gyur ba la ltos/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni gang la yang yang dag pa'am/_yang dag pa ma yin pas gnod par mi bya zhing /_rnam par gtse bar mi bya la skur pa gdab par mi bya'o zhes gsungs na/_de dag ni gzhan dag la yang smra bar byed cing /_bdag nyid 
[\[187b.4\]]kyis kyang kun tu byed par 'gyur ba'i mi blun po de dag gis tshul khrims kyi phung po ji 'dra bar 'gyur ba la ltos/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes par 'gyur bar gyur cing /_'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul bar 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[187b.5\]]'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin par 'du shes par 'gyur ba dang /_rigs pa la rigs pa ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_rigs pa ma yin pa la rigs par 'du shes pa dang /_grol ba la grol ba ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_grol ba ma yin pa la grol bar 'du shes par 'gyur bar gyur nas kyang /_
[\[187b.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag 'dul ba yang mi shes shing /_ston pa'i bstan pa yang gting mi dpogs pa'i dus de ji srid du phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag ni khro ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_phrag dog gis zil gyis non pa yin zhing /_nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa yin/_
[\[187b.7\]]bdag la stod pa yin/_gzhan la smod pa yin na/_phrag dog dang /_ser sna yongs su rdzogs pa yin/_mi dge ba'i chos kyis gang ba yin/_dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongs su nyams pa yin te/_gsor mi rung ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag ni yongs su spang bar bya ba 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nga ni ngo tsha shes pa rnams kyi ston pa yin gyi nga ni ngo tsha mi shes pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nga ni dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ston pa yin gyi brjed ngas pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nga ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi ston pa yin gyi 
[\[188a.2\]]shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gang la de bzhin gshegs pas yun ring po nas bslabs pa dang /_gang la de bzhin gshegs pas bslabs pas bdag nyid chen po'i chos nyid de rjes su thob pa dang /_ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[188a.3\]]rnams chos nyid de yang dag par bsgrubs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_'gro ba dpag tu med pa nyon mongs pa'i dra ba las thar bar byed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'dems par mdzad pa'i ye shes de lta bu de dang de dag kyang chos 
[\[188a.4\]]gang la de bzhin gshegs pa gus pa dang bcas pa'i chos nyid de la 'gal bar byed par 'gyur zhing /_gnod par byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni nga'i nyan thos kyang ma yin la/_nga yang de dag gi ston pa ma yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma legs so ma legs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni de tsam zhig brjod 
[\[188a.5\]]par nus so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na chos gling yin par gnas par byos shig_/gzhan gling du ni ma byed cig_/bdag skyabs su gnas par byos shig_/gzhan skyabs su ni ma byed cig_/chos skyabs su gnas par byos shig_/gzhan skyabs su ni ma yin te/_khyed cag la rjes su 
[\[188a.6\]]bstan pa ni de yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar na dge slong chos gling yin par gnas shing /_gzhan gling ma yin/_bdag skyabs yin gyi/_gzhan skyabs ma yin/_bdag gling yin gyi/_gzhan gling ma yin zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la dge slong dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom 
[\[188a.7\]]par byed pa yin zhing /_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa yin/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po med pa dang /_rang bzhin med pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa chos 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dngos po med pa dang /_rang bzhin med pa'i sgo nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la gang mi slu bar 'di ni chos gling yin pa dang /_chos skyabs dang /_bdag gling dang /_bdag skyabs zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[188b.2\]]bu gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de lta bu sgom par byed pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa mngon par brjod pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bya'o/_/zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/dul ba zhes bya'o/_/skyon 
[\[188b.3\]]bsal ba zhes bya'o/_/bram ze tshangs par spyod pa pha rol tu son pa/_skam la son pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir dgra bcom pa zhes bya zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni dge ba thams cad la 'os pa yin/_dge ba'i las dag gis 'du byed pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/_de dag ni 
[\[188b.4\]]'du byed pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin/_'du byed pa thams cad spangs pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pas bsod nams 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed pa'i gnas med cing /_skabs med pa yin na bsod nams ma yin pa lta ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra 
[\[188b.5\]]dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni sred pa rgyun bcad pa yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni kun tu sbyor ba rnams las phyir log pa yin/_chos thams cad dang bral ba yin/_chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin/_yid chags pa med pa yin/_'dod pa'i khams la 
[\[188b.6\]]chags par mi byed pa yin/_gzugs kyi khams la chags par mi byed pa yin/_gzugs med pa'i khams la chags par mi byed pa yin/_'dun pa dang bral ba yin/_sred pa dang bral ba yin/_khong khro ba dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya zhe na/_
[\[188b.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i zag pa rnams zad cing /_chos thams cad la zad pa nyid thob la/_zad pa nye bar thob pas de'i phyir zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya zhe na/_dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]yang mi 'gyur te/_rnam par dag pa yin zhing /_'dod pa'am/_mi 'dod pa'am/_yid du 'ong ba'am/_yid du mi 'ong ba'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas gang gis kyang nye bar ma gos pas nye bar gos pa med pa yin la/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa 
[\[189a.2\]]zag pa zad pa ni spros pa thams cad spangs pas de'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya zhe na/_gdung ba spangs pa yin zhing /_yongs su gdung ba spangs pa yin/_gdung bar nye bar zhi ba yin la/_de ni zang zing med pa chos kyi mchog sbyin 
[\[189a.3\]]pa'i sbyin pa po yin pas de'i phyir sbyin gnas zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir dbang du gyur pa dag ces bya zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag gis chos thams cad ya ma brlar mthong zhing mngon du byas pa yin/_rnam par bsgoms pa yin/_ya ma brla'i chos de dag thams cad la yang dam pa'i pha rol tu son 
[\[189a.4\]]pa yin la/_de dag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i smra ba rnams bstsal ba yin pas/_de'i phyir dbang du gyur pa dag ces bya'o/_/ci'i phyir bram ze dag ces bya zhe na/_chos thams cad bsal ba yin zhing bor ba yin/_phyung ba yin la/_nye bar ma gos pa yin pas/_sdig pa bsal ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[189a.5\]]ci'i phyir zhi bar byed pa dag ces bya zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sdig pa thams cad dang /_sdig pa'i chos thams cad las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir tshor ba po dag ces bya zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag gis 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams 
[\[189a.6\]]dang /_rnam par smin pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /_bden pa ma yin pa thul cing las dang /_rnam par smin pa yang thul la/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag kun tu rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir/_kun tu rtog pa las byung ba'i chos thams cad thul cing rnam par grol ba yin pas 
[\[189a.7\]]de'i phyir tshor ba po dag ces bya'o/_/ci'i phyir pha rol tu son pa dag ces bya zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag gis bdud pham par byas shing bdud kyi phyogs kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad pham par byas la/_chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu son cing rgal la skam la son pas/_de'i phyir pha rol tu 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]son pa dag ces bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'i yon tan dag ji tsam ci brjod kyang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la bri bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa/_rdo ba dang /_tsher ma med pa/_shin tu rnam par 
[\[189b.2\]]dag pa'i zhing chen po yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa la ni gshe bar byed cing brgyad bkag byed kyang /_'di snyam du bdag la 'di gshe bar byed cing brgyad bkag byed do snyam du yang mi sems la/_bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa na yang 'di snyam 
[\[189b.3\]]du bdag la 'di bsngags pa'am/_bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do snyam du mi sems so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni rlom sems thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni bsrung ba med pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom 
[\[189b.4\]]pa zag pa zad pa la ni chos gang yang bsrung ba med de dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa yin zhing /_nges pa'i sa thob pa yin/_chos kyi sgron ma yin/_chos kyi skyabs yin/_bdag gi sgron ma yin/_bdag gi skyabs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na dge slong de ltar gnas pas ni 
[\[189b.5\]]'di ltar gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub spong bar mi byed cing mi rigs pa'i las kyang mi byed la/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yang ma yin zhing /_phyis kyang byang chub kun tu bsrung ba dang /_rnam par mi gtse ba dang /_mi spang ba'i phyir 
[\[189b.6\]]dang /_yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i don du zhugs par 'gyur ba de ni dgra bcom pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa la ni chos rnams la chos kyi the tshom med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni som nyi med pa yin zhing yid gnyis dang 
[\[189b.7\]]bral ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni rgal ba yin zhing lam kha brag las nges par rgal ba yin/_drang po'i gnas na gnas pa yin/_drang po yin/_drang por gyur pa yin/_lam drang po nas 'ongs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni chos spong ba ma lags par 'tshal bar bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de dag ni byis pa'i las lags kyi de dag ni dgra bcom pa'i las ma 
[\[190a.2\]]lags te/_'di lta ste/_chos spong ba lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byis pa'i las yin gyi dgra 
[\[190a.3\]]bcom pa'i las ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mi 'jigs pas zil gyis non pa'i dge slong dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni bsam gtan tsam dang /_nges par gnas pa tsam dang /_dgon pa na gnas pa tsam gyis bdag nyid nyon mongs pa med 
[\[190a.4\]]pa'o/_/snyam du kun tu shes par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid la rlom sems skyed par byed par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir de'i tshe bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can mos pa mang ba dang /_nges par rtog pa mang ba dag gis dgra bcom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas so/_/zag pa zad pa'o snyam du kun 
[\[190a.5\]]tu shes par 'gyur la/_de la yang lhag par byed pa bya bar sems par 'gyur zhing /_mi blun po de dag kyang bsnyen bkur gyis zil gyis gnon cing /_rnyed pas zil gyis non la/_bsngags pa dang /_grags pa dang /_snyan pas zil gyis non nas/_bdag cag ni chos de dag la gnas 
[\[190a.6\]]so/_/bdag cag ni chos de dag dang ldan no/_/bdag cag ni 'di na zag pa zad pa'o/_/bdag cag ni 'di na nyon mongs pa med pa'o snyam nas/_bdag nyid la ye shes can du kun tu shes par 'gyur ba yin zhing /_de dag ni byis par 'gyur ba yin/_brtags pa'i spyod lam can du 'gyur ba 
[\[190a.7\]]yin/_grong na 'khod pa de dag gi spyod lam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba yin/_gtsug lag khang na 'khod pa'i spyod lam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba yin/_dgon pa na 'khod pa rnams kyi yang gzhan du la/_'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams kyi yang gzhan du yin/_lus kyi las dang ngag gi las kun tu spyod pa 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]dag kyang ma bsrungs par 'gyur ba yin/_'khor ba na spyod par yang 'gyur ba yin/_bdag nyid kyi nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'du shes kyang skyed par 'gyur ba yin/_da ltar gang dag nyan thos rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo dang ldan pa/_dben pa dang ldan pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[190b.2\]]ldan pa de lta bu de dag thos nas kyang /_chos de la zhe sa dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas pas gus par nyan cing /_rna gtod par byed la/_sems gzhan du ma yin par nye bar 'jog par byed pa yin te/_de'i tshe mi blun po de lta bu'i spyod yul pa de dag kyang sting bar byed par 'gyur zhing /_'phya 
[\[190b.3\]]bar byed par yang 'gyur la/_gshe bar byed par yang 'gyur zhing /_'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin/_ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin no zhes gcig la gcig 'dems par byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni chos dang chos su 'dul ba dang 'dul bar mtshungs par 
[\[190b.4\]]mi 'gyur zhing /_chos ma yin pa sems par byed pa de dag ni chos la chos ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur ba yin/_chos ma yin pa la chos so zhes smra bar 'gyur ba yin/_'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na de dag ni chos gang 
[\[190b.5\]]'thob par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba yin la/_de dag ni bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod par 'gyur ba yin/_tshul khrims tsam dang /_dgon pa na gnas pa tsam dang /_bsam gtan tsam dang /_nges par gnas pa tsam dang /_thos pa tsam dang /_mang du 
[\[190b.6\]]thos pa tsam dang /_'khor tsam dang /_bsngags pa tsam dang /_tshigs su bcad pa tsam dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti tsam dang /_grags pa dang /_snyan pa tsam gyi nga rgyal gyi dbang gis nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pa yin te/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gleng ba po de dag gis yang 
[\[190b.7\]]dag par glengs pa na/_ji lta ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs de dag nyan pa de lta de ltar las ches dam pa dag mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba yin gyi/_mi blun po de dag ni 'di snyam du mi dge ba'i las yang dag pa de dag bdag cag la kun du yod do snyam du mi sems te/_de dag ni shas cher nga rgyal 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]gyis brtan cing /_mi shes pas brtan nas chos kyi rnam grangs de dag spangs te/_las ches dam po byas nas/_mnar med par 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin/_ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu da ltar nga khyed cag gi the tshom gcod par byed pa dang /_de'i 
[\[191a.2\]]tshe chos smra ba chos yongs su 'dzin pa/_chos ston pa/_don du gnyer ba/_mdo sde de lta bu 'dzin pa gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang de'i tshe nga chos kyi the tshom de lta bu gcod par byed pa de la ltos shig_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin zhing /_
[\[191a.3\]]thams cad shes pa can yin/_thams cad gzigs pa yin/_thams cad ston pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas ma mkhyen ma gzigs ma gsan pa'i chos de ni med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum la ma thogs pa'i ye shes 
[\[191a.4\]]brnyes pa yin zhing /_ma chags pa dang grol ba yin/_dbang du gyur pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa yin/_rang 'byung yin/_slob dpon mi mnga' ba yin/_bde blag tu seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang mi blun po de dag gi spyod pa dang /_spyod yul dang /_lam 
[\[191a.5\]]gyis ni mchog go/_/de dag ni ma bslabs pa yin/_mi blun po de dag ni lam ngan par zhugs par 'gyur ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par yang dag par zhugs pas ni bdag sangs 
[\[191a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la mngon par ma dad cing /_nyes par ma brtags la mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na mi rung ngo snyam nas chos de lta bu de dag la 'dun par bya/_rnal 'byor du bya/_spro bar bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos bzhi 
[\[191a.7\]]dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba yin zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song ba ma yin la/_sdig pa'i grogs po de dag la yang sten par byed/_
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]snyen par byed/_bsnyen bkur byed de/_de sdig pa'i grogs po de dag la bsten cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byas pas de dag nyid kyi rjes su bslabs nas spong bar byed pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bdag tu mngon par zhen pas dmigs pa can yin te/_
[\[191b.2\]]de chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/_skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur zhing g.yang sa chen por yang rab tu ltung ba yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos gnyis pa de dang ldan na/_byang chub spong bar byed pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[191b.3\]]rigs kyi bu gcer bu pa'i smra ba la zhugs pa yin zhing /_'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa dang /_skye bo mang pos bkur ba yin te/_de'i chos de dag mi sems par spong bar byed pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[191b.4\]]tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_tshul khrims rgud pa yin zhing /_ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa la yang mi slob pa yin te/_de yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam dang ldan pa de lta bu de dag spong bar byed pa yin zhing /_gshe bar byed la mos par mi byed de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[191b.5\]]kyi bu mo chos bzhi po de dang ldan na byang chub spong bar byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sdig pa'i grogs rnams sten byed cing /_/de dag gi ni rjes phyogs 'gyur/_/de phyir chos ni spong byed cing /_/sangs rgyas byang 
[\[191b.6\]]chub 'dod mi byed/_/gcer bu'i smra dang 'dres pa dang /_/'jig rten rgyang phan sems pa yin/_/bstan pa 'di ni brjod byas te/_/blo ngan dus ni drang po yin/_/byis pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can/_/kye ma mkhas par rlom sems byed/_/de phyir de ni chos spangs shing /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[191b.7\]]byang chub 'tshang mi rgya/_/bdag tu smra ba gang yin pa/_/dmigs pa la ni gnas nas su/_/zab mo'i chos rnams thos gyur nas/_/blo ngan chos ni spong bar byed/_/mtha' 'das stong nyid ji bzhin dang /_/don ni de yis mi shes te/_/de phyir byang chub spong bar byed/_/de yi gting ni shes ma 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]yin/_/tshul khrims 'chal dang sdig chos can/_/mi gtsang kun rtog spyod yul ba/_/ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa la/_/blo ngan de dag slob mi byed/_/dmu rgod bka' blo mi bde ba/_/rma 'bebs po dang lce ngan po/_/de lta'i chos can de la ni/_/sdig pa mi 
[\[192a.2\]]byed ci yang med/_/de phyir de ni rnam par spang /_/rtag par sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad/_/gang dag nga yis rtag bsngags pa'i/_/chos la'ang rtag tu bsten par bya/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas mthong 'dod dang /_/de 'dra'i chos ni nyan 'dod des/_/tshul khrims phung po legs 
[\[192a.3\]]par brtag_/de la chos ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims phung por gang dag gnas/_/de la 'jug par 'dod pa dang /_/de la kun tu rtog 'dod pas/_/de phyir tshul khrims bsten par bya/_/ye shes de 'dra 'jug 'dod na/_/yid gzhungs pa yis tshul khrims bstan/_/
[\[192a.4\]]byang chub rnams kyi phul dang mchog_/des ni rnyed par dka' ma yin/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[192a.5\]]pa ni bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin/_dge ba'i chos can dang /_tshul khrims kyi phung po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang mang du thos pa yin/_don dam pa la mkhas shing 'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang yang ma 'dres pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dag pa yongs 
[\[192a.6\]]su 'thob cing dben pa la gzhol bas dgon pa dang /_rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa ni byang chub kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[192a.7\]]bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/tshul khrims phung por de gnas kyang /_/tshul khrims kyis ni rlom sems med/_/nges pa'i don dang zab mo yi/_/chos ni phyis kyang tshol bar byed/_/sangs rgyas byang chub dag pa dang /_/rnam dag yongs su dag pa'ang tshol/_/gcer bu rnams 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]kyis gang 'dzin pa'i/_/gsang tshig dag ni de mi tshol/_/'thab med gsang tshig de 'dod pas/_/'jig rten rgyang phan 'dres ma yin/_/sangs rgyas chos la nges yin zhing /_/rtag tu bstan pa srung bar byed/_/gang dag gis ni sems 'khrug pa'i/_/bud med rnams 
[\[192b.2\]]ni der mi 'gro/_/dben pa zhi ba stong pa yi/_/bas mtha'i dgon pa rnams sten byed/_/nga yis mchog dang phul bsngags pa'i/_/chos bzhi po ni de dag dang /_/byang chub rnams kyi don gang bstan/_/chos de dag la bsten par byos/_/de dang der ni de bzhin du/_/sngon 
[\[192b.3\]]chad de dag bsten pa yin/_/ye shes kun tu srung bar byed/_/des ni nga yi ye shes bsgrubs/_/chos ni kun tu bsrung byas pas/_/'gro ba ngan par 'gro mi 'gyur/_/rtag par de zhi kun tu dag_/gzugs kyis kyang ni 'phags par 'gyur/_/longs spyod ldan par de rtag 
[\[192b.4\]]'gyur/_/thob nas kyang ni bag yod 'gyur/_/de la snying po ston par 'gyur/_/longs spyod rnams ni mi rtag ces/_/gang byin de ni nga yi yin/_/gang ma byin de nga yi min/_/nga dang longs spyod phung po'ang rung /_/thams cad spangs nas song ba yin/_/g.yog 'khor 
[\[192b.5\]]bzang por 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi bshes gnyen bzang por 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni bsngags chos la/_/ma yeng nges par sbyor bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid kyis kyang 'dun pa yin/_/gzhan yang de la nges sbyor byed/_/de phyir de ni dga' ba 'thob/_/dam pa'i chos kyang spyod 
[\[192b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/gang dag 'jig rten mchog bkur ba'i/_/rigs mtho bar yang rtag par skye/_/de ni bag med mi byed cing /_/rtag tu chos la sten par byed/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la mnyes byed 'gyur/_/mthong nas kyang ni dad par byed/_/sems dad cing ni yid dga' nas/_/
[\[192b.7\]]mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur/_/lus dang srog dang longs spyod ni/_/de dag thams cad snying po med/_/skyes bu dam pa mthong nas kyang /_/myur du snying po ston par 'gyur/_/de yi lus dang longs spyod la'ang /_/snying po'i 'du shes 'jug mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]rnams ni 'byung ba dkon/_/dal ba de 'dra 'ang rnyed par dka'/_/der ni dal ba'ang 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/thob nas kyang ni yid mi 'byung /_/gang las ye shes 'thob 'gyur ba'i/_/mngon 'byung de la sten par byed/_/rangs dang mchog tu dga' bskyed nas/_/ye shes 
[\[193a.2\]]dam pa tshol bar byed/_/gang las byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba'i/_/chos la'ang rtag par gnas par byed/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid dbugs 'byin cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas kyang gnas par byed do/_/
[\[193a.3\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs nas longs spyod kyi phung po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/_tshul khrims kyi phung po'i yon tan thams cad la rab tu gnas pa yin/_chos zab mo rnams kyis ye shes thams cad mngon du 'phags 
[\[193a.4\]]pa yin zhing mngon du 'phags nas lus dang srog gtong bar byed kyang chos gtong bar mi byed pa yin/_dge slong chos smra ba dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa mdo sde de lta bu 'dzin pa rnams la yang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis spro bar bya ba la zhugs pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu theg pa 
[\[193a.5\]]chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lung ston pa dang /_dbugs 'byin pa mang ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/longs spyod rnams ni kun bged byed/_/tshul khrims 
[\[193a.6\]]phung por shin tu gnas/_/chos rnams la ni mngon du 'phags/_/stong pa'i chos la the tshom med/_/gang dag chos ni ston pa yi/_/chos de yang ni yongs su 'dzin/_/gang dag chos ni ston pa la'ang /_/bde bar sgrub pas zhugs pa yin/_/de phyir de ni dga' ba 'thob/_/
[\[193a.7\]]mchog tu dga' ba'ang de yis 'thob/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur bar ni/_/bdag nyid la yang lung ston to/_/de la sangs rgyas lung ston mdzad/_/gang dag 'das dang ma byon dang /_/gang dag byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de dag rgyal bar lung yang ston/_/sangs rgyas theg pa 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]bla med kyi/_/byang chub lam la de gnas shing /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang bsten pa'i/_/chos de dag la'ang sten par byed/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis de dag bsngags/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsten/_/sangs rgyas lam ni bla med kyi/_/lam de 
[\[193b.2\]]la ni de gnas 'gyur/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i lam du ni/_/snod gcig bor bar gyur pa dang /_/ji ltar chags par blta bya dang /_/de yi gnas pa yod min bzhin/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/gang bslabs byang chub lam la yang /_/byang chub ma thob bar du ni/_/
[\[193b.3\]]de yi ldog pa yod ma yin/_/ji ltar kun tu 'dres pa der/_/gdams pa skyed par byed pa yang /_/de yi rgyun chad yod ma yin/_/myur du de ni 'dzud par byed/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/rtag tu chos rnams sten byed kyang /_/byang chub sangs ma rgyas kyi bar/_/
[\[193b.4\]]brtson 'grus spong bar byed ma yin/_/ji ltar ljon shing rtsa ba yang /_/mi yis rtag par sbed byed cing /_/dus su dkri bar byed pa yi/_/shing ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rlung dang nyi ma dag gis ni/_/dus su grang dang dro gyur par/_/mthar gyis sba ba byas nas su/_/me 
[\[193b.5\]]tog 'bras bu de des 'byin/_/sems can mang la bde byed pa/_/shing gi grib ma yid dga' 'byung /_/bde ba'i bde dang ldan pa dag_/me tog 'bras bu longs kyang spyod/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yang /_/byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas/_/dus su chos rnams sten 
[\[193b.6\]]byed cing /_/dus su yongs su 'dri bar byed/_/dus dang dus min sten byed cing /_/dus dang dus min 'dri bar byed/_/dus su brtson 'grus rtsom byed cing /_/des pas dus su sbyin pa sbyin/_/dus su byang chub snying po yi/_/shing gi drung du 'dug nas su/_/blo gros ngan pa'i bdud 
[\[193b.7\]]bcom ste/_/dus su byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/_/'jig rten du ni ma bskor ba'i/_/'khor lo dus su skor bar byed/_/dus su sems can 'dul byed cing /_/'bel ba'i gtam yang yongs su 'dren/_/byang chub zhugs pa'i mkhas rnams ni/_/mthu dang ldan sems de lta bus/_/
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhing /_/de na nam yang ldog mi 'gyur/_/de lta bas na dus dus su/_/yang dang yang du chos bsten bya/_/dus su byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing /_/dus su 'khor lo'ang bskor bar 'gyur/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/_
[\[194a.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur la/_tshe rjes nas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid byed cing /_ji ltar smon pas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rjes su 'jug par byed pa yin/_stobs che ba dang lus che ba yin/_
[\[194a.3\]]sred med kyi bu ltar mkhregs pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/_de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob nas kyang myur du gling bzhi spangs nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba yin/_rab tu byung nas kyang de tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi thob pa dang /_skyon med pa thob pa dang /_rtse ba med pa thob 
[\[194a.4\]]pa dang /_tshegs med pa thob pa yin/_de nas shi 'phos nas kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_skyes nas kyang tshangs pa'i dbang po nyid 'thob pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[194a.5\]]mchod rten zhig pa mthong nas bcos pa'i phyir spro bar byed cing tha na 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig tsam yang rtsig par byed pa yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ma brtsigs pa'i sa phyogs lam po che'i bzhi mdo skye bo mang po 'du ba'i sar mchod rten dang khang pa brtsegs pa'am/_rdo ba'i ka ba dang /_
[\[194a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran pa gang yang rung ba byed de/_'di lta ste/_dper na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am/_mngon par 'byung ba'am/_byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'joms pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po 
[\[194a.7\]]'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par bstan pa'am/_lha las babs pa'am/_lha yul du mngon par 'dzeg par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rtsig par byed pa yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye zhing 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa 'byung ba mthong nas mi dbye ba dang /_'thun par bsdum pa'i phyir brtson pa yin/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[194b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa rab tu 'jig cing /_chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsrung ba dang mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin/_chos sam chos smra ba yongs su 'dzin par byed cing lus dang srog gtong bar byed kyi chos gtong 
[\[194b.3\]]bar mi byed pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na yon tan gyi bye brag sngar bstan pa de dag rjes su 'thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal 
[\[194b.4\]]to/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten mthong nas su/_/zhig pa phyir ni bcos par bya/_/de phyir stobs ni che ba dang /_/lus che ba dang mi 'jigs 'gyur/_/gang du dad pa skye 'gyur ba'i/_/lam chen bzhi mdo phyogs su ni/_/ring bsrel gyi ni sku byed cing /_/sangs 
[\[194b.5\]]rgyas yon tan rnams ston pa/_/bsod nams mang po skyed par byed/_/gang zhig lam gyi bzhi mdor ni/_/'jig rten mchod pa'i mchod rten byed/_/de yi grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/phan tshun du ni rtsod pa yi/_/nyan thos bye ba rnams mthong nas/_/gcig la 
[\[194b.6\]]gcig ni bzod gsol te/_/de dag rnams ni 'thun byed pa/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis su/_/mi 'jigs dpa' bor 'gyur ba yin/_/sred med bu ltar mkhregs pa yi/_/lus ni mngon par 'grub pa yin/_/bstan pa rab tu rnam 'jig pa'i/_/chos la mi bde nyer gnas 
[\[194b.7\]]tshe/_/gus par byas te chos srung zhing /_/lus dang srog dag bor gyur pa/_/de bzhin chos ni 'dzin byed pa/_/de dag srung bar byed pa dag_/lha rnams kyis ni bsrung bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs/_/chos ni kun tu bsrung byas pas/_/de dag 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/gling bzhi po dag rnam bskor cing /_/chos kyis kyang ni rgyal srid byed/_/bskor cing rab tu bstan pas na/_/bag med par ni 'gyur ma yin/_/bag yod par ni rtag par 'gyur/_/rgyal srid bor nas rab tu 'byung /_/drang 
[\[195a.2\]]srong rgyal po rdzu 'phrul can/_/bsam gtan bzhi po sgom par byed/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams bsgoms nas/_/rtag par yon tan gnas pa yin/_/shi 'phos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du'ang /_/de ni skye ba sgrub par byed/_/der yang chen por 'gyur ba yin/_/de ni tshangs 
[\[195a.3\]]pa'i dbang phyug yin/_/chos kyi mchog ni bzhi po dag_/'jig rten gyi ni mgon pos bsngags/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/_/sngon chad ngas kyang bsten pa yin/_/chos gang la ni ngas bslabs shing /_/ji ltar sngon chad spyad pa bzhin/_/de la pha rol phyin gyur nas/_/
[\[195a.4\]]bla med byang chub sangs rgyas yin/_/ji ltar sngon chad ngas bsten pa'i/_/chos de dag la gang bsten pa/_/thams cad du ni chen por 'gyur/_/bsnyen dka' rigs pa can du 'gyur/_/mi yi bdag por 'gyur ba yin/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i khams 
[\[195a.5\]]ni thams cad du'ang /_/dbang phyug dam par 'gyur ba yin/_/gzugs kyi khams su song nas kyang /_/der ni dbang phyug 'gyur ba yin/_/thams cad du yang mchog tu 'gyur/_/yon tan dag la su mi slob/_/tshul khrims spyod pa phun sum tshogs/_/ngo tsha ldan zhing khrel yod 
[\[195a.6\]]'phags/_/de yi mngon 'byung phun sum tshogs/_/kun tu phun sum tshogs pa 'thob/_/brtson 'grus kyis ni phun tshogs 'gyur/_/bzod pa ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs/_/de yi shes rab bla na med/_/chos rnams kun la mkhas pa yin/_/nam zhig rtag par don bsam pa/_/
[\[195a.7\]]bye ba phrag ni stong po dag_/der ni thams cad rab tu shes/_/don bsam pa la mkhas pa yin/_/skad cig gcig gis sgrub pa de'i/_/tshig rab dbye ba shes par 'gyur/_/gang dag chen por 'gyur ba yi/_/mang thos rnams kyi slob dpon che/_/ji ltar mdzangs pa shes rab dang /_/
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]spobs pa yis ni 'phags pa bzhin/_/rtag par byang chub phyir nges shing /_/phyi rol shes pa 'dor bar 'gyur/_/rtag par de yi lta ba drang /_/yang dag lta ba shin tu sgom/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyang mnyes par byed/_/rtag tu mi khom spong bar 'gyur/_/a la theg pa 
[\[195b.2\]]theg chen po/_/sangs rgyas dag ni kun gyis bsngags/_/de la dman pa'i chos rnams ni/_/gang yang bsgrags par byed pa med/_/de la long ba bsgrags pa med/_/'on pa dag kyang bsgrags pa med/_/zhar dang lag rdum 'phye bo dang /_/mdog mi sdug dag bsgrags pa 
[\[195b.3\]]med/_/dbul po dag ni bsgrags mi bya/_/dman pa'i yon tan bsgrags pa med/_/gang gis sdig can 'gro 'gyur ba'i/_/sdig pa'i chos can bsgrags mi bya/_/'di la ye shes de 'dra dang /_/bsngags pa de 'dra thos nas su/_/spyod yul gang min ma gtogs par/_/
[\[195b.4\]]ye shes de 'dra su mi tshol/_/de phyir ye shes gang tshol ba/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rmongs pas tshol/_/ye shes de la bslabs pas na/_/chos rnams kyi ni pha rol 'gro/_/nga yis rigs rnams bzhag ma yin/_/skye ba'ang glengs pa ma yin zhing /_/de yi kha dog phye ba'ang min/_/
[\[195b.5\]]gzugs kyi sku la dman pa med/_/nga ni le lo can ma yin/_/brtson 'grus kyis ni rtag tu 'phags/_/rtag tu'ang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/_/shes rab ldan zhing rab mnyam bzhag_/'di ltar nga yis sngon chad chos/_/mchog dang phul dag bsten pa yin/_/de yi 'bras bu'ang 
[\[195b.6\]]longs spyod kyis/_/rnam par smin pa ji 'dra ltos/_/'jig rten khams ni stong dag dang /_/bye ba khrag khrig dag dang ni/_/de bas lhag pa'i zhing rnams su/_/de la nga yi ye shes 'jug_/sems can gang dag der skyes pa/_/de dag gi ni sems kyang shes/_/de dag 
[\[195b.7\]]rnams kyi spyod pa'ang shes/_/bsam pa yang ni rnam par shes/_/mi snyan smra ba gang 'byung ba/_/de dag gi ni de yang shes/_/chad pas gcad pa'ang shes pa yin/_/rab tu bzung ba'ang de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas spyan gyis ngas de dag_/thams cad la ni rnam bltas te/_/sems 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]can yongs su smin shes nas/_/srid pa'i bcings las dgrol bar bya/_/dus su song nas bskul bar bya/_/dus su yang ni gdams par bya/_/gang gis de dag skye 'gyur ba'i/_/cho 'phrul rnams ni bstan par bya/_/gang dag gzugs la chags 'gyur dang /_/
[\[196a.2\]]longs spyod la yang gnas 'gyur ba/_/de dag la ni nyes dmigs bstan/_/de phyir de ni mya ngan 'da'/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags bcing bas bcings/_/lta ba la ni gnas 'gyur ba/_/de dag rnams la nyes dmigs bas bstan/_/de phyir de ni mya ngan 'da'/_/srid lta de 'dra gang 
[\[196a.3\]]du 'byung /_/gang la de dag gnas 'gyur dang /_/de dag gis ni gang mchog bkur/_/de 'dra'i lus su bsgyur nas su/_/drang po'i lam ni bstan par bya/_/de dag gis kyang chos shes nas/_/gang 'dir nges par bdag cag gis/_/byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhes/_/de 
[\[196a.4\]]tshe nga la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gi ni rtsa rtogs nas/_/de dag la ni chos kyang bstan/_/sdug bsngal kun las phyung ba yin/_/nga ni rgyal ba zug rngu 'byin/_/mya ngan 'das zhi thob bya'i phyir/_/de dag la ni ngas chos bstan/_/de dag nga las chos thos nas/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[196a.5\]]pa rjes su 'thob/_/nga yi shes pa de ltar la/_/chos rnams kun la 'jug pa ltar/_/'das pa'i dus dang gang dag yang /_/ma 'ongs chos rnams de bzhin no/_/nga yi lus ni mchog tu 'phags/_/de yi tshad ni dmigs ma yin/_/rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug blta bar ni/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[196a.6\]]can gyis nus ma yin/_/sangs rgyas lag pa mtha' yas te/_/nga yi lag pa dpag tu med/_/ji ltar gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/'jig rten khams dag khyab pa yin/_/kha dog bcas pa ci 'dra bas/_/sangs rgyas sku ni 'byung 'gyur zhes/_/sangs rgyas sku yi kha dog dang /_/dbyibs 
[\[196a.7\]]ni shes par nus ma yin/_/kha dog dbyibs ni ci 'dra zhes/_/nga yi thad lhags gang dag lta/_/kha dog sna tshogs lta byed kyang /_/mtshan ma shes pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sku mthong nas/_/kun brjod pa yi cho 'phrul gyis/_/sems can de dag rab dga' zhing /_/nga yi 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]lus la'ang stod par byed/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/_/sangs rgyas sku ni blta mi nus/_/lha yi mig can gang la yang /_/snang bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas byin brlabs de/_/khyed cag gis ni 'dir ltos shig_/sku de bsam mi khyab yin 
[\[196b.2\]]par/_/sangs rgyas sku ni shes par byos/_/spu yi khung bu gcig nas su/_/cho 'phrul dag ni de 'dra dang /_/'jig rten khams su sems can gyi/_/don de 'dra ba byed par 'gyur/_/'od zer bye ba mang po ni/_/spu yi khung nas phyung nas su/_/zhing rnams mang po snang bar byed/_/
[\[196b.3\]]sangs rgyas zhing yang de snyed do/_/stan 'di la ni 'dug nas su/_/ji ltar sems can ngas shes ltar/_/de tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/_/sems can de dag nyid kyis shes/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes mtha'/_/nga yis gzhag par nus ma yin/_/kun mkhyen ye shes 
[\[196b.4\]]ngas kyang ni/_/nyan thos rnams kyis 'dir ci smos/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/_/bsam mi khyab la dad byas pas/_/de dag bsam mi khyab tu'ang 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//
[\[196b.5\]]de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du skyes nas lo bdun lon pa lta bu'i khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung ba zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung ba stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su 
[\[196b.6\]]bcad pa dag gis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas chos rnams de thos te/_/de nas go cha 'tshal snyam nas/_/bdag la kun tu 'dun skyes pas/_/bdag kyang de 'drar 'gyur snyam bgyid/_/spyan ldan chos kyi sbyin pa yis/_/sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer/_/khyu mchog 
[\[196b.7\]]gi ni tshig tu smra/_/gzhan du ma lags de bzhin bgyi/_/'dren pa slad kyis sdum par ni/_/bdag gi 'dun par 'jug ma lags/_/'jig rten mgon po'i bstan pa de/_/'di nyid la ni rab tu 'byung /_/mngon par 'byung dang brtson 'grus dang /_/yon tan rnams dang bsam 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]gtan dang /_/ting 'dzin shes rab 'bras de lags/_/de nyid bdag gis bsten par bgyi/_/spyan ldan dag la 'dun pa skyes/_/myur du bdag ni rab tu phyung /_/ngur smrig gos ni 'tshal nas su/_/chos kyi dam pa spyad par bgyi/_/me long ye shes lta 
[\[197a.2\]]bus kyang /_/'jig rten de la rnam sems shing /_/'jig rten mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi/_/legs par rab tu dbyung du gsol/_/thams cad kyang ni ma mchis pas/_/sems can 'du shes mi gnas shing /_/bdag mngon rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_/'dren pa chos de 
[\[197a.3\]]bstan par bgyi/_/bdud dpung bcas pa bcom nas su/_/mu stegs gzhan rnams skrag bgyis te/_/lta ba'i dra ba rab bcom nas/_/srog chags rnams kyi don bgyi'o/_/mya ngan 'das bde 'thob slad du/_/bdag gis lam ni bstan par bgyi/_/de la skye ba ma mchis 
[\[197a.4\]]pas/_/lam de bsam mi khyab pa lags/_/bdag gis dra ba rnam phye nas/_/bdag gis chos kyi snang bar bgyi/_/rang bzhin de dang mtshan nyid de'i/_/chos ni ji lta bzhin du bstan/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam 'phrul bgyi/_/cho 'phrul dag ni bstan par bgyi/_/de la gang 
[\[197a.5\]]dag bdag la lta/_/kun gyi the tshom 'chad par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khye'u nga'i bstan pa 'di la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'dod dam/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[197a.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig ngur smrig mi 'dzin cing /_/gang dag snyigs ma med gyur pa/_/nga yi bstan la rab 'byung bar/_/bya ba'i chos ni de yin no/_/gang gi skra dag ma bregs shing /_/bcing ba thams cad bcad gyur la/_/ma bcings 
[\[197a.7\]]pa dang ma grol ba/_/'di la rab tu byung ba de'o/_/gang dag bslab la mi slob pa/_/bslab pa'ang 'bogs par byed ma yin/_/bslab pa kun la bslabs pa ni/_/'di la rab tu byung ba de'o/_/gang zhig dam chos mi 'dzin cing /_/chos rnams thams cad rnam bsgoms la/_/chos kyi 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]'du shes bstsal gyur pa/_/de ni 'di la rab tu byung /_/gang zhig bdag ces mi sems shing /_/gang zhig sems can zhes mi sems/_/de la zhum pa nyid mi 'byung /_/de ni byang chub phyir zhugs pa'o/_/gang gis sems ni bskyed gyur la/_/chos gzhan yang ni mi dmigs 
[\[197b.2\]]shing /_/sems la 'dzin par mi byed pa/_/de ni nga la rab tu byung //_//bam po bcu drug pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas zab mo zab mo dag bstan pa'i khye'u des yun ci srid cig spyad par 
[\[197b.3\]]'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshigs su bcad pa dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan zab mo'i chos thos nas/_/mi skrag zhum par mi 'gyur ba'i/_/khye'u ni rnam par rgyal srung gi/_/spyod pa de 'dra de ci lags/_/gang gis zab 
[\[197b.4\]]mo'i gnas thos nas/_/de la skrag pa mi 'byung ba/_/sngon chad skye ba gzhan dag tu/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed mthong /_/gang gis sgyid lug mi 'gyur ba/_/gnas rnams kyang ni zab mo dag_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/ji snyed cig la zhus pa 
[\[197b.5\]]lags/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar bka' stsal pa/_'das pa'i dus na ngas shes pa/_/sa yi phyogs ni 'di nyid du/_/sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po la/_/rnam par rgyal ba srung gis zhus/_/ang ga ma ga 
[\[197b.6\]]d+hA der ni/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/_/gang dag la ni sngon zhus pa/_/sangs rgyas ji snyed pa yang shes/_/chos rnams dang ni khams rnams dang /_/skye mched dag dang stong pa dang /_/tshad med de dang rnam thar gyi/_/gnas dang gnas min rab tu mkhas/_/ji ltar ang ga ma ga d+hAr/_/
[\[197b.7\]]e ma sangs rgyas shes pa bzhin/_/de ltar ka shi'i khyim rnams su/_/mkhas pas de snyed shes pa yin/_/rnam par rgyal srung khye'u de ni/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa thob/_/dkar chos rnams kyis byung ba yin/_/de phyir de shes de 'dra ba/_/'dir ni chos la reg par byed/_/
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]yi ge ji bzhin phyag rgya grangs/_/bzo rnams sna tshogs gzhan yang shes/_/de las gzhan yang brjed pa med/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i shes las gzhan/_/'jig rten pa yi shes mi smra/_/de la mchog 
[\[198a.2\]]tu 'dzin mi byed/_/gang gis ye shes de 'dra dang /_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/_/de la bskal pa brgya dag tu'ang /_/rmongs pa yod pa ma yin no/_/ye shes de ni ye shes che/_/nyon mongs zad byed rang bzhin can/_/gang zhig stong pa mi 'dod pa/_/
[\[198a.3\]]de ni chos la 'jug mi 'gyur/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung 
[\[198a.4\]]bas 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni rab tu byung zin pas bdag rab tu mi 'byung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung ba la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis smras pa/_khyod kyis gos dag gang bgos pa/_/ngur smrig khyod la 
[\[198a.5\]]gnang ma yin/_/khyod kyi skra yang bregs ma yin/_/'di la ji ltar rab tu byung /_/khyod kyis bslab la bslabs ma yin/_/khyod la slob dpon yod ma yin/_/mkhan po yang ni yod ma yin/_/khyod ni ji ltar rab tu byung /_/khyod ni lhung bzed thogs ma yin/_/khyod ni 
[\[198a.6\]]mtshams su byung ba yin/_/'di la gang gis rab byung ba/_/khyod ni ji ltar bsdams pa yin/_/gang du tshogs kyis rdzogs par byas/_/khyod kyi de snyed su yis byas/_/khyod ni ji ltar rab tu byung /_/bdag gis dris pa de smros shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang 
[\[198a.7\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung bas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/_/gang zhig ngur smrig 'dzin byed pa/_/snyigs ma med pa 'dzin mi byed/_/ma skyes pa yang 'dzin pa med/_/ngur smrig gyon pa de yin no/_/ye shes gos ni bdag gis bzung /_/de ni nam 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]yang gos pa med/_/rtag tu'ang dri med rnam dag pa'i/_/ngur smrig bdag gis gyon pa yin/_/bdag gis nyon mongs thams cad spangs/_/bdag gis skra dag breg pa byas/_/ye shes kyis ni bdag gis bregs/_/de dag phyin cad skye mi 'gyur/_/lhung bzed bsam mi khyab 
[\[198b.2\]]las byung /_/chos rnams kun gyi snod yin te/_/gang ba med cing bri med de/_/chos rnams kun gyi snod yin no/_/bdag ni gzhan gyi man ngag la/_/nam yang gnas shing gnas 'gyur med/_/thams cad mkhyen cing rang 'byung 'gyur/_/bdag gi phun sum tshogs de yin/_/
[\[198b.3\]]chos kun mnyam mdzad sangs rgyas kyis/_/bdag la gsol ba mdzad zin te/_/'dren rnams gang nas gshegs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas lam nas 'gro bar bya/_/bdag gi rang byung de 'dra ste/_/bdag gi bslab pa de 'dra yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang de 'dra ste/_/gsol 
[\[198b.4\]]ba'i las ni de 'dra yin/_/spyod pa la ni de ring bslabs/_/nam zhig 'jig rten mgon thad du/_/zhing nas zhing du 'gro ba dag_/bdag gis kyang ni spyad par bya/_/byang chub snying por 'dug nas su/_/sbyin pa bsam mi khyab pa sbyin/_/gcig pus spyad par mi bya ste/_/bdag 
[\[198b.5\]]gis srog chags bye ba sbyin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung ba la rnam par gzigs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par gzigs ma thag tu yang de nas de nyid kyi tshe gos ngur smrig gyon zhing 'dug par gyur te/_skra bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa lta bur yang gyur 
[\[198b.6\]]to/_/skad cig de nyid la mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob bo/_/de nas gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba srung bas phyogs de nyid du 'dug nas mi snang bar gyur te/_de mi snang bar gyur ma thag tu sa chen po yang g.yos shing spu zing zhes byed pa dang bcas pa'i skrag par yang gyur/_lha dag 
[\[198b.7\]]kyang steng gi bar snang las rnga rdung zhing lha'i glu dbyangs len par yang gyur/_'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs su byung ste/_byung 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyi gtsug gi mtshams su nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs 
[\[199a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis zhus pa/_mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba sems can mchog_/spyod pa yon tan khyad par 'phags la gnas/_/rgyal ba ye shes ma chags pha rol gshegs/_/kun mkhyen rgyal ba bla na med la zhu/_/zhal nas 'od zer 
[\[199a.3\]]mang po byung nas su/_/'od kyis sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad khyab/_/sangs rgyas zhing de la ni bskor bgyis nas/_/de dag slar log nas kyang spyi gtsug nub/_/rgyu ma mchis par sangs rgyas 'dzum mi ston/_/de ring su yi don slad 'dzum de bstan/_/lung bstan de ni 
[\[199a.4\]]su yi lags par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag gi the tshom chod/_/gang gis 'dzum pa de 'dra bstan gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas zhing de thams cad snang bgyis pa'i/_/yangs pa'i don de su yi lags par 'gyur/_/ye shes mchog gis 'dir ni su lung ston/_/sangs 
[\[199a.5\]]rgyas zhing brgyan pa ni mdzes pa lags/_/sems can kun kyang bde bar gyur pa lags/_/'di la bag ma mchis par sems mi 'jug_/cho 'phrul de lta bu ni gda' lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[199a.6\]]kun dga' bo khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid na khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung ba gos ngur smrig gyon pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khye'u rnam par rgyal ba srung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[199a.7\]]mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar lus de nyid kyis 'dug go/_/de'i tshe ji srid par sangs rgyas kyi zhing der tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas lus de nyid kyis rgyal srid thob ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis da ltar 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rgyal srid thob pa bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas shi 'phos nas kyang lus de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing nam du yang sangs rgyas dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/_thams cad du lus thob pa des kyang rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[199b.2\]]de phyis kyang bskal pa grangs med pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_/'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas rnam par 
[\[199b.3\]]bsags zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po rnam par bsags pa'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur te/_bskal pa 'di snyed do zhes dpag pa'am/_bgrang ba'am/_bsam par mi nus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 
[\[199b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/_sems can de dag rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /_pad ma dag gi steng du skyil mo krung gis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni yon tan khyad par can dpag tu med 
[\[199b.5\]]pa gzhan dag gis kyang legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe rjes nas dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang rab tu 'byung ba la 
[\[199b.6\]]mngon par chas pa yin zhing /_/gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed la/_rnam pa thams cad kyis kyang rab tu 'byung ba rton par byed de/_rab tu byung nas kyang chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis rangs par byed cing /_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la yang 
[\[199b.7\]]dag par gzengs stod pa yin te/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos dang po de dang ldan na tshe rjes nas dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]kyis kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba'i phyir gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin te/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis pa de dang ldan na tshe rjes nas dge slong 
[\[200a.2\]]tshur shog ces bya ba'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang bzod pa dang des pa dang ldan pa yin zhing /_/gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs pa la 'god par byed pa yin la/_/bdag nyid kyang yo byad 
[\[200a.3\]]bsnyungs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa yin zhing /_gzhan dag kyang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa la 'jog par byed pa yin la/_/de bdag nyid kyang shes rab dang ldan pa yin zhing /_gzhan dag kyang shes rab phun sum tshogs pa la 'jog par byed pa yin te/_
[\[200a.4\]]kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos gsum pa de dang ldan na tshe rjes nas dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang thabs la mkhas shing smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin la/_gzhan dag 
[\[200a.5\]]kyang thabs la mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'jog par byed pa yin te/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dang ldan na tshe rjes nas dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob cing /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[200a.6\]]du 'gro la/_/thams cad du yang lus de nyid kyis rgyal srid 'thob cing der yang bag yod pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi nyams shing yongs su mi nyams pa yin te/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_/kun 
[\[200a.7\]]dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yang mngon par dga' ba yin/_chos rnams nyan pas kyang ngoms mi shes pa yin/_mi slu bas bden pa smra 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]ba yin te/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi nyams shing yongs su mi nyams pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/lhag pa'i 
[\[200b.2\]]bsam pas phun tshogs nas/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba tshol bar byed/_/chos rnams kyis ni chog mi shes/_/bden pa'i tshig la rab tu gnas/_/sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong nas/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa skyed par byed/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa shes nas su/_/
[\[200b.3\]]sems can rnams la chos ston 'gyur/_/de 'dra'i chos dag thos pa na/_/chos rnams kyis ni ngoms pa med/_/gang gis de yi shes 'phel ba/_/de la brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/_/rtag par bden tshig smra bar 'gyur/_/bden pa'i tshig la rab tu gnas/_/
[\[200b.4\]]ji ltar de ni tshig smra ba/_/de bzhin yin te gzhan du min/_/chos bzhi po ni de dag la/_/dus dus su ni sten par byed/_/byang chub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/mig gi dam pa 'phel bar byed/_/gang gi rnam smin dpag med cing /_/bsam mi khyab par bshad pa yi/_/
[\[200b.5\]]chos de 'dra ba thos nas su/_/chos rnams la ni su mi gnas/_/kun dga' bo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/_/dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur zhing lhas bskul ba yang thob la/_/sbyin gnas dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur zhing /_gal te sbyin 
[\[200b.6\]]gnas med par gyur na bdag nyid kyang sbyin gnas su byed pa yin te/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sems can yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par spro ba dang ldan pa yin/_de 
[\[200b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa la bsti stang bya ba spro ba dang ldan pa yin/_chos yongs su btsal bar spro ba dang ldan pa yin/_chos smra ba rnams la yang bde ba'i yo byad kyis nye bar gnas pa yin zhing /_sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong nas kyang mi 'jigs pas dbugs 'byin par byed 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]pa yin te/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshe rjes nas brjed mi ngas yin zhing sbyin gnas dang yang mi 'bral ba yin/_gal te sbyin gnas ma rnyed na yang bdag nyid sbyin gnas 
[\[201a.2\]]su byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la bsti stang byed/_/chos la'ang gus dang bcas pa yin/_/chos smra ba yi dge slong la'ang /_/gus dang bcas pas bsti stang byed/_/
[\[201a.3\]]sems can 'jigs pas gzir ba dang /_/'dren med sdug bsngal rnams mthong nas/_/de dag la ni 'jigs med sbyin/_/'jigs gzir de dag skyob par byed/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba thob par 'gyur/_/khyod longs brtson 'grus rtsoms 
[\[201a.4\]]shes ni/_/lha rnams dag kyang skul bar byed/_/gal te sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing /_/nyan thos kyang ni ma mthong la/_/'jig rten 'di yi sbyin pa'i gnas/_/rang sangs rgyas de ma mthong na/_/rang nyid mngon par byung nas su/_/khyim med par ni rab tu 
[\[201a.5\]]'byung /_/dgon pa zhi ba sten par byed/_/mngon shes lnga po myur du 'thob/_/mngon shes lnga po thob nas kyang /_/sa 'di kun tu rnam par rgyu/_/grong dang yul 'khor rnams song nas/_/sems can rnams ni chos 'dzin 'jug_/de las chos ni thos nas su/_/
[\[201a.6\]]'gro ba sdig pa spong bar byed/_/phyi nas sdig pa'i las can min/_/sems can gus dang bcas par 'gyur/_/der ni mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/chos kyi mchog gis de mchog ltar/_/de bzhin 'di la bdag bya snyam/_/de yi thad du rab tu 'byung /_/rang gis chos ni 
[\[201a.7\]]spyod pa na/_/gzhan dag dang ni bdag nyid kyi/_/de 'dra ba yi yon tan 'byung /_/su zhig rtag tu chos mi spyod/_/de bas byang chub yongs tshol bas/_/chos de dag ni kun tu spyad/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/_/de ni nyams par 'gyur ma yin/_/ngas kyang 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]sngon chad de dag bsten/_/de phyir nga ni mchog tu 'phags/_/chos de la ni mngon bslabs nas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/nga ni 'jig rten rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/nga ni 'jig rten bla na med/_/ye shes bla na med pa yi/_/chos ston byed pa a la la/_/
[\[201b.2\]]kun dga' bo de lta bas na rnam grangs des na ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de dag la gnas shing 'di lta ste/_/chos rnams kyis don byed pa yin pa de lta bur rig par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med par gyur pa 
[\[201b.3\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na nam mkha' yongs su zin pa 'dir rgyal po phyogs rab sgrogs zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po phyogs rab sgrogs kyi chung ma dam pa gtso mo las bu zhig btsas par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo gzhon nu de btsas ma thag tu 'jig rten du sems can chos 
[\[201b.4\]]spyod pa zhig byung ngo /_/zhes lha rnams kyis sgra skad 'thun par bsgrags so/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu des sgra de thos nas ci 'di chos shig yin nam/_'on te chos ma yin snyam nas kun tu sngangs par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po'i gzhon nu skyes nas lo bdun lon pa 
[\[201b.5\]]lta bu de rgyal po phyogs rab sgrogs de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po phyogs rab sgrogs la smras pa/_yab 'di ci chos shig lags sam 'on te chos ma lags/_de nas 
[\[201b.6\]]rgyal po des gzhon nu la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_srog gcod pa yi sdig pa spangs nas su/_/sbyin pa dul ba tshangs spyod yang dag sdom/_/des dang tshul khrims yon tan rab gnas pa/_/chos de 'phags pa rnams kyis bstod pa yin/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po'i 
[\[201b.7\]]gzhon nu des pha de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_yab cig bdag la chos gang gsungs pa de/_/rgyal srid 'dzam gling de ni rab ston pa/_/khyim pas chos de bsten par nus lags sam/_/bdag gis zhus pa de ni lung bstan gsol/_/gal te de nus lags na bdag la 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]gsungs/_/gal te bdag gis nus na khyod kyis gsungs/_/bden pa smra ba sems can dmyal mi mchi/_/de dag ngan 'gro'ang kun tu sten mi 'gyur/_/mi bden smra ba ngan 'gror mchi bar 'gyur/_/mnar med phyin cing sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_/de phyir mi bden pa 
[\[202a.2\]]dag spangs nas su/_/bden tshig bden pa bdag la gsung du gsol/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po phyogs rab sgrogs kyis rgyal po'i gzhon nu de la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis smras pa/_rgyal srid 'dzam gling de ni rab ston pa/_/chos rnams mtha' dag bsten par nus ma yin/_/
[\[202a.3\]]dbyug pa mtshon gyis sa ni rab bstan na/_/gzhon nu gang du de la chos 'byung 'gyur/_/srog chags rnams la nga yis gnod spyo bya/_/nga yis bsgo ba myur du mi byed pa/_/de ni longs spyod phrogs shing chad pas bcad/_/phyis kyang btson rar rab tu gzhug par bya/_/sa bzang blta ba'i phyir 
[\[202a.4\]]ni mngon par 'byung /_/de tshe grong rdal pa dag skrag par 'gyur/_/rgyal po 'ong zhes skrag pa 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/de dag phyogs phyogs su ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe nga ni chos la 'dug gyur tshe/_/lha 'di nongs pa 'byung ba'i mi lags na/_/ji ltar lhas mkhyen chad pas chod cig 
[\[202a.5\]]ces/_/nga la 'bul zhing nges par 'bul bar byed/_/nga yis nyes pa byung ba de ma shes/_/gzhan gyi don gyi phyir ni sdig pa byas/_/ci nas phyin cad nga yi bstan pa la/_/de dag sdig mi byed par rdegs chings sod/_/de la bslabs nas gzhan dag byed gyur na/_/de ltar nga yi 
[\[202a.6\]]yul 'khor sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/tshar bcad nas ni de la chad pas bcad/_/de las grong rdal ba dag 'jigs par 'gyur/_/rgyal po gtum zhing mi rnams drag po yin/_/de yis 'phral du srog chags 'jigs par byed/_/gnod pa byed tshe de la snying rje skye/_/rnam par rgyal la ma 
[\[202a.7\]]chags ston par 'gyur/_/de tshe gzhon nus tshig ni thos nas su/_/phyogs rab sgrogs la tshigs bcad 'di dag smras/_/skyo ba thob cing sdug bsngal gyur pa lags/_/yab cig bdag ni chos la sten par 'tshal/_/yab cig bdag 'dir rgyal srid don mi gnyer/_/gzhan gyi don gyi 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]phyir ni sdig bgyid 'gyur/_/yab yum dang ni rgyal srid spangs nas su/_/yab cig bdag ni chos yongs btsal bar 'tshal/_/yab cig gal te bdag gtong mi mdzad na/_/nga nyid bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus bgyi'o yab/_/dug btung ri las g.yang du dor bar bgyi/_/
[\[202b.2\]]mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus kyang bgyi'o yab/_/rgyal pos tshig de thos nas mi dgar gyur/_/bu khyod nga tshig 'di 'dra 'di nyon cig_/gzhon nu khyod kyis rtag par 'dod pa spyod/_/nga yis rgyal srid de ni bsten par bya/_/bu khyod khyim nas mngon par ma 'byung shig_/bu cig skyed 
[\[202b.3\]]mos tshal du rtse dga' byos/_/longs spyod yangs shing mang po khyod la sbyin/_/bu khyod rab tu byung bas ci 'gyur snyam/_/'dod pa mdzes pa rim gyis spyad par byos/_/longs spyod zad par gyur nas rab tu byung /_/'di la ji srid skyon nyung shes nas su/_/tshe thung nyid na mya 
[\[202b.4\]]ngan 'das pa bskyed/_/'dod pa bsten pas ngoms par 'gyur ma lags/_/skyon dang tha ba'i las ni bskyed par bgyid/_/skyon med mngon 'byung chos ni spyad par bgyi/_/srog chags rnams la phan phyir byams pa sten/_/dgon pa'i gnas su gcig pu gnas par bgyi/_/
[\[202b.5\]]de las bde ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/tshul khrims gnas pas tshangs spyod zhi bar 'gyur/_/de phyir dgon pa brgya ni bsten par bgyi/_/bdag gi slad bzhin yab khyod rab tu byung /_/khyod la yul 'khor grong rdal ci zhig bgyi/_/gzhan gyi don du sdig pa bgyis pas ni/_/
[\[202b.6\]]ngan song gnas shing sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_/de yi tshe na 'jigs pa chen po yi/_/lcags kyi thu lum chen po gsol cig yab/_/sdig bgyis mi mnyam pa ni spyad pas na/_/sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_/lus la lcags kyi phur bus btab 
[\[202b.7\]]nas su/_/de tshe lcags kyi sgo glegs steng nas 'joms/_/gang dag de lus kun nas 'joms pa yi/_/lcags kyi gshol dag der ni kun nas 'byung /_/rab drag las can ser skya ljang ku skras/_/khas bub bum pa'i nang du rab tu 'jug_/lcags kyi gtun dag gis 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]kyang skrag par 'gyur/_/lo grangs mang por tshor ba bzod par bgyid/_/der ni de yang 'chi dus bgyid mi 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i las kyis 'dzin par bgyid pa lags/_/las bas nas ni thar pa 'thob lags te/_sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu de 'dra 
[\[203a.2\]]lags/_/gang tshe lus der 'chi ba 'byung ba'i tshe/_/me 'obs rab tu 'jigs par de dag 'jug_/de dag gis ni lus de rab tu 'bar/_/de tshe rab 'jigs me yis zil gyis non/_/gang tshe me yi 'obs las thar gyur tshe/_/rab 'jigs kun 'bar kun tu rab 'bar ba'i/_/
[\[203a.3\]]brag ri che mtho la ni 'dzeg par 'gyur/_/de tshe de dag mi gtsang 'dam du 'jug_/rab 'jigs kun 'bar kun tu rab 'bar zhing /_/de tshe khab 'dra'i kha yis za ba yis/_/de tshe lo ni bye bar zhugs nas su/_/brgya la de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/_/de tshe de na'ang 'jigs 
[\[203a.4\]]pa'i mda' tshal mchis/_/der ni shin tu mchog tu sdug bsngal ltung /_/ral gri'i so 'dra'i lo ma rab 'jigs pa/_/kun 'bar kun tu rab 'bar dag gis gcod/_/tshal der rab tu zhugs pa tsam gyis kyang /_/phyogs bzhi dag nas rlung gi phung po 'byung /_/gang phyir rlung 
[\[203a.5\]]bskyod ral gri 'khrugs nas su/_/de yis lus ni kun nas rab tu 'dra la/_/gang tshe tshal de nas ni mngon byung tshe/_/der ni 'jigs pa chen po'i tshal du 'jug_/de tshe ral gri'i so 'dra'i lo mas 'gums/_/spu gri'i so 'dra dag gis 'byin par 'gyur/_/ral gri'i tshal rab 
[\[203a.6\]]'jigs par zhugs tsam gyis/_/phyogs bzhi dag nas 'jigs pa'i rlung ldang 'gyur/_/rlung bskyod de dag ral gri lo mas chod/_/de tshe lus ni dum bu dum bur 'chad/_/de tshe de dag lus la gcod pa na/_/rlung gis 'phangs pa'i ral gri lhung 'gyur zhing /_/lus la ral gri 'dab 
[\[203a.7\]]ma zhugs par 'gyur/_/de dag de na sdug bsngal tshor ba myong /_/lo ni mang por sdug bsngal myong nas su/_/de dag 'gyur byed chu klung rab tshar 'jug_/lo ni mang por sdug bsngal myong nas su/_/'gyur byed chu klung tsha myur 'bab par 'gyur/_/zab mo glong stong 'bab par bgyid pa yi/_/
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]zangs dang lcags bskol ba ni 'bab pa der/_/mi ni gzhol bas 'bab cing 'chi bar 'gyur/_/rba glong shugs kyis 'bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/rba glong chen po'i shugs kyis rab 'bab cing /_/de na 'jigs pa'i chu klung der 'jug 'gyur/_/gting ma slebs par 'bab pas 'chi bar 
[\[203b.2\]]'gyur/_/sdug bsngal de ni lta bar su zhig 'tshal/_/gang tshe rgal bar gyur pa de yi tshe/_/'gram na gnas pa'i srin po drag 'jigs pa/_/so gtsigs ljang khu dmar ser skra can gyis/_/brgyugs nas 'bros par byed pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/bzung nas grogs po ci za bstan par 
[\[203b.3\]]gyis/_/khyod ni ci 'dod ces kyang 'dri bar bgyid/_/bdag ni zas shig bza' bar 'tshal lags te/_/bdag ni bkres zhes tshig tu smra bar 'gyur/_/mchog rab 'jigs de dag gis myur bzung nas/_/lcags kyi sa steng du ni bor nas su/_/gang dag lus bshig nas ni sar 
[\[203b.4\]]ltung ba'i/_/lcags kyi thu lum de dag der sbyin 'gyur/_/khong du 'bar zhing phyi rol rab 'bar bas/_/bsreg cing btso'o zhes ni tshig tu smra/_/der ni 'gyur byed chu klung sdug bsngal ltung /_/chu 'di chu grang snyam du sems par bgyid/_/phyis kyang mi gtsang 'dam du 'jug par 'gyur/_/
[\[203b.5\]]ri dang spu gri'i sa 'dra de de bzhin/_/rab tu 'jigs pa'i me 'obs de de bzhin/_/yang dang yang du tshor ba de myong 'gyur/_/khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di rtag ma lags yab/_/dbang phyug yun ring rjes su 'jug ma lags/_/srog dang rgyal srid de bzhin 'dod pa dang /_/thams cad mi rtag 
[\[203b.6\]]ces ni rgyal bas gsungs/_/de slad bdag gi tshig bzhin mdzod cig yab/_/thams cad spangs nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod/_/'di nas shi 'phos bde 'gro rnams su dgyes/_/sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur ro yab/_/tshul khrims bsam gtan gnas 
[\[203b.7\]]shing sems rab byams/_/rab dben dgon pa zhi bar gnas par 'gyur/_/bdag dang mtshungs par su yang ma dgongs shig_/der khyod tshangs pa lta bur 'gyur ba lags/_/de la de ltar rjes bstan gzhon nu ni/_/rgyal srid kun spangs yang dag rab tu byung /_/phyogs rab sgrogs 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]dang ma yang de bzhin te/_/de la bar chad su yang byed pa med/_/bsam gtan bde ba rjes su spyod byed cing /_/de rab byung nas chos ni yongs su btsal/_/mngon par shes thob drang srong rgyal por gyur/_/'jig rten phan phyir chos ni rab tu ston/_/bdag med 
[\[204a.2\]]chos rnams rab tu bstan pas na/_/de yi sems zhi yid kyang rab tu zhi/_/de la bdag med bdag gi'ang yod ma yin/_/bdag ces chos ni nam yang dmigs ma yin/_/chos de drang srong rgyal pos bstan pas na/_/chos de thams cad ma bcings ma grol ba/_/gang la sems 
[\[204a.3\]]can med cing bdag gi med/_/de la soms shig tshul bzhin so sor rtogs/_/drang srong rgyal po'i chos ni thos nas su/_/der ni brgya stong mang po dong bar gyur/_/de tshe rgyal po phyogs rab sgrogs rab byung /_/de yi bstan la ma yang rab tu byung /_/drang srong thad du de dag rab 
[\[204a.4\]]byung nas/_/gang dag chos de 'dra ba byung ba dang /_/chos gang de la drang srong zhugs gyur pa/_/de nyid bdag gis kyang ni thob bya snyam/_/drang srong gis ni ji ltar bstan slob cing /_/'di la de kun byang chub mchog tu zhugs/_/de dag kun kyang sangs rgyas nges par gyur/_/de tshe 
[\[204a.5\]]byang chub sangs rgyas thams cad zhi/_/de tshe rgyal bu de ni gzhan zhig snyam/_/gang gis chos de rjes su bstan nas su/_/chos kun tshol zhing rab tu byung bde'ang /_/kun dga' 'di la khyod ni the tshom na/_/kun dga' khyod ni the tshom ma za cig_/de tshe nga ni rgyal bu der gyur to/_/
[\[204a.6\]]nga yis mi rnams kyi ni don chen byas/_/nga yis de dag theg pa mchog la'ang bkod/_/de tshe chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/_/nga ni nam yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur/_/ngas ni nam yang 'dun pa btang ma gyur/_/nga yis rtag par brtan par rjes su bsgoms/_/nga yis 
[\[204a.7\]]chos de dag ni rtag par bsten/_/nga yis nam yang le lo byas ma gyur/_/nga yis byang chub thob par mi nus shes/_/nga ni nam yang zhi la som nyi med/_/nga yi byang chub 'dun pa rtag par byung /_/nga yis brtson 'grus dam pa rtag par bsten/_/nga yis legs bshad chos ni rtag par 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]btsal/_/des na nga yi dga' ba bla med gyur/_/de phyir gang zhig byang chub 'dod byed pa/_/ji ltar ngas bslabs de bzhin slob byed na/_/slob pa byang chub las ni nyams mi 'gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar 'gyur/_/mngon par 'byung ba yang dag par brjod pa'i le'u ste 
[\[204b.2\]]bcu gcig pa'o//_//kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dran pa dang ldan pa yin/_rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin/_blo dang ldan pa yin/_cho ga dang spyod yul dang spyod pa dang ldan pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[204b.3\]]dpa' chos de lta bu de dag yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/_rnyed nas kyang chos de dag la sgrub pa yin/_bdag nyid kyang chos la gnas nas de nyid la skye bo mang po yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas kyang chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis 
[\[204b.4\]]rangs par byed cing yang dag par gzengs stod pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang dag de yi bde 'dren pa'i/_/chos de dag ni yongs su tshol/_/de 'dra'i chos dag ma rnyed par/_/de ni brtson 'grus 'dor mi bya/_/de 'dra'i 
[\[204b.5\]]chos dag thos nas mang du thos pas 'jal/_/rtag tu chos la gnas shing ji skad bshad la slob/_/bdag de ji ltar gnas bzhin gzhan dag chos la dgod/_/gang dag chos 'dir gnas la ci yang 'doms mi byed/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gis chos 
[\[204b.6\]]de dag thos nas nub par gyur na mi rung zhing /_bdag gis chos kha cig chud gzan par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos de lta bu de dag gi don gyi phyir rtag tu chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang dag 
[\[204b.7\]]dge slong rtag sten pa/_/de dag mang du thos par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rgyal pos bkur ba yin/_/de dag 'di na nga yi rjes su 'brang /_/nga la chos rnams ma thos don rnams ma shes par/_/nub par 'gyur zhing phyi nas gzhan las thos mi 'thob/_/de tshe brtson 'grus brtan por shes nas 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]las kun 'dor/_/gang gis shes pa rnam 'phel nges pa'i chos rnams tshol/_/dge slong mkhas pa shes rab can/_/rgyal bas bkur rnams sten par byed/_/mang du thos nas yid gzhungs pa/_/de 'dra'i mdo sde tshol bar byed/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[205a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar kun chub par byas pa'i chos rnams gzhan la ston par byed kyang chos las nyams pa ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos las nyams pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zab mo stong pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[205a.3\]]pa'i chos de dag bstan kyang chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad la gnas nas ston par byed pa yin/_zang zing sngon du btang ste ston par byed pa yin/_ci nas gzhan dag la chos de dag bstan kyang de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa ma 
[\[205a.4\]]yin te/_kun dga' bo de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni chos las nyams pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/de 'dra'i chos dag thos nas su/_/skye bo mang la rgyas byed kyang /_/bdag nyid nyams par mi 'gyur bar/_/srog 
[\[205a.5\]]don gnyer bas ston par byed/_/de phyir legs zhes bya ba yang /_/nam yang btsal bar bya ma yin/_/gzhan du snying rje don gnyer bas/_/chos kyi dam pa ston par byed/_/sems can rnams la brtse byas shing /_/skye bo mang la snying rje nas/_/de 'dra'i chos ni ston par byed/_/srog 
[\[205a.6\]]chags rnams la snying brtser byed/_/gang zhig rnyed pa yongs tshol bas/_/de 'dra'i chos ni ston byed dang /_/gang zhig de yis chos tshol bas/_/de ni chos las nyams pa yin/_/ji ltar bshad pa'i chos la ni/_/mkhas pa de bzhin gnas par byed/_/de ni rnyed pas nyams mi 'gyur/_/
[\[205a.7\]]rtag tu chos ni rab tu 'dzin/_/legs par chos ni ston byed cing /_/chos la yang ni rab gnas pa/_/'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas des/_/de la legs zhes bya ba sbyin/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos yongs su tshol bar byed pa yin te/_
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]de ni chos smra ba de'i snyigs ma 'dzin pa ma yin/_nyes par bzung ba 'dzin pa ma yin/_chos kyi tshul yongs su btsal ba la rab tu gnas pa yin/_de ni chos la 'jug pa'i sems kyis chos yongs su tshol bar byed pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul 
[\[205b.2\]]yongs su btsal ba la gnas pa yin zhe na/_gang gi tshe mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dag gi bsgo ba'i tshul la rab tu gnas pa yin/_des byas pa yang byed pa yin/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams la spro bar spyod 
[\[205b.3\]]pa yin te/_kun dga' bo de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos yongs su tshol ba la gnas pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/de ni de na chos rnams tshol/_/de ni klan ka tshol mi byed/_/gzhan la ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/_/
[\[205b.4\]]de bzhin de ni rab gnas 'gyur/_/de na chos ni yongs tshol bas/_/ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas par byed/_/dpa' bo de ni chos gnas nas/_/rtag tu chos la'ang sten par byed/_/de phyir chos ni yongs tshol bas/_/ji ltar bshad bzhin gnas par byed/_/gang zhig chos la rab 
[\[205b.5\]]gnas pa/_/de ni chos kyi dang po yin/_/ji ltar nga yis reg bzhin du/_/de nas chos la reg par 'gyur/_/chos de dag la bsten nas kyang /_/bla na med pa'i byang chub thob/_/nga yis gang las thos pa la/_/ston par 'du shes kun shes nas/_/rtag tu chos ni yongs tshol bas/_/
[\[205b.6\]]chos rnams la ni gus par byas/_/gang gis nga ni lam gnas pa/_/de ni nga yi slob dpon yin/_/de ni nga yi bde 'dren pa/_/de ni nga yi mig sbyong ba'o/_/de ni nga yi ston yin pas/_/nga ni rtag par gus par gnas/_/nga ni de la brten nas su/_/'jig rten tha mar bde ba 
[\[205b.7\]]yin/_/bskal pa dag ni grangs med pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab yangs pa na/_/sngon gyi dus su de bzhin gshegs/_/lhun po'i rgyal po byung bar 'gyur/_/lhun rgyal mya ngan 'das nas su/_/nyan thos mdzangs pa byung bar gyur/_/mkhas pa'ang yin zhing shes rab che/_/chos mang lung 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ni 'bogs par byed/_/zab mo'i don la nges pa'ang yin/_/phung po khams la rnam par mkhas/_/'dul ba yi ni pha rol son/_/chos mngon pa la'ang mkhas pa yin/_/bslab pa gsum po rnams la bslabs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'dzin par byed/_/sangs rgyas lhun 
[\[206a.2\]]po'i rgyal po yis/_/de ni byin rlabs de byung gyur/_/sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la zhugs/_/zab mo la yang mkhas pa yin/_/mdzangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mtha'/_/nye bar bstan par nus ma yin/_/rgyal khyim me tog can du ni/_/tshong dpon nor chen byung bar gyur/_/longs 
[\[206a.3\]]spyod phung pos yangs pa yin/_/bsod nams gzi yis gzi brjid byas/_/mang pos mchod 'os zhes bya ba/_/de ni de na byung bar gyur/_/khrims ldan yon tan phun sum tshogs/_/bzang ldan rnam par grags pa byung /_/de tshe tshong dpon bzang ldan yang /_/mdzangs pa'i thad du nye bar 
[\[206a.4\]]song /_/shes rab chen po thos mang des/_/de la chos ni bstan pa byas/_/grags dang ldan pa mdzangs pa las/_/de yis dam chos de thos nas/_/longs spyod phung po mtha' yas dang /_/chos de thams cad sogs par byed/_/gang khyod gtong ba de 'dra ni/_/tshong dpon khyod kyis 
[\[206a.5\]]dad pa legs/_/gang thos nas ni rnam shes pa/_/de ni chos kyi gter yin no/_/de tshe tshong dpon bzang ldan yang /_/mdzangs pa yi ni phyi bzhin gnas/_/lo ni mang po mi nyung bar/_/de ni de na rjes su 'brang /_/chos smra ba la tshong dpon de'ang /_/lo ni nyi shur rjes 'brang bas/_/de 
[\[206a.6\]]las chos rnams nyan byed pas/_/de ni nyan pas ngoms pa med/_/skye bo mang po bsnyen bkur gyis/_/rtag tu spro bar zhugs gyur kyang /_/de yi sems la nam yang ni/_/yongs su gdung ba byung ma gyur/_/dus tshod gcig tu mdzangs pa la/_/gser ni bye ba phrag nyi shu/_/tshang bar 
[\[206a.7\]]'bul bar byed par gyur/_/de tshe mdzangs pa spyod par byed/_/de 'dra ba yi dus tshod du/_/de la gser gyi phung po 'gro/_/de 'dra'i bsnyen bkur byas pas na/_/de yi phyir yang dga' bar gyur/_/phyi nas dus tshod stong du ni/_/dge slong re re'i thad du 'gro/_/mdzangs pa yis ni chos smras pa/_/
[\[206b\]]
