[\[226a.6\]]yin mi rnams myos par 'gyur/_/nga yi spyod yul gang dang gnas pa gang /_/de mthong dga' ba su zhig skyed mi byed/_/de dag nga yi spyod yul shes nas su/_/de dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_/de tshe mos pa sna tshogs chos smra rnams/_/de dag nga yi spyod yul kun mi shes/_/gang gis kun 
[\[226a.7\]]mkhyen spyod yul mi shes pa/_/de dag chos kyi tshig nyung ston par byed/_/de dag gi ni dmigs pa gang yang med/_/mthong nas de dag yid la gnod par 'gyur/_/gang dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid de shes pa/_/de dag yid la nam yang gnod pa med/_/'di ltar chos mnyam nyid kyi spyod 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]yul la/_/de dag thams cad rab tu gnas pa yin/_/gang dag nga yi mdun na thal sbyar cing /_/'khod pa'i dge slong brgyad 'di ma gtogs pa/_/blo gros brtan pa phyi ma'i dus na 'dir/_/mdo sde 'di 'dzin su yang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di dag rtag tu yang /_/'das pa'i 
[\[226b.2\]]sangs rgyas mtshungs med spyod yul yin/_/de dag rtag par sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de dag chos kyi snod du gyur pa yin/_/de tshe byang chub sems ni yang dag len/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag par bsngags pa'ang yin/_/ji ltar de dag nga yi mdun 'khod pa/_/de bzhin 'das pa'i dus 
[\[226b.3\]]na'ang ngas shes te/_/de dag gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/rgyal ba de dag rnams kyi spyan sngar 'khod/_/de yi 'og tu lnga brgya 'khod pa yin/_/byang chub mchog de ngas kyang gzung bar bya/_/phyi dus rgyal ba'i ye shes de dag yin/_/brtan pa'i blo gros khyod kyang de la dpa'/_/gang dag 
[\[226b.4\]]chos kun gzung phyir zhugs pa ni/_/gzhan yang dpa' bo dung phyur phrag brgyad do/_/ngas kyang der ni chos mnyan bya ba yin/_/thos par gyur nas kyang ni chos de la/_/gnas par bya ste spyod pa mi zhan pa/_/de yi tshe na bstan par bya ba yin/_/de tshe ston pas byang chub mchog lung 
[\[226b.5\]]bstan/_/rang rang lung bstan pa ni thos nas su/_/dung phyur phrag brgyad dga' bas khyab gyur nas/_/ta la bdun srid mngon par 'phags par gyur/_/'jig rten mgon pos kun dga' bka' stsal pa/_/phyi ma'i dus tshe sdig pa can der ni/_/chos 'di 'dzin par spro zhing nus 
[\[226b.6\]]gyur tam/_/mi spro zhes ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol/_/mkhyen bzhin rgyal ba 'od srung bka' stsal pa/_/'od srung chos 'di 'dzin par byed 'gyur ram/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas chos zung shig_/mi spro lags so zhes te 'od srung song /_/stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di 
[\[226b.7\]]skye bo dang /_/rgya mtsho ri dang nags tshal bcas gzung zhing /_/khur gzhan mang po bskur bar spro lags kyi/_/khur 'di bskur bar bdag ni mi spro lags/_/slad ma'i dus na su zhig chos 'dzin lags/_/de nyid dge slong shin tu dbang bgyi dka'/_/rjes su bstan pa 'di la gnas mi 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]bgyid/_/'jig rten 'dren pa mya ngan 'das ci smos/_/'od srung khyod ni rgas 'khogs gyur to zhes/_/slad dus bdag gi tshig bzhin yong mi bgyid/_/bdag gi rjes su bstan la gnas mi 'gyur/_/bdag cag 'di ni mkhas shing don sems snyam/_/snyan dngags 
[\[227a.2\]]'jig rten rgyang phan sems pa lags/_/de bzhin 'jig rten sgra yis gnas pa lags/_/bsam gtan de bzhin ting nge 'dzin spangs nas/_/de dag 'jig rten pa la spyod par 'gyur/_/rgyas pa che dang grags pa chen po lags/_/rtag tu 'jig rten gyis kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[227a.3\]]de dag bdag gis nam yang brtag mi nus/_/skyon rnams dam po dag ni mthong lags so/_/bdag ni gcig pur dgon par gnas pa na/_/lha zhig mchis nas bdag la 'di skad brjod/_/chos de 'dra bar rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan/_/'phags pa'i chos la sems can mang po btul/_/
[\[227a.4\]]dge slong bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin la mkhas/_/rnam thar rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi pha rol phyin/_/thos nas brgya byin dga' bar 'gyur ba lags/_/de ring de la ngo mtshar ci mchis smra/_/phyi dus bdag gi thad du de mchis nas/_/de tshe yid mi bde bas ngu zhing ston/_/'od srung deng ni bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur/_/de thos bdag ni 
[\[227a.5\]]yid mi bde bar 'gyur/_/mang du 'chad par yang ni spro ma lags/_/mdo sde de ni 'dzin par spro ma lags/_/der ni de dag zhum par 'gyur ba lags/_/dge slong mchog tu bka' blo mi bde 'gyur/_/de tshe der ni lha tshogs 'du bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung bka' stsal pa/_/chos kyi 
[\[227a.6\]]tshul ni 'dzin par mi nus par/_/'od srung de ni nga yis snga nas shes/_/mdo sde de 'dra de ni gang 'dzin pa/_/nga yi nyan thos gang yang 'di na med/_/gang dag mdo sde de 'dra de 'dzin pa/_/nga yis gang dag byin rlabs der ma gtogs/_/gang dag phyi nas the tshom med 'gyur ba/_/de dag the tshom 
[\[227a.7\]]de ni nga yis gcad/_/gzhan dag las ni mthu che gang yin pa/_/mdo sde de la ci phyir sngon ma spyad/_/de dag 'dzin pa'i dge slong gsar bu gzhon/_/mdo sde de dag rgyas pa chen po yin/_/gang dag chos de 'dra ba de mi 'dzin/_/'di la ji ltar pha rol phyin par 'gyur/_/brtan pa'i blo gros nga yis 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]bstan pa na/_/gang dag gis ni de ring nga mthong 'gyur/_/de dag phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe/_/chos de thos nas dga' ba thob par 'gyur/_/nga ni dmigs pa 'ba' zhig 'chad pa yin/_/'jigs med nga yi tshig der dad par byos/_/gang gi 'di na ston pa mthong gyur pa/_/de 
[\[227b.2\]]dag chos de 'dzin par spro bar 'gyur/_/ye shes de 'dra de ni tshol byed cing /_/de tshe 'dren pa rnams la mchod par byed/_/ring bsrel mchod dang de bzhin mchod rten mchod/_/'jigs med de dag der ni byed par 'gyur/_/yongs su gtad pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bco 
[\[227b.3\]]lnga pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_de ji ltar 
[\[227b.4\]]gzung bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya bar zung shig bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi gnas zhes bya bar yang zung shig
[\[227b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub sems dpas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_byang 
[\[227b.6\]]chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya 
[\[227b.7\]]ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de legs kyi sdes bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang /_dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]{D102}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sang g+hA TI sU tra d+har+m+ma par+yA ya/_bod skad du/_'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs/_bam po dang po/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[228a.2\]]rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong sum khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang /_
[\[228a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bzang dpal dang /_tshe dang ldan pa tsan dan dpal dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dug sel dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' sde dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge slong sum khri nyis stong dang 
[\[228a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[228a.5\]]chen po gzhon nur gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'bri dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_
[\[228a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na sdug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sde dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug khri nyis stong dang /_lha'i bu khri nyis stong 
[\[228a.7\]]la 'di lta ste/_lha'i bu srid sgrub dang /_lha'i bu bzang po dang /_lha'i bu shin tu bzang po dang /_lha'i bu chos 'dod dang /_lha'i bu tsan dan snying po dang /_lha'i bu tsan dan gnas dang /_lha'i bu tsan dan dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong dang /_lha'i bu mo brgyad stong la 'di lta ste/_
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]lha'i bu mo rnga ldan dang /_lha'i bu mo mdzes ldan dang /_lha'i bu mo bdag nyid che ldan dang /_lha'i bu mo mig dpal dang /_lha'i bu mo skye dgu'i bdag mo gnas pa dang /_lha'i bu mo stobs 'dzin dang /_lha'i bu mo nor dpal dang /_lha'i bu mo lag pa bzang ldan dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu 
[\[228b.2\]]mo brgyad stong dang /_klu'i rgyal po brgyad stong la 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang /_klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po nya mid dang /_klu'i rgyal po bum pa'i snying po dang /_klu'i rgyal po bum pa mgo dang /_klu'i rgyal po dge byed dang /_klu'i rgyal po shin tu dga' ba 
[\[228b.3\]]dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_klu'i rgyal po glang po'i mgo dang /_de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po'i khab ga la ba dang /_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas 
[\[228b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las 
[\[228b.5\]]langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha bye ba dang /_lha'i bu mo bye ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[228b.6\]]bye ba mang po dag 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos bye ba mang po dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang chos nyan pa'i slad du 'dus nas 'khod cing mchis na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rgan pa rnams ni 
[\[228b.7\]]thos ma thag tu las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gzhon nu rnams ni dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par brtson zhing khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i chos rnams las mi nyams yongs su mi nyams shing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]tshul la 'jug pa de legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu dpa' ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni kun 
[\[229a.2\]]tu dpa' ba legs so legs so/_/kun tu dpa' ba khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[229a.3\]]'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu dpa' ba zung zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang da ltar yang 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod pa zhig yod de/_gang la la zhig zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las rnams byang zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[229a.4\]]chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang dag gis zung gi mdo 'di thos pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de snyed bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam na yang kun tu dpa' ba de ltar mi blta'o/_/kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_
[\[229a.5\]]'o na ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi bsod 
[\[229a.6\]]nams kyi phung po yang de snyed bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 
[\[229a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad kyis dge ba'i chos gang dag 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag la bdud sdig can gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba gang dag zung gi mdo 'di thos pa de dag 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad de'i tshe stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[229b.2\]]gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad nyon cig_/'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i thigs pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang /_
[\[229b.3\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni sangs rgyas gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang ngo /_/gang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can 
[\[229b.4\]]rnams ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas kyang ches mang du bskyed par gyur te de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' ba de'i tshe de'i dus na gang tshig 'di thos nas spro ba chen por 'gyur ba de ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bskyed par 
[\[229b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang chos kyis yongs su skom par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang 
[\[229b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu dpa' ba sems can gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyis yongs su skom pa yin te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_kun tu dpa' ba 'di lta ste/_gcig ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o/_/
[\[229b.7\]]kun tu dpa' ba gnyis pa ni gang chos thos nas sems can thams cad la mtshungs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thos nas sems can thams cad la mtshungs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa gang lags/_
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba gcig ni chos thos nas byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_nam byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de na sems can thams cad kyi phyir chos kyis yongs su skom pa yin no/_/kun tu dpa' ba gnyis pa ni gang theg pa chen po la 
[\[230a.2\]]'jug pa ste/_rtag tu yang chos kyis yongs su skom pa yin no/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_mi dang /_lha'i bu mo bye ba stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang chos kyis yongs 
[\[230a.3\]]su skom zhing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las langs nas/_
[\[230a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la 
[\[230a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba sems can gang dag 'dir lhags nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yongs su sgrub pa grub par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' 
[\[230a.6\]]bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis na sems can 'dir lhags pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems 
[\[230a.7\]]pa ni legs so legs so/_/kun tu dpa' ba de'i phyir 'di la yongs su bsngo ba'i khyad par nyon cig_/kun tu dpa' ba sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal zhes 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/kun tu dpa' ba de'i tshe de'i dus na nga bram ze'i khye'u zhig tu gyur te/_ngas 
[\[230b.2\]]sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la so sor bkod pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe de'i dus na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]su gyur nas/_ngas de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di skad du da ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gang la la sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gzir bar gyur pa de dag thams cad nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig
[\[230b.3\]]de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la so sor dgod par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag gis kyang tshig de thos nas de bzhin du gyur cig ces de skad smras te/_kun tu dpa' ba dge ba'i rtsa ba des na sems can de dag 'dir lhags te/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[230b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas bcom ldan 'das las spro ba chen po thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gi tshe'i tshad ji srid cig 
[\[230b.5\]]thub par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad cu thub par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bskal pa'i tshad ji tsam lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[230b.6\]]kyi bu nyon cig_/'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig gis ra ba chu zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis la 'phang du dpag tshad gsum pa zhig brtsigs te/_ra ba de'i nang til gyi 'bru sha stag gis yongs su gang bar byas la/_de nas mi des lo stong 'das shing ra ba til gyi 'brus yongs su gang ba de las til 
[\[230b.7\]]gyi 'bru gcig phyi rol tu bor te/_de lta bu'i tshul du mi des til gyi 'bru de dag thams cad zad par byas la ra ba de'i rmang yang med gzhi yang med par gyur du zin kyang bskal pa ni zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_dper na ri rngams su dpag tshad lnga bcu/_'phang du dpag tshad bcu 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gnyis pa zhig yod la/_de nas mi la la zhig gis ri de'i ngos la khyim brtsigs te dus ring po lo brgya 'das shing ka shi ka'i ras kyis lan cig phyis te de ltar byas pas ri de zad par gyur du zin kyang bskal pa ni zad par mi 'gyur te/_kun tu dpa' ba bskal pa'i tshad ni de 
[\[231a.2\]]yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das bsngo ba gcig gis kyang bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed pa ni 'di lta ste/_bde bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgyad cu thub par 'gyur 
[\[231a.3\]]na gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bsnyen bkur shin tu mang por bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/gang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs thos pa de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur na/_kun tu dpa' ba gang 
[\[231a.4\]]zung gi mdo yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa lta ci smos te/_kun tu dpa' ba de ni bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang po bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba sems dang ba gang zhig zung gi mdo la snying thag pa nas phyag 'tshal ba de ni bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[231a.5\]]bskal pa drug cu'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la yang thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te/_kun tu dpa' ba de ni mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la byad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'chi khar yang sangs 
[\[231a.6\]]rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/_kun tu dpa' ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de la skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po legs par bshad pa thos pas bsod nams kyi phung po 'di skyes te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu 
[\[231a.7\]]bcu rtsa dgu po de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams so sor lung ston par 'gyur na/_kun tu dpa' ba gang zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par rgya cher thos pa lta ci smos kyis ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po mnyan par bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu 
[\[231b.2\]]dpa' ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed par sems can de yang bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nam bdag gi zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po nyan pa de na/_
[\[231b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ngoms ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba khyod chos rnams kyis ngoms mi shes pa ni legs so legs so/_/kun tu dpa' ba nga yang chos rnams kyis ngoms mi shes na/_kun tu dpa' ba byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis 
[\[231b.4\]]ngoms mi myong bar bya ba lta ci smos/_kun tu dpa' ba rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la theg pa chen po la dad pa bskyed pa de bskal pa stong du log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_bskal pa lnga stong du dud 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur/_bskal pa khri nyis stong du blo ngan par mi 'gyur 
[\[231b.5\]]bskal pa khri brgyad stong du mtha' 'khob tu skye bo'i nang du skye bar mi 'gyur/_bskal pa nyi khrir rab tu sbyin pa la dpa' bar 'gyur/_bskal pa nyi khri lnga stong du lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/_bskal pa sum khri lnga stong du tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de bskal pa bzhi khrir khyim gyis 
[\[231b.6\]]gnas nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_bskal pa lnga khrir chos 'dzin par 'gyur/_bskal pa drug khri lnga stong du 'chi ba rjes su dran pa sgom par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la sdig pa'i las cung zad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la bdud sdig can gyis glags 
[\[231b.7\]]rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/nam du yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag ni gang dang gang du skye yang bskal pa grangs med pa dgu bcu rtsa lngar log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa brgyad khrir thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_bskal 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]pa stong du srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur/_bskal pa dgu khri dgu stong du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong bar 'gyur/_bskal pa khri sum stong du phra ma'i tshig spong bar 'gyur te/_kun tu dpa' ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka'o/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[232a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[232a.3\]]ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba dag sdig pa'i las kyi phung po ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba mang ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag sdig pa'i las kyi phung po ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/_
[\[232a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba kha rog kha rog nga la sdig pa'i las kyi phung po kun ma dri shig_/kun tu dpa' ba gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la gnod sems bskyed pa bas ni gang 
[\[232a.5\]]zung gi mdo la smod pa de de bas mi dge ba'i phung po ches mang du bskyed do/_/kun tu dpa' ba gang dag theg pa chen po la gnod pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang de bas mi dge ba'i phung po ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/_kun tu dpa' ba sems can de dag ni tshig pa'o/_/tshig pa nyid do/_/kun tu 
[\[232a.6\]]dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni thar bar bgyi mi nus lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba de de bzhin te/_thar bar bya mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' ba 'di lta ste/_dper na mi la la zhig gi mgo bcad la de la des sman 
[\[232a.7\]]sbrang rtsi'am/_khar 'am/_bu ram mam/_mar ram/_'bru mar ram/_bsku ba'i sman gang yang rung ba zhig gis mgo la bskus na/_kun tu dpa' ba 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can de slar ldang nus sam/_kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rngo mi thogs so/_/bcom 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba gzhan yang mi gzhan zhig kyang yod par gyur la/_des sems can gzhan la mtshon rnon pos btab na mtshon thang cig btab pas srog chod ma nus kyang /_kun tu dpa' ba rma 'byung bar 'gyur te/_sman gyis sbyar na de'i rma 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/nam 
[\[232b.2\]]sos par gyur pa de na sdug bsngal dran nas da ni bdag gis shes kyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba mi bya'o/_/snyam du sems pa de bzhin du kun tu dpa' ba mi de nam sdug bsngal dran pa de na sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ngo /_/de'i tshe chos thams cad mngon 
[\[232b.3\]]sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad mngon sum du byas nas de'i tshe dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba 'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig shi ba'i pha ma mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don kyang de la skyabs byed nus pa med pa de bzhin du kun tu 
[\[232b.4\]]dpa' ba byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams kyang bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa byed mi nus te/_pha ma de re thag chad pa bzhin du sems can de dag rnams kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe re thag chad par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba gnyis po 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi re thag chad pa yin 
[\[232b.5\]]te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gcig ni sems can sdig pa byed pa'am/_byed du 'jug pa'o/_/mi cig shos ni dam pa'i chos spong ba ste/_gnyis po de dag ni sems can rnams 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe re thag chad pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[232b.6\]]ldan 'das sems can de dag gi 'gro ba gang lags/_tshe slad ma gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba sems can dam pa'i chos la smod pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ni mtha' yas te/_tshe phyi ma yang mtha' yas so/_/kun tu dpa' ba dam pa'i chos spong 
[\[232b.7\]]ba'i sems can de dag ni bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal par bsdus gzhom dang /_bskal par tsha ba dang /_bskal par rab tu tsha ba dang /_bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag dang /_bskal par sems can dmyal ba 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]chen po mnar med pa dang /_bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po spu zing zhes byed pa dang /_bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po kyi hud zer ba dang /_kun tu dpa' ba sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po de dag tu bskal pa brgyad kyi bar du sdug 
[\[233a.2\]]bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal lags so/_/nyan par mi spro'o/_/de nas 
[\[233a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sems can dmyal bar sems can rnams/_/ji ltar sdug bsngal rab tshor myong /_/'jigs pa chen po'i tshig 'di la/_/khyod ni nyan par spro ma yin/_/gang zhig dge ba'i las byed pa/_/
[\[233a.4\]]de ni dge bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gang zhig mi dge'i las byed pa/_/de yang sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur/_/gang zhig bde rgyu mi shes pa/_/skyes nas 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_/mya ngan bcings pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/_/byis pa rtag tu sdug bsngal lo/_/gang dag sangs rgyas 
[\[233a.5\]]mchog dran pa/_/mkhas pa rnams ni bde ba yin/_/theg pa che la dad pa yang /_/de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du/_/sngon gyi las kyis rab bskul nas/_/las ni chung ngu byas pa yang /_/'bras bu mtha' yas spyod par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[233a.6\]]zhing gi zhing mchog tu/_/sa bon btab na 'bras bu che/_/ji ltar sa bon nyung btab las/_/'bras bu mang por spyod pa bzhin/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la dga' byed pa/_/mkhas pa rnams ni bde bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa dag ni rnam par spong /_/dge ba dag kyang mang du byed/_/gang dag 
[\[233a.7\]]nga yi bstan pa la/_/sbyin pa skra tsam byin pa ni/_/bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu ru/_/longs spyod che zhing nor yang mang /_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang /_/de dag rtag tu sbyin pa can/_/de ltar sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas/_/zab mo de ni 'bras bu che/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i chos 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_bcom 
[\[233b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa ltar gang gis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan 
[\[233b.3\]]pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[233b.4\]]po kun tu dpa' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par shes par bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba chos 
[\[233b.5\]]smra ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par shes par bya'o/_/kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zung gi mdo sgrogs pa de ni chos smra ba'o/_/kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[233b.6\]]dag zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs thos pa de dag kyang 'di lta bu'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed par 'gyur na/_gang dag yi ger 'dri ba dang klog pa lta ci smos te/_de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba nyon cig 'di 
[\[233b.7\]]lta ste/_dper na phyogs bzhi'i phyogs re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag bskal pa bcu gnyis kyi bar du bzhugs shing chos ston te/_zung gi mdo 'di yi ger 'dri ba de'i bsod nams kyi phung po brjod kyang de'i bsod 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par ram tshig gis brjod par mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis kyang yi ger 'dri ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brjod par mi nus na/_gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_sems pa dang /_klog 
[\[234a.2\]]pa de dag chos kyi gter du 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das klog pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/tshig bzhi tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[234a.3\]]tsam/_bklags pa rnams kyi dge ba gang /_/gang gA brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi/_/bye ma snyed kyi rgyal ba yis/_/'di na zung gi mdo bklags pa/_/de dag bsod nams gang yod pa/_/rgyun mi 'chad par brjod gyur kyang /_/bsod nams de ni zad mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan pa/_/
[\[234a.4\]]rnyed par dka' zhing mtha' yas so/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du chos kyi 
[\[234a.5\]]gter 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bzhag pa ni legs so legs so/_/gzhan gcer bu pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bco brgyad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rgyal lo/_/
[\[234a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu rgyal lo/_/kye mu stegs can gcer bu can dag mu stegs can khyed rnams ji ltar rgyal bar 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa rgyal bar mdzod/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rgyal bar mdzod/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[234a.7\]]pa/_ngas khyed rnams la rgyal ba ma mthong ngo /_/khyed ni phyin ci log gnas na/_/ji lta bur ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/gcer bu khyed rnams nyon cig dang /_/khyed la phan pa brjod par bya/_/byis pa'i blo la bde ba med/_/khyed cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur/_/ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan gyis su/_/
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]zab mo'i lam yang bstan par bya/_/de nas gcer bu pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la khros pas ma dad pa'i sems skyed do/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rdo rje gsor ba dang /_de nas gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag sngangs skrag nas sdug bsngal chen pos nyam 
[\[234b.2\]]thag ste ngu zhing mchi ma zag pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sku mi snang bar mdzad do/_/de nas gcer bu pa de dag ngu zhing gdong mchi mas gang bas bcom ldan 'das ma mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'di na dpung gnyen su yang med/_/de bzhin pha med ma 
[\[234b.3\]]yang med/_/'brog dgon bzhin du rab tu mthong /_/khang pa stong pa gnas med do/_/'di na chu yang ma yod do/_/shing yang med cing bya yang med/_/'di na skye bo ma mthong ste/_/mgon med sdug bsngal tshor ba ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong bas/_/mi bzad chen po myong bar gyur/_/
[\[234b.4\]]yang de'i tshe na gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag stan las langs te pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs kyis go bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje can/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/bdag cag rnams la phan pa mdzod/_/'gro 
[\[234b.5\]]ba nyam thag bskyab tu gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' ba la bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba song la gzhan mu stegs can gcer bu pa rnams la chos shod cig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234b.6\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ri nag po ni ri rab ri'i rgyal po la gor ma bkum par rtse mo 'dud na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bzhin du bdag gis ji ltar chos bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[234b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_kha rog rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa gang gis kun tu dpa' ba song la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ltos te de bzhin gshegs pa ga la snang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan gang du bting ba ltos shig dang /_kun tu dpa' ba nga nyid 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]kyis gzhan mu stegs can gcer bu rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/_'on te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sam/_su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus mchi bar 
[\[235a.2\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis song shig_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus ni phyir shog shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' ba stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[235a.3\]]la bskor ba byas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can de dag la chos bstan pa/_grogs po dag skye ba ni sdug bsngal ba yin te skye ba nyid kyang sdug bsngal ba'o/_/skyes nas sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mang du 'byung ngo /_/skyes nas nad kyi 
[\[235a.4\]]'jigs pa rnams 'byung ngo /_/nad las rga ba'i 'jigs pa rnams 'byung ngo /_/rgas pa las 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das skyes pa las skye ba'i 'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur zhes bgyi ba gang lags/_mir skyes nas 'jigs pa mang du 'byung ste/_rgyal po'i 
[\[235a.5\]]'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/rkun po'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/me'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/rlung gi 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/klong 'khyil ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/rang gis byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/
[\[235a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis skye ba'i gleng gzhi de lta bu rnam pa mang pos chos bstan pa dang /_de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan mu stegs can gcer bu pa de dag rab tu skrag par gyur nas bdag cag ni phyin cad skye ba la nam yang mi mos so zhes de skad smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[235a.7\]]'di bshad pa na/_gzhan mu stegs can gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/rang gi 'khor las kyang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bco brgyad sa bcu la rab tu gnas par gyur nas thams cad kyis kyang rdzu 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta ste/_rta'i gzugs dang /_glang po che'i gzugs dang /_stag gi gzugs dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang /_ri rab kyi gzugs dang /_g.yung drung ris lta bu'i gzugs dang /_la la dag ni shing ljon pa'i gzugs su ston cing thams 
[\[235b.2\]]cad kyang pad ma'i khri la skyil mo krung du 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag dgu ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas rol na 'khod/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag dgu ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon rol na 'khod cing de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag ste/_
[\[235b.3\]]thabs mkhas pas chos ston par snang ngo /_/zhag bdun pa'i nyin mo de bzhin gshegs pa phyag gi mthil brkyang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba pad ma bla ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dir 'ong bar mkhyen to/_/byang chub 
[\[235b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba rnams 'gro ba de na rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pad ma bla ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams der nyin zhag bdun gyis phyin to/_/nam bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag brkyang ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' ba bcom 
[\[235b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sems dang zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[235b.6\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_rdzu 'phrul gnyis kyis ni bcom ldan 'das bye ba stong mthong ste/_gdugs bdun pa la pad ma bla ma'i 
[\[235b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams su phyin nas de'i bar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'khrugs pa bye ba brgya stong dag kyang mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das de nas gdod sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dag na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]chos ston pa dang /_de nyid kyi gdugs la sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu 'jig rten du byung ba mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la phyag bgyis nas 
[\[236a.2\]]slar mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gdugs la sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa dgu 'das nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa dgu po de dag thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa dgu byung ste/_de nyid kyi gdugs la bla na med 
[\[236a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas de dag la lan gsum bskor ba bgyis pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyis mi gda' bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[236a.4\]]zhing bye ba phrag drug cu rnams su yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis phyag bgyis nas bdag thal byung mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bye ba phrag 
[\[236a.5\]]brgyad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa rnams mthong ste/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yang phyag bgyis nas thal byung mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa lnga dag na dam pa'i chos 
[\[236a.6\]]nub pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag de la bsam pa skyes pa dang mchi ma shor to/_/gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'dod pa'i gzugs can mang po dag ngu zhing mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen pos zug pa yang mthong ste/_de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 
[\[236a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/_ri rab dang bcas pa/_sa phyogs dang bcas pa ma lus pa thams cad tshig pa de la yang phyag bgyis nas re thag chad par gyur te mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag pad ma bla ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ma phyin gyi bar der bcom ldan 'das khri 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]bshams pa bye ba brgya stong phrag lnga yang mthong ste/_lho phyogs na khri bshams pa bye ba brgya stong dang /_byang phyogs na khri bshams pa bye ba brgya stong dang /_shar phyogs na khri bshams pa bye ba brgya stong dang /_nub phyogs na khri bshams pa bye ba brgya stong dang /_steng gi phyogs na khri bshams 
[\[236b.2\]]pa bye ba brgya stong mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das khri bshams pa de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa sha stag ste/_khri de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing chos ston te/_bcom ldan 'das de la bdag ngo mtshar du gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bcom 
[\[236b.3\]]ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ming ci zhes zhus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni pad ma bla ma zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de nas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bskor ba bgyis nas sangs rgyas 
[\[236b.4\]]kyi zhing 'di'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ci zhes zhus pa dang /_de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed do/_/de la bdag gis 
[\[236b.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong mang po zhig kyang gda' na pad ma'i snying po zhes bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ma 'tshal na de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin 
[\[236b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ba de ngas khyod la bstan to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sku ni mi gda' bar gyur gyi byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs sha stag tu gda' ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig 
[\[236b.7\]]pu zhig gda' nas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te der mchis pa dang /_khri yang byung bar gyur nas khri de la mchis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe khri du ma zhig byung nas khri de dag la su yang mchis par ma mthong nas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]pa de la bcom ldan 'das khri 'di dag la sems can 'ga' yang ma mchis ma mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni khri 'di dag la 'dug pa'i mthu med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[237a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig bskrun na khri de dag la mchis par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig sems can gang dag zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs thos pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des khri de dag la 'dug par 'gyur te/_gang dag yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa 
[\[237a.3\]]lta ci smos/_kun tu dpa' ba khyod kyis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs thos pas khyod khri 'di la 'dug par gyur gyi de lta ma yin na khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i nang du chud par ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das des de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis 'di skad 
[\[237a.4\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa 
[\[237a.5\]]bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang ji zhig gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba mthu chen po thob pa nyon cig_/'di 
[\[237a.6\]]lta ste/_dper na la la zhig gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur la/_des gling bzhi'i zhing rnams la til btab na/_kun tu dpa' ba 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i sa bon mang du skye ba yin nam/_kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags 
[\[237a.7\]]so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba de las sems can la la zhig gis til gyi 'bru de dag phung po gcig tu byas la mi gzhan zhig gis til gyi 'bru'i phung po de las til gyi 'bru re re nas blangs te phyogs gzhan du 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]'jog na/_kun tu dpa' ba 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can des til gyi 'bru de dag bgrang ba'am dpe bya nus sam/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so/_/til gyi 'bru de dag bgrang 
[\[237b.2\]]ba'am/_dpe bgyi bar rngo mi thogs so/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gzhan gyis dpe bya bar mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' ba 'di lta ste dper na/_til gyi 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed du de bzhin 
[\[237b.3\]]gshegs par gyur la/_de dag thams cad kyis zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams yongs su brjod kyang dpes kyang bsod nams zad par mi 'gyur na/_gang yi ge 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'drir 'jug pa lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[237b.4\]]dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yi ger 'dri bas bsod nams ci tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtswa 'am shing de dag thams cad sor gcig tsam du gtubs 
[\[237b.5\]]pa dang /_kun tu dpa' ba dper bya ba gnyis kyang nyon cig_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo'am g.yang sa'am/_sa'am rdul phra rab ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de dag gi bsod nams de dpe bya bar nus 
[\[237b.6\]]sam/_kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma gtogs so/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yi ger 'dri ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang dpe byar mi nus te/_'khor los sgyur 
[\[237b.7\]]ba'i rgyal po ji snyed pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam bris te 'jog pa de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/_bsod nams rab tu mang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag ni de lta ma yin no/_/kun tu dpa' 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing bsgrub pa la gnas pa'i bsod nams de la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos zil gyis gnon mi nus so/_/de bzhin du zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yi ger 'dri ba de'i bsod nams 
[\[238a.2\]]kyi phung po de la yang dpe bya bar mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' ba zung gi mdo 'di ni bsod nams kyi gter ston pa'o/_/de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o/_/chos thams cad kyi sgron ma 'bar bar byed pa'o/_/bdud sdig can thams cad pham par byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[238a.3\]]dpa' thams cad kyi gnas rnam par 'bar bar byed pa'o/_/chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa mngon par sgrub pa'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[238a.4\]]'di la tshangs par spyod pa ni rab tu dka' ba spyod pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa ni dkon pa lags te/_de bzhin du tshangs par spyod pa yang dkon pa lags so/_/gang gi tshe tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[238a.5\]]mngon du mthong bar 'gyur te/_nyin mtshan du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing nyin mtshan du de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bar 'gyur ba de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo /_/nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba de na gter 
[\[238a.6\]]thams cad mthong ngo /_/de 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe skrag pa skye bar mi 'gyur/_nam du yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur/_nam du yang mya ngan can du mi 'gyur/_sred pa'i zhags pas bcings par mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[238a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnyed par dka' lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnyed par dka' lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rnyed par dka'o/_/kun tu dpa' ba zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa drug khri'i bar du 'khor los 
[\[238b.2\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa brgyad stong gi bar du brgya byin thob par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa nyi khri'i bar du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa sum khri brgyad stong gi bar du tshangs pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[238b.3\]]bskal pa dgu khri dgu stong gi bar du log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa nyi khri brgyad stong gi bar du dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri sum stong gi bar du lha ma 
[\[238b.4\]]yin gyi ris su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa nyi khri lnga stong gi bar du shes rab 'chal par mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bdun stong gi bar du shes rab spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa dgu stong gi bar du mdzes shing blta na sdug 
[\[238b.5\]]par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri lnga stong gi bar du bud med du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri drug stong gi bar du lus la nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa sum khri lnga stong gi bar 
[\[238b.6\]]du lha'i mig can du 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri dgu stong gi bar du klu'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa drug khri'i bar du khro ba'i zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bdun stong gi bar du dbul po'i khyim du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa brgyad khri'i 
[\[238b.7\]]bar du gling gnyis la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/nam dbul por 'gyur ba de na yang 'di 'dra ba'i bde ba rab tu 'thob ste/_bskal pa khri nyis stong gi bar du dmus long gi skye gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri sum stong gi bar du ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]khri chig stong gi bar du bzod pa smra bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag par 'gyur ba na/_'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/khro ba'i zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/_/des shar phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i 
[\[239a.2\]]klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba nyi shu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/nub phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs su sangs 
[\[239a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag 
[\[239a.4\]]brgya'i bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te de dag thams cad kyis kyang rigs kyi bu de la/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs thos pas tshe gzhan du yon tan dang /_phan yon dang /_bde ba 'di snyed du 'gyur gyis ma 'jigs shig_/ces dbugs 'byin to/_/
[\[239a.5\]]kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po 'di mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kye rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[239a.6\]]pa de dag khyod la gzigs su byon to/_/gsol pa/_bdag gis dge ba'i las ci zhig bgyis na de bzhin gshegs pa mang po zhig bdag ga la mchis par byon/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/khyod kyis mi'i lus thob ste zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs rna lam du 
[\[239a.7\]]thos pas de'i phyir khyod kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed skyes so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsod nams kyi phung po yang de snyed du gyur na gang mtha' dag chub par thos pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bka' stsal pa/_kha rog kha rog kye rigs kyi bu tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]su bcad pa'i bsod nams brjod kyis nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bcu gsum gyi bye ma snyed rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas kyang bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed 
[\[239b.2\]]do/_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung bcu gsum gyi bye ma snyed la mchod pa bas ni gang gis zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam thos pa de yang bsod nams kyi phung po de 
[\[239b.3\]]bas ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur na/_gang mtha' dag chub par thos pa lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu gang gis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag chub par thos par 'gyur ba nyon cig_/gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du til btab pa'i 
[\[239b.4\]]til gyi 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur la/_de nas skyes bu phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig yod de de nas skyes bu des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag la sbyin pa byin pas ni gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la sbyin pa 
[\[239b.5\]]byin pa de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur la/_gang gis de dag thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni gang gis lan cig phyir 
[\[239b.6\]]'ong ba gcig la sbyin pa byin na bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur la/_gang gis de dag thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni 
[\[239b.7\]]gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la sbyin pa byin na de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur la gang gis de dag thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]bas ni gang gis dgra bcom pa gcig la sbyin pa byin na de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dgra bcom par gyur la/_gang gis de dag thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa'i 
[\[240a.2\]]bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni gang gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la sbyin pa byin na de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur la/_gang gis de dag thams cad 
[\[240a.3\]]la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ni gang gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sbyin pa byin na de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpar gyur la/_
[\[240a.4\]]gang gis de dag thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la sems dang bar byed pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gang ba la gang sems dang bar byed pa dang /_gang zung gi mdo'i 
[\[240a.5\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed na/_kun tu dpa' ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa lta ci smos/_kun tu dpa' ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems dang bas 
[\[240a.6\]]phyag 'tshal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_kun tu dpa' ba 'di ji snyam du sems/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis 'di thos par nus sam zhe na/_gang dag thos par gyur yang dad pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba nyon cig_/byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams las gang 
[\[240a.7\]]dag rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rnyed par nus pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba gang lag mthil gcig gis rgya mtsho zad par byed pa'i sems can 'ga' yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma mchis so/_/bde bar 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]gshegs pa de ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po skems nus pa'i sems can 'ga' yang med pa de bzhin du/_kun tu dpa' ba dman pa la mos pa'i sems can gang gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' ba 
[\[240b.2\]]gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed ma mthong ba de dag gis ni zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri mi nus so/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed mthong ba de dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan mi 
[\[240b.3\]]nus te/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ma mthong ba de dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas spong bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba brgya phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ba de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos 
[\[240b.4\]]na sems dang ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par 'gyur te/_de zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad cing mi spong bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba nyon cig_/gang gis zung gi mdo 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[240b.5\]]gcig tsam yi ger 'dri ba de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa lnga las 'das nas de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji lta ba de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba sems can de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par 
[\[240b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba nyon cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam thos pa de dag ni kun tu dpa' ba 'di lta ste/_dper na sems can gang la las mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas sam 
[\[240b.7\]]byed du bcug gam/_byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba de yang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam nyan na de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa'i las de dag byang bar 'gyur ba bzhin no//_//bam po gnyis pa/_kun tu dpa' ba nyon 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]cig dang yon tan gzhan yang bshad par bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sems can la la zhig mchod rten bshig pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin las g.yo bar byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bar chad 
[\[241a.2\]]byed pa dang /_mi'i srog gcod pa'i sems can de phyis 'gyod cing mya ngan byed de lus 'dis bdag phung ngo /_/'jig rten pha rol tu yang phung ste/_bdag ma rung ngo snyam du sems pa chen po byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo /_/mi bzod pa'i tshor ba myong ngo /_/kun tu dpa' ba 
[\[241a.3\]]sems can de ni sems can thams cad kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/_/smad par 'gyur ro/_/sems can de ni tshig pa/_ma rung bar gyur pa/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyang ma rung bar byas pa yin te/_ji ltar sdong dum tshig pa bzhin du mi de yang 
[\[241a.4\]]bskal pa du ma'i bar du de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar khyim legs par bris pa'i ka gdung tshig na mi mdzes pa ltar mi de yang de ltar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten 'di na yang mi mdzes so/_/gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyis spyo zhing brdeg pa dang /_
[\[241a.5\]]bkres pa dang /_skom pas nyen cing cung zad kyang mi snyed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ste bkres shing skom pa'i rgyu dang spyos pa'i rgyus mchod rten bshig pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i las rjes su dran nas de'i phyir bdag gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_bdag gi 
[\[241a.6\]]skyob pa ni su yin snyam du sdug bsngal la skyo ba'i sems bskyed de de yang 'di snyam du sems so/_/'di na ni bdag gi skyob pa su yang med kyis/_bdag ri dang ri'i sul dag tu song la der 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam mo/_/smras pa/_bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas pas/_/rtag tu sdong 
[\[241a.7\]]dum tshig pa bzhin/_/'jig rten 'di na'ang mi mdzes la/_/tshe gzhan na yang mdzes ma yin/_/khyim gyi nang na'ang mi mdzes la/_/phyi rol na yang mdzes ma yin/_/nyes pa'i rgyus ni sdig byas te/_/des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/tshe gzhan du yang sdug bsngal na/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ngan 'gro 'dir ni gang du gnas/_/mchi mas brnangs par rab ngus nas/_/lha rnams kyis kyang tshig thos so/_/kyi hud 'jig rten pha rol tu/_/ngan 'gror 'gro bas re chad do/_/lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/_skyes bu blun po de snyam du/_/sdug bsngal sems pa thong la song /_/
[\[241b.2\]]pha bsad cing ni ma bsad de/_/bdag gis mtshams med lnga byas pas/_/bdag la skyabs dang dpung gnyen med/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/_/ri yi rtse mor song nas su/_/de nas bdag lus dor bar bya/_/skyes bu blun po ma 'gro shig_/gnod par byed pa'i sems 
[\[241b.3\]]kyis su/_/khyod kyis sdig pa mang byas kyis/_/sdig pa'i las ni ma byed cig_/gang dag bdag la gnod byed rnams/_/sdug bsngal sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/mya ngan byed cing ngu bas na/_/de phyir sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus des ni sangs rgyas mi 'gyur 
[\[241b.4\]]te/_/byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba'ang ma yin no/_/nyan thos thar pa'i theg pa'ang mi 'thob kyis/_/brtson 'grus gzhan gyis rab tu 'bad par gyis/_/drang srong ga la yod pa'i ri der song /_/song ste drang srong che ba nyid mthong nas/_/de yi rkang la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_/
[\[241b.5\]]sems can dam pa bdag la skyabs mdzod cig_/bdag ni 'jigs skyed sdug bsngal rab tu gzir/_/sems can snying po drang srong tshig gson cig_/bzhugs la sems kyi skabs ni dbye mdzod de/_/skad cig tsam zhig dge ba'i chos kyang shod/_/'jigs skrag sdug bsngal 
[\[241b.6\]]rab tu gzir bas na/_/de phyir skad cig yid tsam bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag gis sdig mang gang bgyis bshags par 'tshal/_/drang srong gis ni bdag la bka' stsol cig_/drang srong gis smras pa/_sdug bsngal ngu zhing mya ngan byed pas gzir/_/khyod ni bkres shing skom 
[\[241b.7\]]pas nyen pa ste/_/re chad srid pa gsum du 'gro bas na/_/kha zas gang dag byin pa de dag zo/_/lus ni tshim par bya ba'i phyir/_/drang srong gis ni zas byin te/_/yid du 'ong ba zhim zos nas/_/sems can rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad byang byed pa'i/_/
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]chos ni khyod la phyis 'chad do/_/de yi kha zas zhim po de/_/skad cig gcig la zos par gyur/_/zas zos nas kyang lag bkrus te/_/drang srong la ni bskor byas nas/_/skyil mo krung du 'dug nas su/_/sdig pa gang dang gang byas smras/_/pha bsad dang ni ma bsad 
[\[242a.2\]]dang /_/mchod rten bshig pa bdag gis bgyis/_/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/sangs rgyas 'grub pa bar chad bgyis/_/de yi tshig de thos nas su/_/de nas drang srong tshig smras pa/_/khyod kyis sdig pa byas pas na/_/kye ma skyes bu khyod mi dge/_/sdig pa'i 
[\[242a.3\]]las ni byas pa dang /_/byed du bcug pa bshags par gyis/_/de nas de'i tshe mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste/_'jigs skrag skyo nas/_bdag la su zhig skyob par 'gyur/_/bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas pas/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/_/de nas mi des pus mo 
[\[242a.4\]]gnyis sa la btsugs nas drang srong de la smras pa/_bdag gis byas shing byed bcug pa/_/sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/_/sdig pa'i 'bras bur de ma gyur/_/sdug bsngal bdag gis myong ma 'gyur/_/bdag ni khyod dang nye gyur gyis/_/drang srong bdag gi skyabs su gyur/_/
[\[242a.5\]]'gyod pa med cing zhi bas na/_/bdag gi sdig pa'i las rnams zhi/_/de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong des mi de la smras pa/_nga ni skyes bu khyod kyi skyabs su 'gyur/_nga ni rten du 'gyur/_nga ni dpung gnyen du 'gyur gyis khyod ma 'jigs par mngon sum du chos nyon cig_/khyod 
[\[242a.6\]]kyis zung zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs cung zad thos sam zhes dbugs phyung ba dang /_des smras pa/_bdag gis yong ma thos so/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_gang snying rje la gnas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma gtogs par sems can tshig pa la su zhig chos ston/_
[\[242a.7\]]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yang nyon cig_/sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang shin tu grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig yod de/_rigs kyi bu rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa de'i khyim du bu zhig 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]btsas so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po zla ba dri ma med pas bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze gzhon nu la mtshan ji lta zhig mthong /_de nas bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mi dge'o/_/gzhon nu btsas pa 'di ni 
[\[242b.2\]]mi dge'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bram ze 'di cir 'gyur/_mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_rgyal po gzhon nu 'di gal te lo bdun thub par 'gyur na de yab yum gyi sku la rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/nga'i srog gi bar chad du gyur kyang 
[\[242b.3\]]rung gis nga'i bu 'di mi bsad do/_/brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du mir skye ba 'thob pas gang mi'i lus la gnod par 'gyur ba de lta bu mi bya'o/_/de nas gzhon nu de skye drag khyad du ni de zla ba gcig lon na gzhan lo gnyis lon pa tsam gyi tshad du skyes nas rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pas kyang 
[\[242b.4\]]gzhon nu 'di ni bdag gi las bsags pas skyes par shes so/_/de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu de la rgyal thabs byin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod srid che zhing grags pa'i rgyal por gyur la chos kyis dbang bar bya'i chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/_/de nas rgyal thabs byin 
[\[242b.5\]]nas rgyal po zhes ming btags so/_/rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa yang rang gi yul gyi rgyal po mi byed do/_/de nas blon po bye ba de dag rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa de ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal po chen po khyod ci'i slad 
[\[242b.6\]]du rang gi yul gyi rgyal po mi mdzad/_rgyal pos smras pa/_ngas bskal pa mang po grangs med par gang rgyal srid dang longs spyod dang dbang phyug la dbang bar gyur kyang nga nam yang ngoms ma myong ngo /_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na yun ring mo zhig lon pa dang /_bu des pha ma'i srog bcad de 
[\[242b.7\]]de na des mtshams med pa'i las bsags so/_/kye skyes bu gang gi tshe rgyal po de sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba skyes nas 'gyod de mchi mas brnangs par ngu ba dang /_ngas de la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de der song nas chos bstan pa dang /_des kyang chos de thos nas mtshams med pa de 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]dag lhag ma ma lus par myur du byang bar gyur pa'i dus de yang dran no/_/smras pa/_zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs mdo'i rgyal po dka' thub chen po gang dag gis thos pa rnams chos kyi gnas bla na med pa sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi 
[\[243a.2\]]bar 'gyur ba 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis myur du thar 'gyur ba/_/chos rnams bshad kyis rab tu nyon/_/tshig bzhi pa yi tshigs bcad tsam/_/rgyun mi 'chad par bshad pas na/_/sdig pa thams cad byang gyur nas/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa thob par 'gyur/_/sdig pa 
[\[243a.3\]]kun las thar to zhes/_/ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/_/sems dmyal 'jigs pa'i bcings pa las/_/sems can sdug bsngal rab tu dkrol/_/de nas mi de stan de las/_/langs te thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/de la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_/legs so zhes bya rab tu byin/_/
[\[243a.4\]]legs so dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams/_/legs so sdig pa 'jig byed pa/_/gang dag zung mdo tshul chen bstan/_/thos par 'gyur ba rnams kyang legs/_/de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu khri nyis stong thal mo sbyar te drang srong de'i gan du lhags nas rkang pa la 
[\[243a.5\]]phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das dka' thub chen po yun ji srid cig tshun chad dgos zhes smras so/_/de bzhin du klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag bzhi lhags/_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po khri brgyad stong lhags te drang srong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_'di 
[\[243a.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/che ba nyid dang ldan pa yun ji srid tshun chad dgongs drang srong gis smras pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams so/_/smras pa/_dge ba'i las gang gis na skad cig gis sdig pa'i las 'di rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_zung gi chos kyi 
[\[243a.7\]]rnam grangs thos pas so/_/gang der sems can tshogs pa rnams las gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dad pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/mi gang gis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa de dag gis zung zhes bya 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na yang skad cig gis mtshams med pa lnga'i las de dag ma lus par yongs su zad cing yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa zhig gi bar du ngan 'gro rnams kyi sgo bcad par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i 'jig 
[\[243b.2\]]rten gyi sgo sum cu rtsa gnyis ni phye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam thos pa yang de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di 'dra bar 'gyur na/_gang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[243b.3\]]chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang byed pa dang /_btsun par byed pa dang /_ri mo byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_rol mo sbyor ba'i las byed cing lan cig cig rjes su yi rang ste legs par bshad 
[\[243b.4\]]pa legs so legs so zhes smra bar lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad pa na gang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ba de dag ci thal 
[\[243b.5\]]mo sbyar ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po skyed pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/gang dag gis mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas sam/_byed du bcug gam/_byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag kyang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[243b.6\]]'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam thos nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal na de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur na/_kun tu dpa' ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag chub par thos pa lta ci smos te/_/de ni bsod nams kyi phung po 
[\[243b.7\]]de bas ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu zung gi mdo'i don go bar bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/_/kun tu dpa' ba 'di lta ste/_dper na klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i khang pa nyi ma nam yang mi 'char ba de nas klung chen po lnga 'bab po/_/de nas mi la la zhig klung chen 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]po lnga po de dag gi thigs pa bgrang na/_kun tu dpa' ba de dag gis thigs pa bgrangs pas mtha' rtogs par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mi thogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du zung gi chos kyi rnam 
[\[244a.2\]]grangs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskal pa brgyar ram/_bskal pa stong du yang bgrang ba'i tshul gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' ba 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yud tsam zhig 'chad pa de dka' ba byed pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[244a.3\]]'das dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba gang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad nus par 'gyur ba de ni de bas kyang ches dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na mtsho ma dros pa las klung chen po lnga 'bab pa de dag gi 
[\[244a.4\]]thigs pa ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das klung chen po lnga po de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste gang gA dang /_si ta dang /_bag shu dang /_ya mu na dang /_tsan dra ba ga dang /_klung chen po lnga po 
[\[244a.5\]]de dag ni rgya mtsho chen por 'bab ste/_klung chen po re re la yang 'khor klung lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/_/kun tu dpa' ba klung chen po lnga po 'di dag kyang 'khor stong stong dang nam mkha' las babs te/_de dag gis skye dgu rnams ngoms par byed do/_/gsol pa/_'khor stong stong po de dag gang lags 
[\[244a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdzes ldan zhes bya ba 'khor stong dang /_dung can zhes bya ba 'khor stong dang /_'bab pa zhes bya ba 'khor stong dang /_sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba 'khor stong dang /_chos tshul zhes bya ba 'khor stong ste/_kun tu dpa' ba klung chen po de dag ni 'khor 
[\[244a.7\]]stong stong dang ldan pa yin te/_de dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/kun tu dpa' ba de dag dus dus su char pa'i thigs pa'i rgyun rab tu gtong ste/_des me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo thog rnams skye'o/_/nam 'dzam bu'i gling du char gyi rgyun rab tu 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]'bab pa de na chu skye bar 'gyur te/_chu skyes pas zhing dang kun dga'i ra ba thams cad ngoms par byed/_bde bar byed do/_/kun tu dpa' ba 'di lta ste dper na/_skye dgu'i bdag po ni 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad bde bar byed do/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[244b.2\]]'di yang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du bshad do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi ni de lta ma yin no/_/kun tu dpa' ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gang zhe na/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[244b.3\]]gang na gnas pa de dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa zhes bya'o/_/kun tu dpa' ba sems can gang dag ngag gis legs par spyod pa smra ba'ang yod de/_de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po yang dper bya mi nus so/_/sems can gang dag ngag gis nyes par spyod pa smra ba yang yod de de dag gi 
[\[244b.4\]]sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gror 'gyur ba yang dper bya bar mi nus so/_/sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba de dag la skyabs gang yang med de/_de na re thag chad nas smre sngags 'don cing sems can 
[\[244b.5\]]dmyal bar ltung ba de dag ni mi dge ba'i grogs po'i dbang du blta'o/_/sems can gang dag ngag gis legs par spyod pa smra ba de de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dper bya bar mi nus pa de yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du blta ste/_nam dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba de na de bzhin 
[\[244b.6\]]gshegs pa mthong ba yin no/_/nam de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba de na sdig pa thams cad byang ba yin no/_/nam skye dgu'i bdag po 'dzam bu'i gling du spro bar byed pa de na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyi bde ba dper byar mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du zung gi chos kyi 
[\[244b.7\]]rnam grangs 'di yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed do/_/gang dag zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs thos par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi nus/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor mi nus/_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]chos kyi gaN+DI rdung mi nus/_chos kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug mi nus/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug mi nus/_'od zer dpag tu med pas snang bar byed mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du gang dag zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs thos par mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang 
[\[245a.2\]]byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par mi nus so/_/kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar cung zad cig zhu'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar cung zad cig zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas khyod kyi 
[\[245a.3\]]dogs pa bsal bar bya'o/_/gsol pa/_gang gis sems can de dag mtshams med pa lnga las yongs su thar bar bgyis nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la so sor bkod pa'i drang srong du gyur pa de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig zab ste/_/kun tu dpa' ba nga la 
[\[245a.4\]]nyon/_/zung gi mdo sde ston pa ni/_/drang srong gzugs su bstan pa'o/_/zung gis sangs rgyas sku dag kyang /_/snying brtse'i phyir ni rab tu ston/_/gang gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa/_/de snyed kyi ni gzugs kyang ston/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs ston cing /_/bdag nyid chos kyang rab tu ston/_/
[\[245a.5\]]sangs rgyas blta bar gang 'dod pa/_/zung ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa yin/_/zung ni ga la yod pa na/_/sangs rgyas rtag par de na yod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/kun tu dpa' ba sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa dgu bcu rtsa 
[\[245a.6\]]dgu na sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya ba byung ba de ni nga sbyin pa la dpa' bar gyur nas ngas sangs rgyas zla ba zhes bya ba bye ba phrag bcu gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas te/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[245a.7\]]ji ltar bde ba dang /_kha zas bzang po dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas so/_/rim gro byas nas kyang ngas der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos pa dran no/_/kun tu dpa' ba ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]phrag bco brgyad byung ste/_de na yang nga sbyin pa la dpa' bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i sde zhes bya ba bye ba phrag bco brgyad la ngas spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub kyis so sor ci rigs par bsnyen bkur byas nas der yang ngas bla na 
[\[245b.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos pa dran no/_/kun tu dpa' ba ngas sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu dran te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud 'byung ba zhes bya ba sha stag go/_/kun tu dpa' ba 
[\[245b.3\]]ngas sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu dran te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba sha stag go/_/de na yang nga sbyin pa la dpa' bar gyur nas ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pas bkur 
[\[245b.4\]]sti byas nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bla ma dang rim gror bya ba des bla ma dang /_rim gror bya bas rim gro byas nas der yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/_/kun tu dpa' ba sangs rgyas 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba bye ba phrag bcu 
[\[245b.5\]]drug byung ste/_de'i tshe de'i dus na nga khyim bdag phyug cing nor che la longs spyod che ste/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba zhig tu gyur nas/_ngas sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu drug po de dag la gding ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_dgab pas mchod 
[\[245b.6\]]de ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bla ma dang /_rim gro bya ba de lta bus rim gro byas nas de nyid du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa yang ngas dran te/_lung bstan pa'i dus dang tshod la yang ma bab bo/_/kun tu dpa' ba nyon cig_/sangs rgyas
