[\[245b.7\]]bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa lnga 'jig rten du byung ste/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba sha stag ste/_nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig tu gyur nas ngas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]zhes bya ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa lnga po de dag la spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gding ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis bsnyen bkur byas nas de nyid du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung 
[\[246a.2\]]bstan pa thob pa ngas dran no/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'jig rten du byung ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze gzhon nu phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/_bdog pa 
[\[246a.3\]]thams cad yongs su gtong ba zhig tu gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gding ba dang /_bgo ba dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la so so ci rigs par rim gro byas nas ngas de nyid du

[\[246a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya ba sha stag ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na sbyin pa la dpa' bar gyur te/_ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gding ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_rgyan rnams

[\[246a.7\]]phrag bcu gsum 'jig rten du byung ste/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sha stag ste/_ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la gding ba dang /_bgo ba 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_dgab pa dang /_rgyan rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bla ma dang /_rim gro bya ba de lta bu'i bla ma dang /_rim gro bya bas rim gro byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang 
[\[246b.2\]]don dang 'dul ba rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi sgo sna tshogs bshad nas ngas de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa yang ngas dran te/_de na yang lung bstan pa'i dus la ma bab bo/_/kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[246b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar rgyal zhes bya ba bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten du byung ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rab tu byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas te/_da ltar nga la kun dga' bo rim gro byed pa ji lta ba bzhin du ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

[\[246b.6\]]de'i dus na rab tu byung bar gyur nas de nyid du nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa yang ngas dran te ring po ma lon par rnam par gzigs tha ma gang byung ba des zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang /_ngas de shes nas de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du rin po che 
[\[246b.7\]]sna bdun gyi char rab tu phab ste/_de na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dbul ba med par gyur nas/_ngas de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par gyur te/_de nas yun ring mo zhig lon gyi bar du yang nga lung ma bstan to/_/gsol pa/_dus 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]de gang lags/_tshod de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba nyon cig_/de nas bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na gdod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[247a.2\]]nga de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'jig rten du byung ba de na nga yang bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyis tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad mthong nas me tog ud pa la bdun gyis 
[\[247a.3\]]gtor te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa des nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 
[\[247a.4\]]'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/_kun tu dpa' ba de nas nga shing ta la bcu gnyis srid kyi steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la 'dug nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_gang ngas bskal pa grangs med pa rnams su tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang /_gang pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[247a.5\]]ba de thams cad khar sang dang de ring tsam du mngon sum du dran nas/_kun tu dpa' ba de na yang ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dag dge ba'i chos rnams la so sor bkod par gyur na/_kun tu dpa' ba nga da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[247a.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa lta ci smos te/_kun tu dpa' ba ngas sems can rnams la chos rnam pa mang po bstan to/_/ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba de lta bu'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams la chos bstan te/_lha'i 'jig rten du ni 
[\[247a.7\]]lha'i gzugs kyis chos bstan to/_/klu'i gnas su ni klu'i gzugs kyis chos bstan to/_/gnod sbyin gyi gnas su ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos bstan to/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas su ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gzugs kyis chos bstan to/_/mi'i 'jig rten du ni mi'i gzugs 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]kyis chos bstan to/_/sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyis gzugs kyis chos bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos bstan to/_/gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 
[\[247b.2\]]'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de'i gzugs kyis ngas sems can rnams la chos bstan te/_kun tu dpa' ba de ltar sems can rnams la rnam pa mang pos chos bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun tu dpa' ba sems can rnams ji ltar chos rnam pa mang po thos pa de ltar sems can snying po de 
[\[247b.3\]]dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa mang po dag byed par 'gyur te sbyin pa rnams sbyin par 'gyur/_bsod nams dag byed par 'gyur/_bdag gi don du mi nyal ba yang byed par 'gyur/_'chi ba rjes su dran pa yang sgom par 'gyur te/_de dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba rnams 
[\[247b.4\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag chos thos pa'i rgyus sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dran par gyur te/_de lha dang mi de dag gis yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba de ltar na zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs thos ma thag tu yon tan dang phan yon de ltar dpag tu 
[\[247b.5\]]med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sems can de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad 'dzer to/_/gang byas shing bsags pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i dge ba'i chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par 
[\[247b.6\]]smin pa gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa lta/_de dag gis smras pa/_gang dag chos la yid ches nas 'di skad ces yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyis chos yod do zhes zer ba de dag gi bde ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chen po ni chos kyi bde ba bla na med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gti 
[\[247b.7\]]mug blun po gang dag 'di skad ces chos rnams kyang med do/_/chos rnams kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba yang med do zhes zer ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chen po de ni ngan song rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni phyi phyir zhing ngan song gi sa la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]brgyad kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bcu gnyis kyi bar du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul rnams su sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bcu drug gi bar du lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur 
[\[248a.2\]]ro/_/bskal pa dgu stong gi bar du 'byung po dang /_sha za rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri bzhi stong gi bar du lce med par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri drug stong gi bar du ma'i mngal du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri nyis stong gi bar du sha ril ril 
[\[248a.3\]]por 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa khri chig stong gi bar du dmus long du skye zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/_de na pha ma dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag ni don med par sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/bdag cag gi bu skyes pa ni don med do/_/zla ba dgu'i 
[\[248a.4\]]bar du don med par mngal du btsas so/_/grang ba dang dro ba'i tshor ba myong ngo /_/bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal kyang rab tu myong ngo /_/tshe 'di la yang sdug bsngal mang po myong ngo /_/pha mas khyim du bu skyes pa mthong na yang brod med cing pha ma rab tu re thag chad par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[248a.5\]]kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin du dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gror gzhol ba yin te/_de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen pos zug par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba gang dag tshig 'di skad ces chos rnams yod do/_/chos rnams kyi 
[\[248a.6\]]pha rol tu 'gro ba yod do/_/zhes zer ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa nyi shu'i bar du byang gi sgra mi snyan du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum nas shi 'phos nas byang gi sgra mi 
[\[248a.7\]]snyan du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te thams cad kyang bde ba can zhes bya ba sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de nyid du gnas te/_de nyid du byang chub mngon 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba de ltar na zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthu che ba'o/_/gang dag 'di la sems dad pa de dag nam du yang ya nga ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[248b.2\]]ro/_/kun tu dpa' ba la la dag de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan du sems can mang po zhig yongs su thar bar byas nas kyang da dung du sems can gyi khams zad par ma gyur te mang po zhig ni byang chub tu smon lam 'debs/_mang po zhig ni mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes/_mang po zhig ni mya ngan 
[\[248b.3\]]las 'das pa thob par gyur na/_rgyu gang gis sems can zad par ma gyur ces 'dzer ba'i sems can dag kyang yod do/_/gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma dang 'gyed du 'dod do snyam mo/_/de nas 
[\[248b.4\]]bram ze dang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_gcer bu pa brgya phrag du ma zhig rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der dong ngo /_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 
[\[248b.5\]]stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin 
[\[248b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig deng rgyal po'i khab 'dir 'dus pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[248b.7\]]ldan 'das 'dir lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/_mi'am/_mi ma lags pa'am/_su dag mchi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa deng 'dir lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur te/_bram ze 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa bye ba phrag dgu stong 'ong bar 'gyur te de dag dang ngar 'gyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad kyi 'gyed pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya ste/_bram ze de 
[\[249a.2\]]dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa bye ba stong phrag dgu po de dag thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad 
[\[249a.3\]]'ong bar 'gyur te/_de dag nga las chos thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba stong phrag drug cu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/bdud sdig can g.yog dang 
[\[249a.4\]]dang bcas pa bye ba stong phrag sum cu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po lnga brgya tsam yang 'khor dang bcas nas chos nyan du 'ong bar 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad nga las chos thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[249a.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[249a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[249a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi ming ci zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba nyon cig_/rgyal po dga' bo zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po nye dga' zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ces bya ba dang /_rgyal po tshangs pa'i 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]sde zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po blta na mdzes zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po mdza' ba'i sde zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po dga' ba'i sde zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying po zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal 
[\[249b.2\]]po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa rgyal po lnga brgya tsam dag rgyal po re re zhing yang g.yog bye ba brgya stong yod de/_rgyal po 'phags skyes po ma gtogs par de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag 
[\[249b.3\]]go/_/shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag sum cu 'ong ngo /_/lho phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag lnga bcu 'ong ngo /_/nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag drug cu 'ong ngo /_/byang phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong 
[\[249b.4\]]phrag brgyad cu 'ong ngo /_/'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu 'ong ngo /_/steng gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgya 'ong ste/_thams cad kyang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 
[\[249b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 
[\[249b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la bka' stsal pa/_kun tu dpa' ba khyod phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su song ste/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la deng de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por chos ston gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[249b.7\]]rten na gnas pa khyed thams cad thal mo sbyar te thud cig ces de skad smros la go bar byas ma thag tu yud tsam gyis chos nyan du slar shog shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su song nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[250a.2\]]la deng de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por chos ston gyis/_de la khyod cag gis legs so zhes bya ba gsol cig dang /_de'i phyir khyed deng nyid du phan pa dang bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[250a.3\]]kun tu dpa' ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su song nas sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur byas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbron pa ni 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[250a.4\]]po kun tu dpa' ba rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de na bram ze rnams dang /_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa rnams kyang 
[\[250a.5\]]'dus/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi mang po zhig dang /_rgyal po g.yog dang bcas pa lnga brgya tsam yang 'dus/_bdud sdig can g.yog dang bcas pa bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa gsum yang 'dus so/_/yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po rab tu 
[\[250a.6\]]g.yos so/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char rab tu bab/_lha'i me tog gi char kyang rab tu bab nas de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i spyi gtsug gi mtshams su khang pa brtsegs par kun tu gnas so/_/yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan 
[\[250a.7\]]sngar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rdo rje gsor ba dang /_de nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi rgyal po bzhi 'khrugs te/_langs nas gang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i nyal nyil dang /_phyag dar dang /_bye ma de rnams grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu bor nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]khams rnams su spos chu'i char rab tu phab/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu ta dang /_pad ma dkar po'i char kyang rab tu phab nas me tog de dag thams cad kyang sems can de dag gi spyi gtsug gi steng du me tog gi gdugs 
[\[250b.2\]]su gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong kun tu gnas te/_khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong po rnams kyis nang nas rin po che sna bdun gyi khri brgyad khri bzhi stong byung ste/_khri de dag thams cad la yang de 
[\[250b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas chos ston to/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_
[\[250b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir cho 'phrul 'di lta bu gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste dper na mi tsa ya can rgod de ba bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag 
[\[250b.5\]]gir 'dzin pa la gnas pa dbul por gyur pa la la zhig yod la de'i mgo la rgyal pos byugs pa dang /_de rgyal po'i sgo'i bar du song ste/_phyin nas nan gyis rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /_de nas rgyal po'i blon po dang /_'khor gyis de bzung nas rnam pa mang pos brdegs 
[\[250b.6\]]pa dang /_de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul po de nan gyis nang du 'gro 'dod do zhes rgyal pos thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_gdon mi za bar nga la gsod 'dod pa zhig yin no/_/snyam nas rgyal po khros te 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces khyed deng la mi de ri khrod du khrid de sod cig_/g.yog 
[\[250b.7\]]dang /_pha ma dang /_bu dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa thams cad kyang sod cig_/ces bsgo ba dang /_de nas de dag thams cad bsad nas de'i gnyen bshes thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngu mi bzad pas zug par gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos bshad pa dang /_de na mi nga rgyal can ji lta ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_mtshan dang /_dbyibs dang /_mtshan mar bzung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus 
[\[251a.2\]]yin pa snyam du sems shing de na de dag chos mang po thos nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal du lhung ste kyal pa sna tshogs smra ba dang /_bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pa'i zil gyis non nas bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i chos mi nyan mi 'chad de/_gang la la zhig mdo'am/_tshigs su bcad 
[\[251a.3\]]pa'am/_tha na dpe tsam zhig de dag la bshad na yang nga bdag gis shes so zhes de dag la mi 'dzin cing rna bas kyang mi nyan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nga rgyal can du gyur pa'i phyir te/_de dag ni mang du thos pas bag med pa'o/_/gang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang 'grogs 
[\[251a.4\]]pa de dag ni 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa byed par mi 'gyur/_de dag ni 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i tshig thos par mi 'gyur gyi de dag ni mang du thos pa des rgyags par 'gyur te/_mi de lta bu de dag ni rang gi rang bzor byas pa 'jog par byed/_rang gi gzhung gi gleng gzhi yang 'jog par 
[\[251a.5\]]byed do/_/de dag ni bdag dang 'jig rten thams cad la slu zhing don med par yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms mang po za ste zos nas kyang legs par 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_sems can de dag gis de la smras pa/_khyod kyis 
[\[251a.6\]]ni nga la bzo'i gnas mang du bslabs na ji ltar khyod bdag 'jog par mi nus/_des de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag nga ni da ltar bdag 'jog par mi nus so/_/de na sems can de dag smre sngags rnam pa sna tshogs 'don par 'gyur te/_ji ltar gzhan gyis ma lan gyis 
[\[251a.7\]]rang gi las kyi rkyen gyis gang zag de gcig pu'i phyir gnyen gyi tshogs mang po bsad par gyur pa de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smre sngags 'don cing mi dge ba'i grogs po'i phyir bdag cag sems can dmyal ba'am dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol bar mthong ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]du khyed rnams la bram ze dang /_gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/_khyed cag rgyags par ma gyur cig_/'di lta ste/_dper na bya 'dab gshog ma rdzogs par lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phur mi nus pa de bzhin du khyed rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[251b.2\]]thob par mi nus te khyed cag la de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_las kyi rnam pas bya gag gi skye gnas su skyes nas lus 'di ring po mi thogs par lus 'jig cing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur te/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de dag ro bro ba med nas bdag cag gis lus 'di ci zhig gi 
[\[251b.3\]]phyir bzung /_bdag cag gis gang lha'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang /_mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba yang ma myong la/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas la yang gnas par ma gyur te/_bdag cag gis lus 'di ni don med par bzung na bdag cag gi 'gro ba ni gang yin/_bdag cag gi rten du ni su 
[\[251b.4\]]zhig 'gyur/_gang du skye zhing gang du 'jig par 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas yongs su skrag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/_khyed cag rin po che'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yi 
[\[251b.5\]]chad par ma byed cig_/khyed chos dkon mchog las phyi rol tu ma gyur cig_/kye grogs po dag khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas khyed kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de nas bram ze dang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa 
[\[251b.6\]]pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa de dag thams cad stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gdugs mtshan du sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su bkrol 
[\[251b.7\]]yang sems can gyi khams la bri ba'am gang bar yang mi gda' na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems can de dag skye ba dang /_'gag pa mnyam par ston/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/_mu 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]stegs can dag 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang /_chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos nas 'dri ba'i gleng gzhi chen po 'dri ste/_phyi ma'i dus na sems can gzhon nu dang /_rgan po rnams skye ba dang 'jig pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde sems 
[\[252a.2\]]can rgan po dag kyang gzhon nu bzhin du ci yang mi shes pa yang yod do/_/sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu la la zhig skra bkrus nas gos gsar pa bgos te/_de khyim gyi phyi rol tu byung ba de la sems can rnams kyis khyod gos gsar pa legs par bgos so zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[252a.3\]]sems can gzhan zhig kyang mgo bkrus nas gos rnying pa yang bkrus te bgos pa dang de zegs pas mi de skra bkrus kyang mdzes par ma gyur la/_de'i gos kyang mdzes par ma gyur pa de bzhin du/_sman gyi sde 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can rgan po yod pa dag ni mdzes pa ma yin te/_sems 
[\[252a.4\]]can gzhon nu dag ni skye ba dang 'gag pa ston to/_/de nas bram ze dang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu de dag thams cad stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi nang na gzhon nu ni gang lags/_rgan po ni gang 
[\[252a.5\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed cag ni yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su tshor ba myong yang khyed da dung du ngoms mi myong bas khyed cag ni rgan pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze de dag thams cad dang /_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[252a.6\]]thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba la mi spro'o/_/gang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/sems can gzhon nu rnams las kyang 
[\[252a.7\]]gang chos nyid mngon sum du byed nus pa med do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sems can rnams mos pa dka' ba la gzigs su gsol/_bcom 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde nyon cig dang de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'jig rten thams cad mngon sum du mdzad do/_/de nas sems can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag kyang mi 
[\[252b.2\]]'tshal tshig kyang mi smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mi smra/_kun tu mi smra zhing phyag kyang mi 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 
[\[252b.3\]]yang mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde nyon cig_/sems can gzhon nu rnams kyis chos nyid mngon sum du byed mi nus so/_/zhes sems can gang de skad zer ba la/_sman gyi sde 'di dag ni khyed kyis sems can 
[\[252b.4\]]gzhon nu yin par blta'o/_/sems can de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gzhon nu lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag ni sems can gzhon nu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[252b.5\]]pa/_kye sems can 'di dag ni 'jig rten mngon sum du byed pa yin gyis/_da rang gi lus las 'jig rten gyi tshad ston cig_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi lus dang ma bral bar steng gi nam mkha' la gnas te/_sa bcu rab tu thob par gyur 
[\[252b.6\]]to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang dag 'khor ba yongs su zad par bgyi ba dang yongs su byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i sems can de lta bu ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bcom 
[\[252b.7\]]ldan 'das sems can 'di dag ni deng nyid skyes la/_bcom ldan 'das sems can 'di dag ni deng nyid yongs su grol te thams cad kyang sa bcu rab tu thob par mthong ngo //_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas bram ze dang /_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po dang /_bdud sdig can 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad lhags nas g.yo bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du mchis te chos kyi 
[\[253a.2\]]rnam grangs 'di thos nas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi bde ba 'di lta bu thob par gyur cig_/'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bur gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de de 
[\[253a.3\]]bzhin te/_ji ltar khyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags nas khyed kyis zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/des na khyed thams cad ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[253a.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu/_de nas gzhan mu stegs can de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/_thams cad kyang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur nas/_
[\[253a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la shing ta la bdun srid du mngon par 'phags nas rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul zhing thams cad kyang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs byin gyis rlob ste rdzu 'phrul mngon par 
[\[253a.6\]]'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i spyi gtsug gi steng logs su gnas te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma sna tshogs 'thor zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yid la byed de/_rang gi lus la yang sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed do/_/
[\[253a.7\]]lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad du dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rnyed pa chen po'o/_/zhing chen po'o/_/'jig rten gyi mgon no/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa'o/_/mkhas pa mkhas pa tshol ba lags te/_gang sems 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]can 'di lta bu dag thabs mkhas pas mthar gyis 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar mdzad de legs par gsungs pa gcig tsam gyis kyang sems can de snyed cig 'khor ba las yongs su grol lo zhes smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde 
[\[253b.2\]]stan las langs nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis 
[\[253b.3\]]rigs kyi bu de dag tshig 'di skad 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bgyi ba mang po bgyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa mang po mngon par 'du bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/de dag ni nga la bstod pa ma yin gyi/_rang gi lus 
[\[253b.4\]]la bstod cing rang gi lus chos kyi stan dam pa la 'jog par 'gyur/_rang gi lus las chos kyi 'od zer 'byin par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung bar 
[\[253b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa gdugs mtshan du sems 
[\[253b.6\]]can mang po zhig yongs su grol yang da dung du sems can rnams zad par ma gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/_/sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu la la 
[\[253b.7\]]zhig phyug cing nor che la longs spyod che ste/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po dang ldan la/_bran po dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi mang po dang ldan te/_de nor gyi phung po mang la zhing dang kun dga'i ra ba mang du bdog cing /_'di 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]lta ste/_nas dang /_gro dang /_'bras dang /_bal sran dang /_sran chung la sogs pa 'bru mang du bdog pa zhig yod la/_mi des dpyid kyi dus la 'bru thams cad kyi sa bon btab nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe sa bon de dag thams cad yongs su smin par gyur pa 
[\[254a.2\]]dang /_mi des 'bru de dang de dag so sor 'jog ste/_bzhag nas kyang dpyid kyi dus kyi bar du zos nas yang 'debs pa bzhin du sman gyi sde sems can rnams kyang sngon las byas pa'i las de dag thams cad yongs su zad par gyur pa dang /_de la bsod nams kyi zhing tshol te dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[254a.3\]]ba rnams bskyed do/_/bskyed nas kyang dge ba'i chos de la nan tan gyis sgrub ste chos thams cad 'phel bar byas nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba bskyed de/_sman gyi sde dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems des bskal pa bye ba'i bar du chud mi za'o/_/sman gyi sde de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[254a.4\]]dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud za ba'i chos can du nam yang mi 'gyur te/_mdor na chos thams cad rab tu shes so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam ji lta bu mthong bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[254a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam du 'jigs pa mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_las thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir ro/_/sems can sdig pa'i las can gyis ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sel bar 
[\[254a.6\]]mi nus so/_/de ni sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong yang 'jigs pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam du ji ltar 'jigs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde me rab 
[\[254a.7\]]tu 'bar ba mthong ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' des bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad tshig par rig par bya'o/_/sman gyi sde gnyis su ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa des chu brug cing rab tu brug pa mthong yang 'jigs par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]sman gyi sde de bzhin du gti mug gis bcings pa thams cad las bzlog nas sdig pa byang bar byas pa yin no/_/sman gyi sde gsum du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam na 'jigs pa chen po mthong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang lags/_
[\[254b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag gi lus kyi mgo bregs pa mthong yang sman gyi sde de la des 'jigs par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bregs pa yin te/_bdag ni 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba las rgyal ba 
[\[254b.3\]]yin no snyam mo/_/de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa yang ma yin/_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du ma yin/_lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du ma yin/_klu rnams kyi nang du ma yin/_lha rnams kyi nang du ma yin te/_sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 
[\[254b.4\]]po bskyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye ba rab tu 'dzin to/_/sman gyi sde phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na gal te sems can la la zhig byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur na des yi dam chen po bcas par blta ste/_brnyas par gnas par gyur kyang sman gyi sde 
[\[254b.5\]]de la des skyo ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya/_zhum par mi bya'o/_/sman gyi sde ngas chos mang du bstan te/_sman gyi sde ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zhig gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa spyad kyang sman gyi sde ngas longs spyod kyi phyir ram/_'tsho ba'i longs spyod kyi phyir ram/_dbang 
[\[254b.6\]]phyug gi longs spyod kyi phyir dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa ma yin gyi/_sman gyi sde chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ngas dka' ba spyod pa spyad kyang ngas de srid kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi/_sman gyi sde gang gi tshe gang gi dus na ngas zung gi chos kyi rnam 
[\[254b.7\]]grangs 'di thos pa de nyid kyi nyin mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sman gyi sde chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab bo/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa rnyed par dka'o/_/sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba yang mchog 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]tu rnyed par dka'o/_/sman gyi sde chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dag kyang mchog tu rnyed par dka'o/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[255a.2\]]sman gyi sde bskal pa stong du 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/'gog pa dang lam yang rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/_/gnas rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i gnas rab tu shes pa'i skal 
[\[255a.3\]]ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa dang dge ba'i gnas rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i gnas dang 'gog pa rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde ci'i phyir 'gog pa zhes bya/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 
[\[255a.4\]]gnas ni don zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde chos kyi gnas gang yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos zhes bgyi ba ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid dang /_tshul khrims bsrungs pa nyid dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa lags te/_chos 
[\[255a.5\]]kyi gter zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos kyi gter 'byung ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de 
[\[255a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde gang dag mang du thos pa dang ldan pa/_rab tu shes pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba 
[\[255a.7\]]shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba bde ba'i gnas 'di rab tu shes so/_/nam de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba de na sems can rnams kyis chos thams cad rab tu shes so/_/thabs mkhas pas chos rnams rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten pa 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes rnams rab tu shes so/_/gsol pa/_ye shes nyid rtogs nas mya ngan las 'das pa gang rab tu 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi 
[\[255b.2\]]sde chos rab tu shes nas chos rab tu shes so/_/sman gyi sde de bzhin du dam pa'i chos bsdu bar rab tu shes nas rnyed pa dang po skye'o/_/chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du bzung nas chos dang ldan pa nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/_dper na mi tshong par gyur pa la la zhig mi 
[\[255b.3\]]khur stong gi gser khyer te de khe spogs kyi phyir song ba dang /_de'i pha ma 'di skad smra ste/_bu nyon cig gser srang stong khyer la gzhan dang rang gi gser legs par khyer cig_/tshong pa des gser khyer te song nas zla ba gcig tsam lon pa dang gser de dag thams cad chud gsan te med 
[\[255b.4\]]par byas kyi 'og tu de nas mi des bsams pa dang shin tu mi dga' nas snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste de la gnong zhing ngo tsha nas rang gi khyim du ma song ba dang /_de'i pha mas thos nas yi chad de/_snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug nas gos dag kyang dral te bu ngan pa de bdag cag gi khyim 
[\[255b.5\]]du bu'i gzugs su skyes nas khyim so kun kyang bshig ste/_bdag cag la mkho ba med cing sdug bsngal bar byas so/_/bran gyi las byed du bcug go zhes de skad smre sngags 'don te/_de'i pha ma yi chad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /_de nas bu des pha ma bdag la yi chad de 'chi ba'i 
[\[255b.6\]]dus byas so/_/zhes thos nas bu de yang yi chad de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/_sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pas don 'di bshad pa la yang gang dag nga'i bstan pa la mi dad pa de dag ni re thag chad nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste 'chi ba'i dus byed par 
[\[255b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ji ltar pha ma de dag yi chad de gser gyi phyir mya ngan byed cing /_snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug nas gzhan dang rang gi gser gyi phyir mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa de bzhin du/_sman gyi sde gang dag nga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag ni phyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe brang brdung zhing smre 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]sngags 'don la/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing sngon las byas pa'i bsod nams dag chud zos nas phyin chad zhing bzang po dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dag mi byed de/_de dag gi snying mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pas de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[256a.2\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye zhing /_mi bzad pa drag po mthong nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di snyam du sems te/_gang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de myong 
[\[256a.3\]]bar mi 'gyur bar bdag la su zhig skyabs su 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu cig nad kyi 'jigs chen ni/_/'byung bar mi nus ji ltar bya/_/na ba 'chi bas 'jigs mod kyi/_/bu khyod 'chi ba yod ma yin/_/nad kyis 'jigs dang skrag pa las/_/
[\[256a.4\]]khyod ni thar bar 'gyur ba yin/_/bdag ni rnam par shes pa 'gag_/bdag gi lus la rab tu gnod/_/yan lag thams cad sdug bsngal te/_/bdag gis 'chi ba mthong bar gyur/_/bdag gi mig ni mi mthong zhing /_/bdag gi rna yang mi thos so/_/sna yang thob par 
[\[256a.5\]]mi 'gyur te/_/lus kyang zo mdog bde ma yin/_/yan lag nying lag sdug bsngal te/_/shing dang 'dra bas sems pa med/_/bdag gi 'chi ba 'ong med ces/_/yum gyis bdag gi spro bsring zad/_/mas smras pa/_bu khyod de skad smra mi rigs/_/nga la mchog tu 'jigs 
[\[256a.6\]]ma byed/_/khyod kyi lus la rims btab pas/_/rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur/_/bus smras pa/_lus la rims kyang ma mthong ste/_/na ba med cing sdug bsngal med/_/'chi ba shin tu mi bzad mthong /_/bdag gi lus sdug bcom par gyur/_/bdag gi 
[\[256a.7\]]lus kun sdug bsngal gyis/_/rab tu gzir bar mthong gyur na/_/su la skyabs su 'gro bar bya/_/bdag gi skyob par su zhig 'gyur/_/pha mas smras pa bu khyod la/_/lha yang rab tu bkyon gyur gyis/_/lha rnams la ni mchod byas na/_/de yi 'og tu 'tsho bar gyur/_/bus 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]smras pa/_gang gis bdag ni 'tsho 'gyur ba/_/khyod kyis de ltar mdzad du gsol/_/rings shing rab tu myur bzhud la/_/lha bon po la dri bar gsol/_/de nas de'i pha ma lha'i rten gyi drung du song nas lha la bdug pa phul ba dang /_de nas lha bon pos lha la bdug pa phul 
[\[256b.2\]]nas/_tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod la lha bkyon gyis lha rjed cig_/mchod sbyin gyis shig_/de la phyugs sod cig_/mi yang sod cig dang /_de nas khyed kyi bu nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas pha ma de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag ni 
[\[256b.3\]]dbul na ji ltar bya/_gal te lha ma mnyes na ni bu de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/_ji ste mnyes par bya na bdag cag ni dbul bas mi dang phyugs gang nas blang snyam nas de dag rings shing myur bar khyim du dong ste/_khyim gyi rdzas cung zad ci bdog pa de thams cad phyugs nyo ba'i 
[\[256b.4\]]phyir 'tshong du dong ngo /_/de nas mi gzhan zhig gi gan du phyin nas/_kye skyes bu gser zhig skyir byin skyin pa ni zhag bcu nas slar 'bul nus na ni legs/_ji ste 'bul ma nus na yang deng khyed kyi bran du khas blangs te las bya'o/_/zhes de skad smras nas de gnyis kyis gser de khyer 
[\[256b.5\]]te mi nyor dong ngo /_/de gnyis kyis mi nyos nas mi des kyang bdag bsad par ni ma shes so/_/de nas pha ma rmongs par gyur pa de gnyis slar rang gi khyim du ma dong gi lha rten gyi drung du song ste/_lha bon po la da myur du mchod sbyin mdzod cig ces smras so/_/de nas pha ma de gnyis bdag 
[\[256b.6\]]nyid kyis phyugs kyang bsad mi de yang bsad do/_/de nas lha bon po des mchod sbyin bya bar bsams te me bus pa dang /_de nas lha de babs te khyod kyi bu ni ngas khyer ro zhes smras so/_/de nas pha ma de gnyis dga' zhing mgu bas khyab nas bu 'di sos na bdag cag bran du gyur kyang bla 
[\[256b.7\]]zhes smras te/_pha mas lha la mchod sbyin byas nas slar log ste rang gi khyim du phyin nas bu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa mthong ngo /_/de nas pha ma de gnyis sdug bsngal zhing yi mug pa chen pos snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngu zug ste yi chad par gyur nas de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/_
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]sman gyi sde mi dge ba'i grogs po dang bsten par mi bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gang du skye ba zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde kha rog nga la ma 'dri shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zhu'o/_/bde bar 
[\[257a.2\]]gshegs pa zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde de la ma ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du skyes so/_/pha ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du skyes so/_/bu ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar skyes so/_/lha bon po ni 
[\[257a.3\]]sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi ma nongs pa de gang du skyes de'i tshe slad ma gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde 'di la mi mnyes pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/
[\[257a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis mi de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde nyon cig_/mi de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad pas sangs rgyas la phyag 
[\[257a.5\]]'tshal lo zhes lan cig smras te/_sman gyi sde dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa drug cu'i bar du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_skye ba dang skye bar mya ngan gyi zug rngu thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes 
[\[257a.6\]]ma thag tu sdug bsngal thams cad zlog par byed do/_/sems can de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar ni mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar rngo thogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[257a.7\]]pa/_sman gyi sde brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus brtsam pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde nyon cig_/brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu rnams ston pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]bu zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni 
[\[257b.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang /_byang chub kyi gnas zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas te/_sman gyi sde 'di dag ni brtson 
[\[257b.3\]]'grus kyi gnas zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_dper na mi la la zhig gis shing zhig bskyed na de nyid kyi nyin mo shing 
[\[257b.4\]]de'i rtsa ba zug nas de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba de dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu song ngo /_/mi gzhan zhig gis kyang de bzhin du shing bskyed pa dang /_de nyid kyi nyin mo rlung gis bskyod de shing de rtsa ba ma zug nas/_de nas mi des gnas de nas shing de phyung ba dang /_mi cig shos kyis kyang ci'i 
[\[257b.5\]]phyir nga'i sa brkos zhes 'thab 'breg rtsod par gyur nas/_de'i tshe rgyal pos mi de gnyis 'thab 'breg rtsod par gyur to/_/zhes thos nas/_rgyal po des pho nya btang ste/_song la mi de gnyis khrid de shog shig_/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes mi de rings pa'i gzugs su brgyugs 
[\[257b.6\]]nas mi de gnyis la 'di skad ces khyed la rgyal po 'bod do zhes smras pa dang /_de nas mi gcig ni 'jigs shing skrag go/_/mi gcig ni 'jigs shing skrag pa med par rgyal po ga la ba der khrid do/_/khrid nas rgyal po'i mdun du 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal pos mi de gnyis la 'di 
[\[257b.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/kye khyed ci zhig gi phyir 'thab cing rtsod par gyur/_de nas mi de gnyis langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po gsan du gsol/_bdag cag la ni sa phyogs cung zad kyang ma mchis kyi sa g.yar po zhig la shing bskyed pa las rlung gis 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]bskyod nas rtsa ba yang ma zug lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu yang ma byung ste/_rgyal po chen po de'i rtsa ba dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu yang mchis pa dang /_khyod kyis nyes so zhes mi 'dis bdag la thab mo brgal du bas kyi bdag gis ni ma nongs na lha de la bdag gis cung zad kyang 
[\[258a.2\]]ma nongs par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas rgyal po des blon po bye ba phrag sum cu bkug ste/_bsogs nas 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyed cag smros shig_/blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_ji skad smra bar bgyi/_gang gi nyin mo shing bskyed pa de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba zug nas lo ma 
[\[258a.3\]]dang me tog dang 'bras bu 'byung ba de khyed kyis gang na yang mthong ngam/_thos sam khyed kyis zhag bdun nam zla phyed kyis 'di bye brag phyed par gyis shig_/de nas blon po de dag stan las langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po chen po bdag cag gis 'di bye brag phyed par bgyir 
[\[258a.4\]]mi rung ngo /_/'di bye brag phyed par rngo mi thogs so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ni ngo mtshar te/_re shig mi 'di nyid la rma bar bgyi'o/_/kye skyes bu gang smras pa'i don bden nam smros shig_/smras pa rgyal po chen po don de mad do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gang gi nyin mo shing bskyed pa/_/de yi nyin 
[\[258a.5\]]mo rtsa zug cing /_/'dab ma me tog 'bras byung zhes/_/de nyid nyin mo smra ba ni/_/khyod kyi tshig 'di 'thad par dka'/_/'di 'dra mthong ba'am thos pa med/_/de nas mi des thal sbyar te/_/rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/_/gshegs la nyid kyis shing bskyed de/_/rtsa ba zug la gzigs 
[\[258a.6\]]su gsol/_/de nas rgyal po de blon po bye ba phrag sum cu dang lhan cig phyi rol tu byung nas mi de gnyis kyang btson rar bcug go/_/de nas rgyal po de nyid kyis shing bskyed pa dang /_shing de rtsa ba yang ma zug_/lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu yang ma byung nas de nas rgyal po de khros te 'di skad 
[\[258a.7\]]ces khyed myur du deng la shing gshegs pa'i sta re rnams long shig_/ces smras nas blangs pa dang /_de nas gang mi des bskyed pa'i shing de la khros nas shing de'i lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu byung ba rnams bcad de shing gcig po de bcad pa dang shing bcu gnyis byung ngo /_/shing bcu gnyis po 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]bcad pa dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtsa ba dang bcas/_lo ma dang bcas/_myu gu dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ngo /_/de nas shing nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag las bya gser gyi ze ba can/_gser gyi mchu can/_rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma can nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[258b.2\]]de khro ba'i zil gyis non nas rang gi lag gis sta re blangs te shing de la gtsabs pa dang /_shing gtsabs pa de las bdud rtsi'i chu byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po de yid mi bde nas song la mi de gnyis btson ra nas phyung shig ces bsgo ba dang /_lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes de'i mod la rab tu brgyugs te/_
[\[258b.3\]]mi de gnyis btson ra nas phyung nas shing ga la ba der khrid pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shing gcig bcad pa gnyis gyur du 'phel te nyi shu rtsa bzhir gyur pa de khyed kyis bskyed dam/_ngas bskyed pa'i shing ni rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu yang ma skyes so/_/de nas mi des 
[\[258b.4\]]gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag gi bsod nams ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i bsod nams khyod la mi mnga'o/_/de nas blon po bye ba phrag sum cus pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs nas mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po snga ma 'di ni mi rung gis khyod kyis rgyal po bya dgos so/_/de nas mi des 
[\[258b.5\]]blon po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal po longs spyod bdag mi dgos/_/nor dang 'bru yang dgos pa med/_/sangs rgyas rnams la bdag dad pas/_/rkang gnyis dag gi mchog tu shog_/zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings/_/gang na de bzhin gshegs par 
[\[258b.6\]]'gro/_/mya ngan 'das khyim 'gro 'gyur ba/_/chos 'di khyed la bshad par bya/_/skyil mo krung ni bcas nas su/_/de nas yi dam rab bcas so/_/bdag gis sngon byas las rnams kyis/_/rgyal po'i btson rar phyin par gyur/_/smon lam 'di ni btab pas na/_/bdag gi las ni 
[\[258b.7\]]zad par gyur/_/de nas bya bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis rdo rje'i mchus sil snyan rnams dkrol to/_/de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na khang pa brtsegs pa sum khri nyis stong byung ste/_khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga par gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re re las kyang bya 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]gser gyi ze ba can/_gser gyi mchu can gser gyi gdong can bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga byung ste/_de dag gis mi'i skad du smras pa/_rgyal po khyod kyis legs ma byas/_/khyod kyis shing de bcad pas na/_/bye ba brgya yi shing rnams las/_/nyi shu rtsa 
[\[259a.2\]]bzhir gnas par gyur/_/sems can gang gis shing bskyed 'di/_/ci 'dra shes pa ma yin pa/_/sdig pa'i las kyis phyin chad kyang /_/mi sdug 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag gis don 'di mi shes kyis/_/dka' thub chen po lung ston 
[\[259a.3\]]cig_/bya rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni 'jig rten snang byed de/_/rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba yin/_/'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra las/_/sems can thams cad thar byed pa'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gang gis shing ni ma skyes pa/_/skyes bu gnyis pa de gang yin/_/
[\[259a.4\]]des ni sdig pa'i las gang byas/_/gnyis skyes rnams ni smra bar byos/_/bya rnams kyis smras pa/_gang gi shing ni ma skyes pa/_/de ni lha sbyin glen pa ste/_/dge ba cung zad ma byas na/_/de yi shing ni ji ltar skye/_/de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po bye ba phrag sum cu po 
[\[259a.5\]]rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thams cad kyang sa bcu la rab tu gnas te/_mngon par shes pa so sor thob par gyur to/_/rgyal po de yang sa bcu la gnas nas dge ba'i chos mngon par rtogs pa rjes su thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[259a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis blon po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gsum po rnams sa bcu la gnas te/_mngon par shes pa so sor thob par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde nyon 
[\[259a.7\]]cig dang lung bstan par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs/_kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te/_slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/
[\[259b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[259b.3\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/_rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[259b.4\]]stsal pa/_sman gyi sde phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skye bo'i tshogs nga'i gan du 'ong ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde de'i phyir skye bo'i tshogs la rnam par rtogs te ltos shig_/
[\[259b.5\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes rnam par bltas pa dang /_shar phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas/_de'i phyogs gcig na skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/_mi dag mi smra/_mi zer/_mi brjod/_mi za/_
[\[259b.6\]]mi ldang /_mi 'chag ste/_cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_lho phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/_de dag kyang mi zer mi smra/_kun tu mi smra/_yongs su mi brjod/_mi ldang /_mi 'chag ste/_cang mi smra 
[\[259b.7\]]bar 'khod pa dang /_nub phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/_de dag kyang mi zer/_mi smra/_kun tu mi smra/_yongs su mi brjod/_mi ldang /_mi 'chag ste/_cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_byang phyogs nas shing 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas/_de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/_de dag kyang mi zer mi smra/_kun tu mi smra/_yongs su mi brjod/_mi ldang /_mi 'chag ste/_cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_'og gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad 
[\[260a.2\]]bdun stong pa cig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/_de dag kyang mi zer/_mi smra/_kun tu mi smra/_yongs su mi brjod/_mi ldang /_mi 'chag ste/_cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_steng gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas/_
[\[260a.3\]]de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/_de dag kyang mi zer/_mi smra/_kun tu mi smra/_yongs su mi brjod/_mi ldang /_mi 'chag ste/_cang mi smra bar 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman 
[\[260a.4\]]gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de 
[\[260a.5\]]skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[260a.6\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten nas skye bo'i tshogs mang po lhags shing gnas pa nas 'og dang steng phyogs kyi bar nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba 
[\[260a.7\]]stong phrag lnga bcu lhags shing gnas par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde khyod song la 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas lhags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la khyod nyid kyis zhus shig_/gsol pa/_su'i rdzu 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mchi bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed par song shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te de nyid du mi snang bar 
[\[260b.2\]]gyur nas/_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te/_'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba can gyi zhing zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgyad cus yongs 
[\[260b.3\]]su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[260b.4\]]btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar skye bo'i tshogs phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing lhags pa dag de na mchis pa'i tshe ni mthong la 'di na mchis pa'i tshe mi mthong 
[\[260b.5\]]bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde de nyid na rgyu zhing gnas so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang ji lta bu lags/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin 
[\[260b.6\]]gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te mchis pa na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de dag tu sems can ji snyed mthong ba de snyed ni gang na yang ma mthong ngo /_/
[\[260b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can de dag ni sems pa med pa'i shing las byung ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang sems pa ma mchis pa'i shing las ni byung ba sus mthong sus thos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde gang sems pa med pa'i 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]shing las mi 'byung ba khyod kyis ma mthong ma thos sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde khyod mthong bar 'dod na deng ngas bstan par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[261a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal lo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing nas phyag rkyang ba dang phyag de las skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya byung ste/_skye bo'i tshogs re res kyang lag pa brgya brgya brkyang nas spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa sna tshogs de bzhin 
[\[261a.3\]]gshegs pa la gtor ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa gtor ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/
[\[261a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye bo'i tshogs byung ba 'di dag ni sems pa med pa'o/_/mi 'di dag ni sems pa med pa'o/_/de nas mi bye ba stong phrag brgya po de dag re re zhing yang gang lag pa brgya brgya yod pa de dag thams cad lhung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[261a.5\]]dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags/_bde bar gshegs pa 'di ci zhig lags/_gang mi rnams kyi lag pa brgya po yang yud tsam gyis lhung ste/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 
[\[261a.6\]]lag pa brgya pa yang grol bar mi 'gyur na/_lag pa gnyis pa'i mi lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde de bzhin du sems can rnams ni sems pa med par skye'o/_/sems pa med par 'gag go/_/sman gyi sde de'i lus kyang sems pa 
[\[261a.7\]]med par gyur par shes par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang sems can de dag la gzhon pa gang lags/_rgan pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde sems can gzhon pa yang yod/_rgan pa yang yod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]ldan 'das gzhon pa gang lags/_rgan pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dag da ltar lhung ba de dag ni rgan pa'o/_/gang dag shing rnams las skyes pa de dag ni gzhon pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu rnams 
[\[261b.2\]]mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing gis phyag g.yas pa'i mthil brkyang ba dang /_de nas phyogs bcu nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya brgya 'ong ngo /_/'og dang steng gi phyogs nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba phrag lnga bcu lnga bcu 'ong ste/_skye 
[\[261b.3\]]bo'i tshogs de dag lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra/_kun tu mi smra zhing cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad 
[\[261b.4\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra/_kun tu mi smra zhing cang mi mchi bar mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde khyod mi shes sam/_sa phyogs ni sems pa med de mi smra/_kun tu mi 
[\[261b.5\]]smra zhing chos kyi phung po yang mi shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sman gyi sde 'di la sems can gzhon nu kha cig ni mthong yang skye ba mi shes/_'gag pa dang /_rga ba dang /_nad dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa 
[\[261b.6\]]dang /_mdza' ba dang /_bye ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de dag thams cad mi shes te/_mthong yang yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur na shes par lta ga la 'gyur te/_sman gyi sde de dag yang dang yang bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[261b.7\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang chos ma 'tshal ba'i sems can gzhon nu de dag gang nas mchis/_gang nas 'chi 'pho zhing gang du skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pa/_sman gyi sde nyon cig_/mi'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa de dag ni dngul mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/_zangs mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/_shing mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/_rdza mkhan gyis kyang ma byas te/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pas kyang ma byas kyi/_gzhan 
[\[262a.2\]]du na skyes pa dang bud med 'dus pa dang sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa las byung ngo /_/sems can de dag kyang yang dang yang bzo'i las rnams slob pas de dag gi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa mtha' yas pa dang /_tshor ba mi bzad pa 'byung ste/_der de dag sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas 
[\[262a.3\]]pa'i rnam par smin pa myong ngo /_/sman gyi sde 'di nyid du gang sems can gzhon nu lhags pa mi ldang ba 'di dag ni 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/_sman gyi sde de'i phyir mi smra/_kun tu mi smra'o/_/sman gyi sde de ltar na sems can gzhon nu de dag ni dge ba yang mi 
[\[262a.4\]]shes/_skye ba yang mi shes/_'gag pa yang mi shes te/_de dag mi'i lus kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag kyang sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu rnams ji ltar skye/_ji ltar 'gag_/bcom ldan 
[\[262a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/_dper na mi la la zhig gis me la shing gis reg par byas pa dang /_shing de la mthar gyis me 'bar ba de bzhin du/_sman gyi sde thog ma mi'i lus su skye'o/_/skyes nas gdod tshor ba myong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[262a.6\]]'das su zhig 'dir mngon par skye/_skyes nas su zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde sangs rgyas nyid skyes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal pos mi la la zhig 
[\[262a.7\]]bcings te khang pa mun pa mun nag gi nang du btson rar bcug pa dang /_mi de khang pa mun nag der zhugs nas khang pa mun nag la khang pa mun nag tu mthong ngo /_/de nas mi gzhan sngon sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg pa zhig gis mthong nas mi de ni ma rung bar gyur to/_/sngon sdug bsngal ma myong bas 'tsho 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]ba srog chad par 'gyur ro/_/snyam bsams nas des der me khyer te 'ongs nas khyim de'i nang du me [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig bor ba dang /_mi btson rar bcug pa des me de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dbugs phyin par gyur te spro ba skyes so/_/me de yang rgyu gang gis 'bar ba'i me 'bar ba des khyim 
[\[262b.2\]]de kun tu 'bar bar gyur nas mi de yang de nyid du tshig pa dang /_de tshig go zhes rgyal pos thos nas mi dga' ste/_de 'di snyam du phyin cad ni bdag gi yul du sems can gang yang btson rar mi gzhug go snyam du sems so/_/de nas rgyal po des rang gi yul na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/_
[\[262b.3\]]kye sems can khyed cag ma 'jigs shig_/ma skrag shig_/khyed cag 'jigs par ma gyur cig_/phyin chad nga'i yul du chad pas gcad pa'am/_btson rar gzhug par mi bya'o/_/sems can gang yang srog dang dbral bar mi bya/_kye sems can khyed rnams ma 'jigs shig ces de ltar 
[\[262b.4\]]dbugs phyung ba de bzhin du/_sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'o/_/ji ltar khyim tshig nas mi nyid kyi lus kyang tshig ste/_sems can rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs nas sems can bcings pa yang 
[\[262b.5\]]bcings pa las yongs su thar bar byed pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi dri ma spangs te/_sems can thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du 'jig rten du byung nas sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_
[\[262b.6\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi lus rnams las yongs su thar bar mdzad cing sems can gzhon nu dang /_rgan po rnams kyang yongs su thar bar mdzad do/_/de nas steng gi bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/rgyal ba'i zhing ni ngo mtshar zhing /_/zhing [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mngon par 'dus 
[\[262b.7\]]byas pa/_/de la sa bon btab pa ni/_/rnam par chud zar mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba'i zhing ni dag pa'i zhing /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bsngags pa ste/_/sems can thams cad bzung ba'i phyir/_/ston pas kyang ni thabs mdzad do/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings gnas kyang /_/sa yi steng na kun tu snang /_/
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]rtag tu 'jig rten zhi byas nas/_/sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams sbyong /_/sems can gzhon nu thar bar byed/_/rgan po rnams kyang thar bar byed/_/sems can thams cad khams gsum las/_/mthar gyis yongs su thar bar byas/_/sems can dmyal 
[\[263a.2\]]ba'i sgo bcad de/_/dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thar bar byas/_/'jig rten 'di yang zhi byas nas/_/'jig rten pha rol bde bar byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas/_bka' stsal pa/_legs pa rnams ni mthong na legs/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong na 
[\[263a.3\]]legs/_/dam chos yon tan zhing yang legs/_/dge 'dun 'dus pa mthong na legs/_/zung bstan pa yang legs pa ste/_/sdig pa rnam par 'jig pa legs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal 
[\[263a.4\]]mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can gzhon nu 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[263a.5\]]ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde 'di dag thams cad ni deng nyid du sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dpag tshad brgyad khri srid 
[\[263a.6\]]kyi steng gi nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /_lha bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs so/_/sems can gzhon nu de dag kyang thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bar snang la gnas 
[\[263a.7\]]bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te/_des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgras gang bar gyur pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis su skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgra de nyan to/_/lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang sgra de la nyan to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi klu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'khrugs so/_/srin po bye ba stong phrag sum cu yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir lhags so/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa 
[\[263b.2\]]lnga yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus pa chen po kun tu 'dus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gzhon nu de dag la chos bstan pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[263b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po bye ba stong phrag brgya rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags so//_//bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom 
[\[263b.4\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'dus shing mchis pa mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang klu 'dus shing mchis pa yang mang ngo /_/srin po bye ba phrag du ma zhig kyang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor 
[\[263b.5\]]nas lhags te 'dus nas mchis par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu mar shog_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis steng nas 
[\[263b.6\]]babs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi ba/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[263b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su btsal nas kyang sdig pa thams cad spong ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gzhon nu mi tshangs par spyod pa spangs nas gdon mi za bar gzungs 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]rab tu 'thob par 'gyur zhing chos thams cad dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis sems can mang po zhig 'dus shing chos kyi phung po nyan/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[264a.2\]]chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde gang dag skye ba nyid du sdug bsngal du mi nyan/_rga ba nyid du sdug bsngal du mi nyan/_nad nyid sdug bsngal dang /_mya ngan sdug bsngal dang /_smre sngags 'don pa sdug bsngal dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba dang sdug bsngal dang /_mi 
[\[264a.3\]]sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal du mi nyan pa'i sems can yang phal cher yod do/_/'chi ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyir lus dang srog 'phrog pa yin te/_sman gyi sde 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad ces bya'o/_/de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/_
[\[264a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed dang sems can thams cad kyang 'chi'o/_/de dag gis 
[\[264a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'chi ba'i dus kyis non par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'chi ba'i dus na rnam par shes pa tha ma la rnam par shes pa 'gag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang /_rnam par shes pa 'khrul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 
[\[264a.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa 'khrugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang /_rigs kyi bu rlung gsum po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la klong bar 'gyur/_'khrul bar 'gyur/_'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam 
[\[264a.7\]]par shes pa 'gag pa na lus 'joms par bgyid pa'i rlung gsum po gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag mtshon zhes bya ba dang /_skul ba zhes bya ba dang /_zed pa zhes bya bas lus 'joms par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lus zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag kun tu 'bar ba zhes kyang bya/_tshig pa zhes kyang bya/_ngar snabs zhes kyang bya/_sgregs pa zhes kyang bya/_dur khrod pa zhes kyang bya/_ngan pa'i blo zhes kyang bya/_khur lci ba zhes kyang bya/_skye bas yongs su 
[\[264b.2\]]gzir ba zhes kyang bya/_skye bas kun tu dkrugs pa zhes kyang bya/_srog yongs su gdung ba zhes kyang bya/_'chi ba dang sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa zhes kyang bya ste/_grogs po dag 'di rnams ni lus zhes bya'o/_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'gum/_
[\[264b.3\]]ji ltar 'tsho/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa bsod nams zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba'o/_/grogs po dag lus zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba ste/_rgyus pa bye bas ni dkris/_spu'i khung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang 
[\[264b.4\]]ni ldan/_yan lag khri nyis stong gis ni sbrel/_rus pa sum brgya drug cus ni brtan/_lus kyi nang na srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni gnas te/_srog chags de dag thams cad la yang 'chi ba yang yod/_'chi ba 'gag pa yang yod do/_/nam mi de 'chi ba de na srog chags de dag 
[\[264b.5\]]thams cad re thag chad par 'gyur te/_de na srog chags thams cad gcig la gcig za bas rlung 'khrug cing g.yo bar 'gyur te/_de na de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo /_/la la ni bu'i phyir mya ngan byed/_la la ni bu mo'i phyir mya ngan byed/_la la ni gnyen gyi phyir mya ngan byed de/_de 
[\[264b.6\]]dag thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug go/_/gcig la gcig za bar brtsams nas de dag gcig gis gcig zos te srog chags gnyis shig las pa na de gnyis kyang zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thabs te zhag bdun 'das pa dang /_srog chags gcig ni bcom mo/_/gcig ni thar 
[\[264b.7\]]to/_/tshe dang ldan pa chos zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar srog chags rnams gcig la gcig mi 'thun par byas nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams kyang gcig la gcig mi 'thun pa byed de/_skye bas mi 'jigs/_rga bas mi 'jigs/_
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]nad kyis mi 'jigs/_'chi bas mi 'jigs/_ji ltar srog chags gnyis 'thab pa bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang phan tshun 'thab po/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus na skyes bu dge ba rnams kyis smras pa/_skyes bu khyod ci zhig la yid rton/_ci khyod kyis nyes 
[\[265a.2\]]pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngam/_skye ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/_rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/_'chi ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis skye ba'i nyes pa yang mthong ngo /_/rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa yang mthong ngo /_/thams cad kyi tha mar 'chi ba'i 
[\[265a.3\]]nyes pa yang mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bya ba ma byas/_ci'i phyir 'jig rten gnyi gar bde ba 'phel ba'i chos kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma byas/_grogs po dag gnyis su yang dri'o/_/khyod ci'i phyir skye ba dang /_'chi ba las yongs su thar 
[\[265a.4\]]ba'i dge ba'i tshogs ma byas/_khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so sor brtag pa ma byas/_ji ltar khyed kyis sa la gaN+DI rdung ba'i sgra ma thos/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing la dge ba'i sa bon bskrun cing spos sam/_phreng ba'am/_mar me sbyin pa byin pa ma mthong /_de 
[\[265a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa la bza' ba dang /_bca' ba 'bul ba dang /_'khor bzhi tshim par byas pa yang ma mthong /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag ni 'khor bzhi'o/_/de ltar de la phan pa'i phyir smras te/_
[\[265a.6\]]bsnyad pa dang /_lha cung zad kyang ma bgyis so/_/mi khyod kyis ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas mi dge ba byas so/_/de'i tshe mi shi ba de la chos kyi rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung mthong zhing /_/gaN+DI rdung ba thos gyur la/_/
[\[265a.7\]]mya ngan 'das pa zhir 'gro ba'i/_/chos bstan thos kyang ma byas so/_/de nas mi des slar smras pa/_/bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur te/_/sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song nas/_/'dod pas 'khrul pa'i sems kyis su/_/bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so/_/'dod pa dag kyang 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bsten pa dang /_/bdag gis srog chags rnams kyang bsad/_/dge 'dun rnams kyang chud gsan pas/_/mi bzad de yi 'bras bu 'ong /_/gnod par sems pa'i yid kyis su/_/bdag gis mchod rten bshig pa byas/_/tshig ngan rnams kyang rab tu smras/_bdag gis 
[\[265b.2\]]ma yang gdung bar byas/_/bdag gis lus kyis gang byas pa/_/nyes pa dag kyang rab tu shes/_/sems dmyal chen po ngu 'bod du/_/shin tu mi bzad skye ba mthong /_/bsdus gzhom du yang tshor ba myong /_/de bzhin rab tu tsha ba dang /_/mnar med chen po mi bzad par/_/
[\[265b.3\]]tshor ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur/_/pad ma lta bur cher gas pa'i/_/sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal du/_/thig nag btab pa 'jigs chen du/_/lan brgya bar du skye bar 'gyur/_/sems dmyal sems can bsad nas su/_/phyis kyang 'jigs pa de mthong ste/_/
[\[265b.4\]]dpag tshad brgyar ni yang dang yang /_/'jigs pa chen por ltung bar 'gyur/_/de dag sgo rnyed mi 'gyur te/_/phyis kyang mun par rab tu ltung /_/spu gri zhes bya sems dmyal du/_/spu gri stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/_/spu gri mdun du 'byung 'gyur te/_/
[\[265b.5\]]bdag gis nyes pa'i las byas pas/_/de dag gis ni de lus gtubs/_/rlung 'khrugs chen po mi bzad pas/_/lus de thams cad 'jig par byed/_/rtag tu 'di 'dra'i sems dmyal du/_/bdag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_/lus ni rab tu sdug bsngal bar/_/sems 
[\[265b.6\]]can kun gyis bdag mthong ngo /_/khyim so bya phyir gzhan dag gi/_/nor yang rab tu bdag gis blangs/_/bdag gi bu pho bu mo dang /_/de bzhin phu nu sring mo dang /_/bdag gi pha ma'ang de bzhin te/_/mdza' bo gnyen bshes mang po dang /_/bran dang las byed rnams dang ni/_/
[\[265b.7\]]de bzhin ba dang phyugs dang g.yog_/dgos pa ngan la bdag 'khrul te/_/gser dang dngul gyi snod rnams dang /_/de bzhin phra rab gos rnams dang /_/khyim byed bcug pas 'khrul pa ste/_/khyim yang shin tu bkra byas nas/_/skyes pa bud med lang long dang /_/pi bang sil 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]snyan 'khrol ba la/_/bdag yid ma dul dga' bar 'gyur/_/spos chu dag gis lus bkrus kyang /_/da dung byas pa gzo ba med/_/lus khyod sems pa med pa ste/_/nga ni khyod kyi ched la 'khrul/_/phyin chad sems can 'ga' tsam yang /_/bdag la skyob 
[\[266a.2\]]par 'gyur ba med/_/rlung 'khrug chen po mi bzad par/_/lus ni yongs su gdung ba na/_/ro dang ldan pa zhim zos te/_/lces kyang sna tshogs de bzhin no/_/phreng ba sna tshogs bzang mdzes pa/_/rab tu mang po mgo la bcings/_/mig ni gzugs kyis 'khrul byas te/_/
