[\[266a.3\]]mig gi skyabs ni yod ma yin/_/bdag gis mthong nas gang byas pa/_/sdig pa rnams ni mig gi rgyu/_/lag pa rdo rjes bcad pa ni/_/bdag gi rna ba'i rgyu yin no/_/lag pa gnyis la gdu bu btags/_/sor mo rnams la sor gdub bcug_/mgul du mu tig se mo do/_/
[\[266a.4\]]rkang pa gnyis kyang rab tu brgyan/_/de la dra ba byas pa dang /_/de la gser yang gnas par byas/_/lus la rin chen sna tshogs dang /_/gser gyi gdu bu'ang de bzhin no/_/longs spyod chen pos rab rtses nas/_/yid kyang shin tu rtag par gyur/_/rab tu 'jam la bdag reg nas/_/
[\[266a.5\]]shin tu sred pas de bsten to/_/gding ba sna tshogs mal cha yis/_/bdag gis lus ni rtser bcug go/_/spos chu bzang pos khrus byas te/_/spos rnams kyis kyang rab tu bskus/_/lha rdzas ga pur tsan dan gyi/_/bdug pa rnams kyis rab tu bdugs/_/kha dog bzang po byas nas 
[\[266a.6\]]kyang /_/gla rtsi ldan pas rab tu bsgos/_/lo lon 'bru mar dri dag dang /_/sna ma tsam pa ka la sogs/_/bskus nas phra mo ka shi ka/_/dkar po'i gos kyang rab tu bgos/_/glang po'i rgyab nas babs nas su/_/rta yi rgyab tu mngon par zhon/_/bdag ni rgyal po yin snyam sems/_/
[\[266a.7\]]skye bo bdag gi mdun na rgyug_/glu gar shin tu bslabs pa yi/_/slas rnams kyang ni rab tu shes/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams ni ma nyes par/_/bdag gis mdas kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bsad/_/'jig rten phyi ma ma shes pas/_/bdag gis 'di 'dra'i sdig byas shing /_/bdag gis gzhan gyi sha 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]zos pas/_/de phyir bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di/_/mi bzad 'ong bar 'gyur ba yi/_/'chi ba bdag gis ma shes te/_/bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur pas/_/bdag gi lus kyang gso ba byas/_/deng ni bdag la 'chi 'ong na/_/skyabs byed pa ni su yang med/_/gnyen 
[\[266b.2\]]rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang /_/nga yi gdong du bltar ci yod/_/ci zhig phyir ni gos 'dral zhing /_/ci phyir ngu zhing smre sngags 'don/_/ci phyir skra rnams rab 'jig cing /_/ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed/_/ci phyir mgo la rdul 'thor zhing /_/brang yang rab tu rdung bar 
[\[266b.3\]]byed/_/bdag gson tshe na sdig pa rnams/_/spang bar bya rigs khyed ci mdud/_/bdag gi lus ni spyang ki dang /_/khyi dang bya rog rnams dang ni/_/bya rnams kyis kyang bza' bar 'gyur/_/lus 'di dgos pa med par gsos/_/'chi ba'i sbrul dang ldan gyur nas/_/mi ni rtag 
[\[266b.4\]]tu skye bar 'gyur/_/'jigs pa 'di las grol 'gyur ba/_/de lta bu yi sman rnams bsten/_/bdag la sman pas gang byin pa'i/_/sman de dgos pa ma yin na/_/nyon mongs sbrul las thar byed pa/_/da ltar chos kyi sman rnams ni/_/'chi kar bdag la sbyin par byos/_/
[\[266b.5\]]sha ni nga la ma sbyin cig_/lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni/_/gdon mi za bar 'jig par 'gyur/_/gang phyir sdug bsngal sbyin gyur pa/_/sdig gi phung po ci phyir blangs/_/lus 'di shin tu gsos byas kyang /_/bya ba ma rungs byed par 'gyur/_/bu dang bu mo ci zhig phyir/_/nga la 
[\[266b.6\]]mig gis lta bar byed/_/na ba 'di las nga skyobs shig_/don med par ni ci phyir ngu /_/bu dang bu mo khyed cag dag_/nga ni ma rung ma byed cig_/khyed cag gso bar bya ba'i phyir/_/ngas ni gzhan gyi nor yang phrogs/_/da ni 'chi dus bab pa na/_/re thag chad kyis ci zhig byed/_/
[\[266b.7\]]skye dang ngan 'gros rab tu 'jigs/_/'chi bas kyang ni yongs su gzir/_/tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang /_/reg pa shin tu tshor ba'o/_/sred pas byis pa rnams kyang 'khyam/_/mi bzad 'bras bu rnams kyang thob/_/ngan pa'i rigs su skye ba ni/_/der yang mya ngan bcings par 'gyur/_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]bdag la bsod nams chung shes nas/_/skye bo gzhan dag mya ngan byed/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims yongs su nyams/_/chos la yang ni rgyab kyis phyogs/_/yang skye ba ni mi shes pas/_/nyon mongs sbrul gyis nyon mongs pa/_/ma rig pas ni byis 
[\[267a.2\]]pa rnams/_/gang na thar pa med par 'khyam/_/thar pa'i don ni mi shes nas/_/'khrul pas sdig pa rnams kyang byed/_/nyon mongs rnams kyis byis pa 'khyam/_/yid ni rtag tu rnam par 'khrugs/_/bcing ba sna tshogs ldan lus la/_/mes ni kun tu 'bar zhing tshig_/
[\[267a.3\]]gang na bde ba med pa der/_/lus ni rnam par 'khrul pas 'khyam/_/gang las shin tu bde 'byung ba/_/bde ba de ni mi shes te/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni bde ba sbyin/_/chos kyi 'khor lo sman gyi mchog_/tshul khrims bden pa'i tshul khrims so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[267a.4\]]tshangs dbyangs yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde sems can dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_de ltar smre sngags 'don kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par de 
[\[267a.5\]]dag gi skyob par 'gyur ba su yang med do zhes bka' de skad stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsungs so/_/sdig pa'i las ni byas pas na/_/sems can dmyal ba rnams su ltung /_/sreg pa'i gos ni gyon par 'gyur/_/skom du lcags khu 'thung bar 'gyur/_/lus rnams la ni 
[\[267a.6\]]me mdag 'bab/_/tshig nas rab tu mi bzad du/_/sems can dmyal ba 'jigs chen du/_/de yi lus ni rab tu 'tshig_/bde ba dag ni mi shes shing /_/chos kyang rnam par mi shes te/_/chos ma yin pas byis pa 'khyam/_/bde ba cung zad rnyed mi 'gyur/_/dad dang tshul khrims 
[\[267a.7\]]phun sum tshogs/_/shes rab ldan zhing dka' thub che/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir/_/brtson 'grus kyi ni mchog rtsoms la/_/sems can thams cad yongs bzung ba/_/dge ba'i las kyi 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]chos ston cig_/byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin du/_/tshangs spyod mchog la snyoms par zhugs/_/sman sde de skad thos nas kyang /_/mchog tu bsgrub par 'gyur bar bya/_/rnam grol mthong dang sangs rgyas dang /_/sgra bsgrags rnam par 'dren pa dang /_/'jig rten gyi ni pha dang ma/_/de ni byang 
[\[267b.2\]]chub sems zhes bya/_/'jig rten du ni chos 'di gang ston pa/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu rab rnyed dka'/_/sangs rgyas bstan la gang dag sus nyan pa/_/de dag bla med sangs rgyas bde gshegs 'gyur/_/zhi ba sangs rgyas sras rnams la/_/gang dag gus dang bcas 'gyur ba/_/de dag kyang 
[\[267b.3\]]ni sems can kun/_/thar byed 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du dog sa 'di dag g.yo rab tu g.yo/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[267b.4\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sman gyi sde ci mthong ltos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bltas pa dang /_phyogs bzhi nas gas pa mthong ngo /_/sa gas pas sa gas pa'i phrag nas mi 
[\[267b.5\]]bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang /_'og gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang /_steng gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga byung ba mthong ngo /_/de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis rnam par bltas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir su dag skyes/_
[\[267b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed cag skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag la ltos/_de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag ni khyed la bde ba'i phyir skyes so/_/gsol pa/_sems can 'di dag 
[\[267b.7\]]kyang 'gum par 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag de bzhin te/_sems can thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sems can gzhon nu snga ma gang dag thog ma nyid du skyes pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni yang skye ba dang 'gum pa la blta bar mi spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na brtson 'grus kyi stobs rnyed par spro'am/_de dag gis gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du blta bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[268a.2\]]de nas chos gang mnyan pa zhus te yid du 'ong ba mnyan par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams la blta bar bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu la spro'i skye ba dang 'gum pa la ni blta 
[\[268a.3\]]bar mi spro'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu stan las langs nas de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la 'gro zhing skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan byed de/_
[\[268a.4\]]de dag thams cad kyi lus las seng ge rnams byung ngo /_/stag rnams byung ngo /_/sbrul rnams byung ngo /_/glang po rnams byung ngo /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul pa ston to/_/ril yang skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/steng du dpag tshad nyi khri srid du yang 'gro'o/_/zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba stong 
[\[268a.5\]]phrag bcu yang 'bab par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems can gzhon nu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od zer chen po gda' ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_
[\[268a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed zla ba dang /_nyi ma byung ba 'di la ltos/_de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di 
[\[268a.7\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus las 'od zer snang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul bstan pa ste bstan nas kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang /_lha rnams dang /_
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/_de dag 'dir mi'i lus dang /_stobs dang brtson 'grus bstan nas 'di 'dra ba'i stobs nye bar ston to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od zer snang ba 'byung bar bgyi ba'i slad du 
[\[268b.2\]]chos bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sman gyi sde khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos 
[\[268b.3\]]pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/des 'di snyam bsams te/_gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu'o/_/snyam bsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[268b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/bstan par bya'o/_/rnam par dbye bar bya'o/_/sman gyi sde gang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus 
[\[268b.5\]]rnams kyi de thams cad bstan par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das the tsom bsal ba'i slad du bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bu stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong 
[\[268b.6\]]phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba dang /_'byung po bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad kyis bskor ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas bskor ba mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[268b.7\]]stsal pa/_sman gyi sde sems can 'di dag ni chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khor 'dir nga'i gan du 'dus shing 'khod gor ma chag ste/_sman gyi sde 'di dag ni deng kho nar 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pas deng nyid sa bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]ro/_/sa bcu la rab tu gnas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rga dang 'chi las thar bya'i phyir/_/las byas bde ba thob byed cing /_/nyon mongs zhags pa pham byas nas/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[269a.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi gnas mang po las sna tshogs kyis byung ba 'di ci'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing gnas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde nyon cig_/sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa/_/thar bar 
[\[269a.3\]]'gyur ba ga la yod/_/sems can gzhon nu mang po dag_/de ring gzugs rnams thob par 'gyur/_/sa bcu dag ni 'thob pa'i phyir/_/chos kun rab tu shes par 'gyur/_/sa bcu dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bya ba byed par 'gyur/_/chos 
[\[269a.4\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_/chos char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur/_/de ltar sems can 'dus pas na/_/nga yi bstan pa dga' ba'o/_/lha dang klu dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/lha min shin tu mi bzad pas/_/sa bcu la ni rab gnas te/_/chos 
[\[269a.5\]]kyi sgra yang sgrogs par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rnga yang rdung bar 'gyur/_/chos kyi dung yang rab tu 'bud/_/sems can gzhon nu 'di dag kyang /_/brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pas thob pa bzhin/_/de dag deng ni 
[\[269a.6\]]chos thob 'gyur/_/de nas sems can gzhon nu lnga stong tsam stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang phyir mtha' ni ma 'tshal ba/_/'khor 
[\[269a.7\]]ba na ni 'chi ba ste/_/lus ni khur lci bcom ldan 'das/_/'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa/_/lam ni rnam par ma 'tshal te/_/lam nyid kyang ni mi gda' bas/_/mgon po bdag cag ldongs gyur na/_/bdag cag rnams ni bsdu bar gsol/_/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]dpa' la bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal/_/'dren pas chos ni bshad du gsol/_/bdag cag shes rab chung ngur skyes/_/bde ba mngon par ma 'tshal to/_/bdag cag la ni chos bshad gsol/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad grol bar mdzod/_/gang 
[\[269b.2\]]dang gang du skyes par yang /_/bdag cag sangs rgyas mthong gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed cag rnams ni zas zo shig_/
[\[269b.3\]]rmad du byung ba'i ro yang 'thung /_/'jigs pa med par gyur nas su/_/phyis gdod 'jigs med chos nyon cig_/smras pa/_btsun pa gnas brtan khyod su zhig_/bdag cag rnams kyis khyod mi shes/_/khyod ni rab tu mdzes par mthong /_/gzugs 
[\[269b.4\]]ni zhi zhing grags pa che/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten 'jigs chen dang /_/sems dmyal dud 'gro rnams las thar/_/ji ltar 'gro ba mdzes pa bzhin/_/khyod kyi sdig pa thams cad zhi/_/khyod kyi lag na snod yod pa/_/rin chen sna bdun ldan pa dang /_/
[\[269b.5\]]lus la rin chen srad bu dang /_/gzi brjid phung pos brgyan pa mthong /_/zhi ba khyod kyis tshig smras pa/_/bdag cag lan 'debs mi nus so/_/bdag cag la ni zas rnams dang /_/zhim po'i skom yang mi dgos te/_/zas las bshang ba 'byung 
[\[269b.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin skom yang gcin du 'gyur/_/khu ba rnams las khrag tu 'gyur/_/de bzhin khrag las shar 'gyur bas/_/zas dang skom rab sbyar ba yang /_/bdag cag rnams la dgos ma yin/_/dar dang snam bu sbyar ba dang /_/phra 
[\[269b.7\]]mo'i gos kyang dgos pa med/_/gser gyi gdu bu mi dgos te/_/mu tig phreng ba dgos ma yin/_/sor gdub dag kyang mi dgos te/_/de kun mi rtag chos can no/_/bdag cag ngan par 'gro rnams su/_/'gro bar mi 'gyur srog tshol lo/_/lha rnams kyi 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]ni bde ba dang /_/chos kyi sbyin pa don du gnyer/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dgos te/_/'khor los sgyur rgyal ma yin no/_/rab tu bzang ba'i gling bor nas/_/'khor los sgyur ba 'chi bar 'gyur/_/bu yang phyi bzhin mi 'brang ste/_/
[\[270a.2\]]chung ma bu mo rnams kyang min/_/rin chen sna bdun phyi na las/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba ma yin no/_/skye bo mang po bsdus pa yang /_/phyi bzhin 'gro ba ma yin te/_/mdun du rgyug pa'ang ma yin no/_/de ltar phyin cad mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe gcig gis ni rgyal po las/_/
[\[270a.3\]]mi rtag pas ni 'khyam 'gyur te/_/sdig pa'i las rnams mang byas pas/_/de dag sems dmyal ngu 'bod ltung /_/rin chen sna bdun rdzu 'phrul ches/_/phyogs bzhi kun tu bskor ba las/_/gang tshe ngu 'bod smin pa'i tshe/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[270a.4\]]de ni gang du song /_/sa gang dag na yod min pa/_/shi nas rdzu 'phrul byed mi nus/_/gnas brtan bdag cag rnams la gson/_/gang na de bzhin gshegs par bzhud/_/pha dang ma ni ji lta bar/_/de ni mthong bar rab tu 'dod/_/bdag 
[\[270a.5\]]cag la ni ma yang med/_/pha med phu nu rnams kyang med/_/'jig rten gtso bo de bzhin gshegs/_/de nyid pha dang ma yin no/_/de nyid nyi ma zla ba ste/_/bde ba'i lam ni rab ston pa'o/_/gang phyir phyin chad mi skye bar/_/de ni 'khor ba 
[\[270a.6\]]thar mdzad pa'o/_/nyon mongs chu bo 'jigs chen dang /_/chu bo sgrol ba'i gru de'o/_/de yis sems can rab bsgral te/_/phyin chad slar ni mi ldog go/_/byang chub mchog ni rab ston pa/_/dam pa'i chos kyang des bshad do/_/bdag 
[\[270a.7\]]cag rnams la zas mi dgos/_/rgyal srid 'bras bu mi 'dod de/_/sems can dmyal bas 'jigs pa ni/_/lha yi 'jig rten 'gro mi bya/_/mi yi tshe ni bde ba ste/_/de na thams cad mkhyen par snang /_/rang gi las ni nyes byas pas/_/tshe thung rnams ni 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]'khyam pa yin/_/de dag 'chi ba mi shes kyi/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyal srid shes/_/skye dang 'gag pas bslus pa rnams/_/shes pa med cing 'jigs pa med/_/mi rtag pas ni sems 'khrul rnams/_/phra ba'i chos rnams mi shes te/_/phra ba'i dgos pa mi byed la/_/
[\[270b.2\]]zhi ba'i dbyings kyang mi shes so/_/'chi 'pho la ni skyo med pa/_/yang dang yang du skye bar 'gyur/_/yun ring sdug bsngal rab gzir cing /_/rtag tu dbyug pas brdegs byas nas/_/gzhan dag gi yang 'phrog byed de/_/de bzhin bcing zhing bsad pa byas/_/sngon gyi sdig pas bskul bas 
[\[270b.3\]]na/_/de dag bcing ba lngas bcings so/_/re thag kyang ni chad par 'gyur/_/mya ngan zug rngus zug par 'gyur/_/rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na/_/snying rje bar ni smre sngags 'don/_/bdag gi skyob par su 'gyur la/_/gser dang dngul dang shel dag dang /_/longs spyod thams cad bdag 
[\[270b.4\]]gis dbul/_/bdag ni bran du'ang 'gyur bar bya/_/bran gyi tshul du gang gyur pa/_/las rnams thams cad rab tu bya/_/rgyal srid longs spyod bdag mi dgos/_/nor dang 'bru yang ma yin no/_/rang gi lus ni bdag mi dgos/_/sdig pa byed pa mi 'grol te/_/de ltar gnas 
[\[270b.5\]]brtan bdag cag la/_/bza' ba dgos pa ma yin no/_/gang dag kha zas zhim zos pa/_/rgyal po rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/btung ba mchog ni 'thungs pa yi/_/lha yi bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/_/cho ma cho dgu ro ldan pa/_/zas dang skom ni rab bshams te/_/rgyal po'i mdun 
[\[270b.6\]]du blangs nas su/_/kha zas la ni lces reg nas/_/rgyal po rnams ni ro la chags/_/sdig pa mi chung rnams kyang byed/_/gang la snying po med pa yi/_/mi rtag ro la chags par byed/_/bdag cag rnams la skom mi dgos/_/bza' ba dag kyang dgos ma yin/_/bdag cag sdug bsngal gang grol ba/_/chos 
[\[270b.7\]]nyid de 'dra dgos ma yin/_/sred pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing /_/sred pa'i nyon mongs rnams thar te/_/bcings pa kun las rab grol ba'i/_/sangs rgyas de la skyabs su dong /_/drang srong chen po 'jig mgon la/_/bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su 'dong /_/sems can rnams kyis mthong dka' 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]la/_/phyag 'tshal phyir ni bdag cag 'dong /_/khyod kyi mtshan ni ma 'tshal gyis/_/snyan pa'i mtshan ni bstan du gsol/_/sman gyi sdes smras pa/_khyed dang skye bo thams cad dang /_/de bzhin ming ni thos par 'dod/_/sems can gzhon nu bye ba phrag_/stong 
[\[271a.2\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa bskor/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod ni sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi/_/ming ni zab par grags pa yin/_/skye bo kun kyang de bzhin du/_/khyod kyi ming ni thos par 'dod/_/smras pa/_nga yi ming ni sman gyi sde/_/nga ni sems can rnams kyi sman/_/sman rnams kun gyi dam 
[\[271a.3\]]pa ni/_/khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/_/nad kun gyis btab skye bo yi/_/nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/_/'dod chags nad ni nad po che/_/'jig rten 'jigs byed mi bzad pa/_/gang gis blo med 'khyam pa yi/_/gti mug nad ni che zhing drag_/sems dmyal de bzhin 
[\[271a.4\]]dud 'gro dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su sems can 'gro/_/byis pa 'di dag zhe sdang zin/_/de dag ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur/_/de dag gis smras pa/_dge ba'i chos ni 'di thos pas/_/bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol/_/byis pa blo ni mi shes pa/_/sdug bsngal kun las grol nas 
[\[271a.5\]]kyang /_/sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/_/bdag cag chos kyi sbyin pa nyan/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/'jigs pa mi bzad rnams kyang spangs/_/nad rnams thams cad zhi byed pa/_/sman pa'i rgyal po sman pa ste/_/sdug bsngal ba rnams 
[\[271a.6\]]gso byed pa/_/yang dag sangs rgyas myur du blta/_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya phyir/_/gnas brtan khyod ni myur du bzhud/_/phyag byas bdag cag rnams kyi tshig_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren la gsungs/_/nad 'di rab tu zhi bar mdzod/_/
[\[271a.7\]]lus ni thams cad rab 'bar te/_/tshig cing zhi ba med pa yi/_/mi bzad me ni zhi bar mdzod/_/lus kyi khur ni khur po che/_/shin tu mi bzad rno ba'i khur/_/sdug bsngal gzir ba bdag cag la/_/brtul zhugs dam pa thugs rje mdzod/_/skye bo rtag tu zhe sdang dang /_/gti 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]mug non pa'i khur khyer te/_/khur las thar ba mi shes pa/_/de dag yang dang yang khur khyer/_/thar pa'i lam ni mi shes shing /_/thar pa'i lam ni ma mthong rnams/_/'chi ba rnam par shes mod kyi/_/'on kyang 'jigs pa mi skyed do/_/
[\[271b.2\]]bdag cag la ni nam du yang /_/'chi ba med snyam bde bar gnas/_/kun tu 'khrul pas ma shi ba/_/mthong yang rnam par mi shes so/_/de dag pha yang mi dran te/_/nad kyis kyang ni rtag gzir cing /_/nyon mongs las kyis rab dkrugs na/_/
[\[271b.3\]]ji ltar kha zas za bar 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal nyam thag mi shes te/_/bdag cag ngal ba don med do/_/khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/_/ma rig gzhi las skyes pa'o/_/'du shes 'du byed tshor ba rnams/_/'jigs chen lci ba'i khur yin no/_/
[\[271b.4\]]gang chos rnam par mi shes pa/_/byis pa sred pas rab tu 'khyam/_/lus kyi khur gyis bskor ba ni/_/'jig rten du ni don med skyes/_/gos gtsang shin tu bzang ba dang /_/khrus dang byug pa dgos pa'o/_/lus la gang yid 'ong ba yi/_/kha zas 
[\[271b.5\]]zhim po dgos pa ste/_/yid 'ong ba yi sil snyan lnga/_/de bzhin rna bas tshor bar byed/_/rin chen bdun las byung ba yi/_/gzugs la mig gis chags par byed/_/zhim pa'i ro rnams thams cad ni/_/lces kyang tshor bar byed pa ste/_/
[\[271b.6\]]'jam zhing phra ba'i reg pa yang /_/lus kyis rtag tu tshor bar byed/_/lus kyis su ni sha gnyis po/_/dga' bar yang ni bsgrubs pa las/_/sems pa med pa'i lus 'di skyes/_/de la dga' ba su zhig rnyed/_/de na bdag rkang dga' byed pa/_/
[\[271b.7\]]lham ni rab tu bzang gyon yang /_/'chi bar 'gyur tshe gos rnams dang /_/byug pa skyabs su mi 'gyur te/_/lus kyang skyabs su 'gyur min na/_/gos dang byug pa smos ci dgos/_/mi zhes bya ba lus yin te/_/dbugs dang stobs chen rnyed par 'gyur/_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]so sor rtog pa'i rna ba'i stobs/_/de ni lus la yon tan che/_/sngon chad rta dang glang po yis/_/kun tu bskor nas rtse zhing 'khyam/_/thar pa'i chos ni ma shes nas/_/bdag ci sdig pa'i las la chags/_/'jig rten pha rol ma shes nas/_/
[\[272a.2\]]rtse bas sdig pa byed du bcug_/bdag ni yang dang yang skyes te/_/shi ba bdag la yang 'ongs so/_/yang dang yang du mya ngan mthong /_/smre sngags 'don pas rab tu bcings/_/ma rnams kyang ni shi ba mthong /_/pha rnams shi dang gnyen dag dang /_/sring mo dang ni bu dag 
[\[272a.3\]]dang /_/chung ma rnams kyang shi ba mthong /_/mngon par 'du byed kun stong na/_/sems dang bcas pa su zhig chags/_/'dod pas zin pa'i sems kyis su/_/bdag gis yid brtan rung bar shes/_/zhi ba'i chos ni mi dmigs te/_/'chi ba la ni mngon dga' med/_/de phyir 
[\[272a.4\]]'dod pas bsgribs sems kyis/_/bdag gis sbyin pa ma byin no/_/de bas 'dod dang mnyam sdig med/_/de ni da dung mi ldog go/_/kun tu nor bas bdag cag skyes/_/'gro ba mtha' dag kun tu nor/_/kun tu nor ba'i sgra yang nyan/_/dam chos ma yin yongs su 
[\[272a.5\]]'dzin/_/thar pa dang ni bsam gtan btsal/_/lus ni khur du bkur mi bya/_/'jig rten don du 'gro ba'i gtso/_/sangs rgyas ston pa rnams su shog_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten pha dang ma/_/sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni kun tu yang /_/rin chen 
[\[272a.6\]]char pa rab tu 'bebs/_/chos kyi bsdu ba ci 'dra ba/_/sems can blun pos mi shes te/_/byang chub tu ni sems bsngos na/_/chos kyi bsdu ba thob par 'gyur/_/'du byed thams cad stong pa ste/_/de bzhin longs spyod nor yang stong /_/bdag kyang stong par mthong bas na/_/mthong 
[\[272a.7\]]nas re ba med par gyur/_/gnas brtan sman gyi sde khyod kyis/_/bdag cag rnams kyi tshig gson cig_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir/_/khyod ni pho nyar bzhud 'tshal lo/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams dran nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba med/_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing dka' 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]thub che/_/yon tan kun tu sdud par byed/_/ston de ga la bzhugs par bzhud/_/ston pa bde bar rab sad nas/_/rgyal ba cung zad mi skyo bar/_/bdag cag slad du zhu ba mdzod/_/khyod kyis bdud ni gzhom pa dang /_stobs dang bcas pa pham par byas/_/sems 
[\[272b.2\]]can thams cad yongs 'dzin pa'i/_/chos kyang myur du 'bar bar byas/_/gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi/_/chos ni bdag cag ma thos kyis/_/bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/gnas brtan myur du bzhud du gsol/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 
[\[272b.3\]]mnga' ba'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba/_/de srid bdag cag mi rgal zhes/_/thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas/_/sman gyi sdes smras pa/_khyed cag de ltar ci zhig mthong /_/re zhig gyen du blta bar byos/_/de dag gyen du bltas pa dang /_/
[\[272b.4\]]khang pa brtsegs pa sum stong dang /_/lnga brgya tham par tshang ba zhig_/kun tu yang ni gnas par gyur/_/rin chen bdun gyis shin tu spras/_/rin chen dra bas legs par brgyan/_/dbus na me tog rab tu rgyas/_/lha rdzas spos kyang rab tu 'bab/_/de na 
[\[272b.5\]]gnas brtan dris pa ni/_/khang brtsegs rin chen dra ba dang /_/pad ma ze bar kun gnas par/_/'di na snang ba 'di ci zhig_/sman gyi sdes smras pa/_gnas 'di dag ni khyed kyi ste/_/sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir deng shig_/'jig rten 'das gtso gang yin pa/_/'jig 
[\[272b.6\]]rten snang byed de la thud/_/de dag gis smras pa/_de yi lam yang ma 'tshal te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma mthong na/_/gang na lam yang ma 'tshal bas/_/phyag 'tshal du ni gang du mchi/_/sman gyi sdes smras pa/_nam mkha' mtha' yas ji bzhin du/_/reg 
[\[272b.7\]]par rung ba ma yin pas/_/bdud rtsi rab sbyin ston pa la/_/phyag 'tshal phyir ni 'gro mi nus/_/ji ltar ri rab gnas pa ltar/_/ston pa de yang gnas na bzhugs/_/ri rab gzhal du rung ba yin/_/rgya mtsho chen po gting tshod zin/_/stong gsum rdul phran dpag tu rung /_/sangs rgyas 'byung 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ba shes ma yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas/_/'jig rten snang bar mdzad la 'dud/_/smras pa/_'jig rten mgon po bdag cag gzigs/_/bdag cag bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod/_/bdag cag sems kyis ston pa la/_/phyag bgyis de nas 'bras bu thob/_/
[\[273a.2\]]sman gyi sdes smras pa/_ston pa dri la mi chags te/_/phreng ba ma yin byug pa min/_/gang gis 'dus byas grol 'gyur ba/_/sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to/_/gang gis yid ni btul byas shing /_/sangs rgyas la yang skyabs song ba/_/de la bdud ni mi bzad mchog_/thab 
[\[273a.3\]]mo rgol bar mi byed do/_/'chi ba'i dbang du mi 'gro yi/_/gzungs ni myur du rnyed par 'gyur/_/de sems rab tu dang byas nas/_/de nas ston pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping ka'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[273a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong byung ste/_'od zer 
[\[273a.5\]]de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur/_sems can dmyal ba chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang khyab par gyur/_lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang snang bar gyur/_'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs sha stag la 
[\[273a.6\]]'di lta ste/_sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/_'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad bgyis nas slar log ste/_
[\[273a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur pa'i 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]gal te bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[273b.2\]]dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sman gyi sde khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag 
[\[273b.3\]]sum cu byung ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos phra ba bstan pa rtogs nas/_sems can rgan po rnams la sems can rgan po khyed rnams ni chos mi shes pa'o/_/rtag tu chos ma yin pa dang /_mi dge ba la chags pa'o/_/zhes phra mo rnams 
[\[273b.4\]]mi snyan pa mchi zhing yongs su rjod la gnod pa bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du tshig snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di dag smras/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde de dag ci'i phyir tshig 'di skad smra ba mi shes sam/_de dag ni 
[\[273b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam zhing shin tu snyan pa smra ste/_chos kyang thos pas sman gyi sde de'i phyir de dag chos thams cad kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur/_yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/_de dag thams cad gzungs rtogs par 'gyur/_deng phyin chad sa 
[\[273b.6\]]bcu la gnas par 'gyur/_deng chos kyi rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur/_deng chos chen po'i rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong 
[\[273b.7\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde deng nyid sems can gzhon nu 'di dag khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi nang du zhugs nas chos mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/deng nyid dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]deng chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'gyur te/_lha'i ris du ma zhig deng chos mngon par rtogs pa thob par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can log par ltung ba la gnas pa mang po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan pa thos 
[\[274a.2\]]nas 'khor ba bsnyil te rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe sems can rgan po bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob ste/_de dag thams cad kyang chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 
[\[274a.3\]]spangs par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni chos chen po'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde phyogs bzhir ltos shig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[274a.4\]]sman gyi sdes phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas pa dang /_shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /_lho phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /_nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i 
[\[274a.5\]]klung bye ba phrag bdun cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /_byang phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /_'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /_steng gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba 
[\[274a.6\]]phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'ong ste/_de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nam 
[\[274a.7\]]mkha' bar snang la gzugs nag po dang /_gzugs dmar po gda' ba ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde gang bar snang la gzugs nag po dang /_gzugs dmar po mthong ba 'di ci yin mi shes sam/_de bzhin gshegs pas ni mkhyen te/_sman gyi sde 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]'di ni bdud yin no/_/sman gyi sde mthong bar 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam 
[\[274b.2\]]pa 'di lta bu lhags so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams kyi rkyen gyis te/_de sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi chos dang 
[\[274b.3\]]ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi sde khyod kyis sems can gzugs sna tshogs 'dir lhags pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs 'di lhags pa dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed dang /_
[\[274b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed cig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gnas te/_gzugs sna tshogs kha dog sna tshogs dbyibs sna tshogs pa dag gnas la/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'phags pa'i chos kyi gnas la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[274b.5\]]de dag 'khor dang bcas nas chos kyi gnas la gnas pa mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gsar rnying de dag 
[\[274b.6\]]kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//_//
[\[274b.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]{D103}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA tsin t+ya pra b+hAs nir da sho nA ma d+harma par+yA ya/_bod skad du/_'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[275a.2\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/
[\[275a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas nas bzhugs te/_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_nang mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/_btsun par byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[275a.4\]]kyis bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_byog pa dang /_myang ba bzang po mang po brnyes so/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[275a.5\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rigs phun sum tshogs pa/_gdung phun sum tshogs pa/_cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa/_tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/_ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs 
[\[275a.6\]]pa/_shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/_rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes/_bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa'i sgra dang /_snyan pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon du byung bar gyur to/_/bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[275a.7\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/spyan lnga dang yang ldan te/_sha'i spyan dang /_lha'i spyan dang /_chos kyi spyan dang /_shes rab kyi spyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa 
[\[275b.2\]]dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu rnams ni tshar bcad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par bzung zhing 'bar ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas dge 
[\[275b.3\]]slong gi tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_mdun du gzigs pa dang /_g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa mdzes pa dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba mdzes pa dang /_chos gos snam sbyar 
[\[275b.4\]]dang /_bsil zan dang /_na bza'i tshags dang /_lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang /_sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang /_'od 'dom gang bas mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang /_tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang /_nyi ma shar ba lta bur phyogs su snang 
[\[275b.5\]]zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ni ldan te/_grong khyer chen por mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu/_de nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs pa na/_cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad 
[\[275b.6\]]du byung ba chos rnam pa 'di dag byung ste/_skyes bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa'i tshe/_der cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po gang dag byung ba de dag brjod par bya/_shin tu dad pa'i sems kyis nyon cig_/long ba rnams kyis ni mthong ngo /_/'on pa rnams kyis ni thos so/_/gcer bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed 
[\[275b.7\]]do/_/smyon pa rnams kyis ni dran pa thob po/_/grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad ni thal mo sbyar te/_bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang khar rnga dang /_sgra snyan dag ni ma brdungs par sgra 'byung ngo /_/ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_khu byug dag 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to/_/gang dag gter stor ba de dag gis ni gter rnams rnyed par gyur to/_/gser dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo /_/sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'gul te/_sems can rnams skyabs med 
[\[276a.2\]]par yang ma gyur cig_/yid dang ba rab tu thob bo/_/smra ba'i mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyis gang dang gang du zhabs kyis gom pa bor ba de dang der pad ma dri ma med cing /_legs par gnas pa rnams byung ngo /_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag 
[\[276a.3\]]thams cad kyang bde ba rnyed nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang dag sbrum pa de dag kyang mi bde ba med pa nyid du gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa dag btsas so/_/sems can rnams la yang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyis gnod par gyur pa 
[\[276a.4\]]med do/_/rab tu sdang ba'i sems med par phan tshun du smra ste/_dper na pha'am ma zhig bu gcig pa la smra ba bzhin no/_/srang gi g.yas g.yon rnams kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to/_/nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang me tog sil ma dag mngon par gtor 
[\[276a.5\]]to/_/sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yang med do/_/sems can gang dag na bar gyur pa de dag kyang nad med par gyur te/_bde ba thob bo/_/bde bar gshegs pa gshegs pa na sems can so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa ci bdag kho na la gzigs so snyam du sems so/_/so so 
[\[276a.6\]]nas bdag nyid bsod snyoms 'bul zhing /_mi'i 'dren pa la brten nas bdag kho na bsod snyoms kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro snyam du sems te/_de gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal bar sla ba ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar chags su bsod snyoms bzhes shing 
[\[276a.7\]]gshegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das grong bar gyi dbus zhig tu gshegs pa dang /_de'i tshe khang stong zhig tu khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa zhig bor bar gyur te/_lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug nas/_'jib cing 'dug pa la khyi'am/_ce spyang gang dag khang stong der lhags pa 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]de dag kyang khye'u de la lce'i dbang pos bldags shing 'dong ste/_ji ltar sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas khye'u de la 'tshe ba mi byed do/_/khang stong der skye bo phal po che dag kyang 'jug cing 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'jug cing 'byung ba gzigs nas mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang 
[\[276b.2\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang du skye bo phal po che 'di dag 'jug cing 'byung ba'i khang stong de na ci yod ltos/_de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_khang stong ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang 
[\[276b.3\]]khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa zhig lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug ste/_'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste 
[\[276b.4\]]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la skabs de gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khang stong de na khye'u bor ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa/_mig mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba zhig mchis so/_/de nas 
[\[276b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/_nga'i legs par bshad pa'i don shes par nus shing /_skal ba can no snyam nas/_khye'u de la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dge ba la gzud pa'i phyir/_khang stong ga la ba der gshegs so/_/
[\[276b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das der gshegs nas phyogs gcig tu bzhugs te/_phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas/_khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_sbrul dang gnod sbyin rgyu ba yi/_/dur khrod 'jigs pa che 'di na/_/byis pa ji ltar mi 'jigs shing /_/khyod da gcig pu 'di na 
[\[276b.7\]]'dug_/de nas khye'u des sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bdag ma mchis pa'i tshogs rnams la/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug su zhig 'jigs/_/thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog_/ji 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]ltar 'dir mchis las gang lags/_/bdag gcig bdag gis gang ma mchis/_/bdag kyang gang gi'ang ma lags te/_/bdag ni su'i lags de ma mthong /_/bdag gi su lags de ma mthong /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sngon cad 
[\[277a.2\]]sdig pa byas pa'i las/_/de yi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/_/khang pa stong pa 'dir bor nas/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yin/_/khye'us gsol pa/_gau tam khang stong snyam pa yi/_/'du shes da dung mnga' ba blta/_/byang chub snying por khyod bzhugs nas/_/'du shes 
[\[277a.3\]]yongs su ma mkhyen tam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ngas ni 'du shes yongs shes te/_/nga la 'du shes yod ma yin/_/khyod nyid la ni snying brtse bas/_/khang pa stong pa 'dir 'ongs so/_/khye'us gsol pa/_sems can dag ni bar 'ga' yang /_/gang 
[\[277a.4\]]tshe shin tu mi dmigs pa/_/de tshe thugs rje gang du byung /_/khyod ni su la thugs brtse mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/bdag med zhi ba stong pa nyid/_/sems can 'di dag mi shes te/_/de dag nyid la snying brtse'i phyir/_/bsod nams spyad pa spyod pa 
[\[277a.5\]]yin/_/khye'us gsol pa/_stong pa zhi bar thugs chud nas/_/zhi ba stong pa nyid mkhyen kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du/_/phyin ci log kyang ma spangs sam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogs nas/_/sems can yongs su 
[\[277a.6\]]smin bya'i phyir/_/'dren pa chos ston mdzad pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje yin/_/khye'us gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du/_/khyod kyis phyin ci log ma spangs/_/sems can 'du shes ma mchis na/_/thugs rje gang du skye bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 
[\[277a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/byang chub sems ni rab bzung nas/_/yod min sems can rnams la yang /_/mi mchog rnams ni go gyon pa/_/rang byung rnams kyis byin rlabs so/_/khye'us gsol pa/_dngos po gang na'ang mi dmigs pas/_/go cha thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa lags/_/
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dngos po ma mchis chos rnams la/_/go cha dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/chos rnams dngos po yod min yang /_/srog chags rnams la chos ston 'di/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/_/thugs rjes rnam par rol pa yin/_/
[\[277b.2\]]khye'us gsol pa/_chos ni yi ge ma mchis na/_/bshad pa gud na ga la mchis/_/'jig rten rnams la slu mdzad dam/_/chos ma lags pa chos bshad dam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nga ni 'jig rten slu ma yin/_/chos ma yin pa'ang nga mi smra/_/
[\[277b.3\]]phyin ci log gyur sems can gyi/_/nyon mongs sel bar nga byed do/_/khye'us gsol pa/_nyon mongs rtsa ba ma mchis te/_/nang ngam phyi rol rnams na yang /_/de dag rnams kyi gnas ma mchis/_/nyon mongs ji ltar rnam par sbyang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[277b.4\]]phyin ci log las byung ba rnams/_/yongs su brtags las skyes pa ste/_/rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/_/srog chags rnams la chos ston to/_/khye'us gsol pa/_rnam brtag mang po ci 'tshal te/_/sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing /_/de la nyon mongs mi 'byung ste/_/
[\[277b.5\]]nams kyang nyon mongs de mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_/sems ni rtag tu 'od gsal kyang /_/blo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis/_/so so'i skye bo nyon mongs 'gyur/_/khye'us gsol pa/_nyon mongs dmigs su ma mchis 
[\[277b.6\]]te/_/de dag phyogs na mi gnas na/_/blo bur du ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/de zhus bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/dper na sprin rnams bar snang la/_/snang yang de dag de bzhin min/_/nyon mongs 'byung ba'ang de 'dra ste/_/snang yang de dag 
[\[277b.7\]]de bzhin min/_/khye'us gsol pa/_ma nor de bzhin gang lags pa/_/chos gnas nyid de chos nyid do/_/ma nor de bzhin nyid chos la/_/nor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/byis pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyis/_/log par rnam par 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]gang brtags pa/_/blo de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin/_/khye'us gsol pa/_skye ma mchis pas rab phye ba/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhig byung /_/skye ba ma mchis chos rnams la/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba 
[\[278a.2\]]'thad ma lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/skye ba med par skye ba ni/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan/_/kun rdzob tha snyad btags pa ste/_/dam pa'i don du yod ma yin/_/khye'us gsol pa/_da dung khyod la don dam dang /_/kun rdzob 'du shes 
[\[278a.3\]]gnyis mnga' ste/_/theg pa gcig lam 'gal 'gyur ba/_/gau tam khyod kyis bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nga ni lam dang 'gal mi byed/_/'gal ba med par nga gnas te/_/mi 'thun sems can sdums kyang byed/_/khye'u khyod de 
[\[278a.4\]]ltar shes par gyis/_/khye'us gsol pa/_sems can de ni mi dmigs na/_/gau ta ma khyod ci sdums mdzad/_/chos rnams sngon gyi mtha' la gzigs/_/gang gi kun nas nyon mongs skye/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' 
[\[278a.5\]]dang /_/de bzhin da ltar byung ba dang /_/byang chub dam pa rtogs gyur nas/_/srog chags rnams la chos ston to/_/khye'us gsol pa/_rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes sgrogs mdzad cing /_/nyid kyi mkhyen pa sgrogs mdzad de/_/'di ltar bdag tu sgro 'dogs pas/_/khyod ni lhag 
[\[278a.6\]]pa'i nga rgyal che/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/nga ni bdag la mi stod de/_/de bzhin gzhan la brnyas mi byed/_/de bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston/_/des na de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/_/khye'us gsol pa/_brjod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid/_/de na de nyid ma mchis 
[\[278a.7\]]na/_/sgra skad ma mchis sgra bshad pa/_/mkhyen bzhin log par bka' ma stsal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/chos de thams cad log pa ste/_/de bzhin nyid las byung ba yin/_/de bzhin nyid ni rtogs pas na/_/nga la skyon med yon tan med/_/khye'us gsol pa/_
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin na/_/bdag gi spobs pa 'di skyes te/_/'di 'dra'i lan dag gang gsol pa/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la bzod par gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can chos gos kyi nang nas phyung ste/_khye'u de'i 
[\[278b.2\]]logs su brkyang ba dang /_de nas khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sor mo la bzung ste langs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khang stong nas bsnams te/_srang du bzhag pa dang /_de na skye bo phal po che dag 'di ltar khye'u 'di 'di kho na ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang /_
[\[278b.3\]]bdag nyid chen po'i chos 'di lta bu'i lan 'debs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to snyam nas/_ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khye'u khyod kyi las 
[\[278b.4\]]kyi sgrib pa zad kyis/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par gyis la skye bo'i tshogs chen po la yang shes par gyis te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston cig_/de nas khye'u de sa las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas lus las 'od phyung ste/_'od des mnyan yod thams cad dang /_'dzam 
[\[278b.5\]]bu'i gling thams cad snang ba chen po rgyas par gyur to/_/'od des brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_de ma yin pa lha brgya stong mang po gzhan dag la yang yang dag par bskul bar gyur nas/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[278b.6\]]song ste/_lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lha'i me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'od kyis snang 
[\[278b.7\]]bar bgyis nas/_sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyis so/_/zhes ched du rjod pa de skad ched du brjod de/_de ltar khye'u de'i ming snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar btags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khye'u 'di snang ba 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar gyur cig ces/_khye'u de'i ming la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do/_/de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bar snang de las babs te/_sa la 'dug pa dang /_de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[279a.2\]]bas 'di lta ste dper na/_grogs po lo brgyad lon pa'i lus gzugs yongs su grub par gyur pa de 'dra bar 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la lha'i ras bcos bu zung cig byin te/_kye khye'u nga la snying brtse ba'i phyir ras bcos bu'i zung 'di gyon la gcer bur ma 
[\[279a.3\]]'dug shig_/de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gos kyi rgyan bgos pas mdzes pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi rgyan thogs na mdzes so/_/kau shi ka 
[\[279a.4\]]de lta mod kyi 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan gang dag yin pa de dag nyon cig_/byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_byang chub kyi snying por brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i rgyan ni byang chub 
[\[279a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_sems can thams cad mngon du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/dam bcas pa brten pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi 
[\[279a.6\]]rgyan te/_sgyu dang g.yo sel bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_thams cad las khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[279a.7\]]ro/_/nga rgyal med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul 
[\[279b.2\]]khrims yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa dang des pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro dang sgra skad lta bu'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/_/dam bcas pa brtan zhing 
[\[279b.3\]]sems mi zhum pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_mngon par shes pa 
[\[279b.4\]]chen po'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_bag la nyal ba dang lta bar smra ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[279b.5\]]rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_bdag dang gzhan gyi don la skyo ba med par 'gyur ro/_/zang zing med par chos ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[279b.6\]]rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_shes rab kyis bdag dang gzhan sgrol bar 'gyur ro/_/chos sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rgyan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa de 
[\[279b.7\]]nam yang gcer bu ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la shin tu dga' ba dang dad pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ras bcos bu'i zung 'di len du stsal bar gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khye'u ras bcos bu'i zung 'di long la gyon cig_/de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs 
[\[280a.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ras bcos bu'i zung blangs nas bgos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de na skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_
[\[280a.3\]]bu mo dang /_tshong dpon dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/_khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la yang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/_/
[\[280a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis bsod snyoms bzhes te/_khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs so/_/gshegs nas kyang cang mi gsung bar phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma ngo tsha nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[280a.5\]]la blta ba'i phyir sgor ma byung ngo /_/de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang gi khyim du song nas/_ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag gi sngon gyi nongs pa yis/_/khyod kyi mngal du bdag mchis te/_/yum gyis nongs pa ma lags kyis/_/'o ltar gnod par ma mdzad 
[\[280a.6\]]cig_/thugs brtse ldan te bskyed pas na/_/bdag gi sbyin gnas khyod lags so/_/zhal tsha ma mdzad ma 'dzem par/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bzhud/_/de ltar khyod mngal bdag mchis pa/_/khyod kyis brnyes pa legs par brnyes/_/lus kyi dge ba'i las 
[\[280a.7\]]rnams kyang /_/rnam par 'dren la zhu ba mdzod/_/de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag dang /_lha'i spos dag dang /_lha'i gos dag bdag la stsol cig_/de dag bdag gi skyed pa'i ma 'di la stsal to/_/
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]'dis de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyis nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_khye'u de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag dang /_lha'i spos dag dang /_lha'i gos dag byin no/_/de 
[\[280b.2\]]nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_yum cig lha yi me tog man dA ra/_/blta sdug mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba dang /_/spos dang na bza' 'di dag blang mdzod la/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas de la dbul ba mdzod/_/'jig rten dag na pha ma 
[\[280b.3\]]zas skom dang /_/nor dang gos kyis mchod pa mchod ma lags/_/gzhan du gang dag chos la sbyor bgyid pa/_/des na de dag mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur/_/rkang gnyis dam pa de la mchod mdzod la/_/byang chub mchog tu smon lam brtan par mdzod/_/bdag ni 
[\[280b.4\]]dus dus khyod kyi drung mchis te/_/yun ring dus nas skul ba bgyid pa lags/_/gnong zhing zhum pa'i sems su ma mdzad par/_/rangs pa'i sems dang dga' ba thob mdzod la/_/rang byung rgyal ba bzhugs pa der bzhud de/_/skyes bu mchog gi zhabs la phyag mdzod la/_/
[\[280b.5\]]mgon po de la me tog spos rnams dang /_/de bzhin na bza' rnams kyang gtor nas su/_/rgyal ba de las dge ba'i rtsa bskyed de/_/byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed pa mdzod/_/byang chub mchog tu sems ni brtan gyur nas/_/gang dag dad pas rgyal la gus bgyis pa/_/
[\[280b.6\]]de dag rnam smin 'jig mgon bka' stsal ces/_/rang byung rgyal ba de la zhu ba mdzod/_/de nas bud med des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/_zhu ba ji skad bstan 
[\[280b.7\]]pa bzhin du gus pa dang bcas par yongs su zhus so/_/zhu ba zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa 'dis/_/ngan 'gro'am mi khom 'gro mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bye mang mnyes byas nas/_/mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms bzhes nas/_khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_skye bo phal po che gzhan dag dang yang thabs cig tu grong khyer nas byung ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[281a.2\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/_nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos nyan du gzhug pa'i phyir bzhugs so/_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan 
[\[281a.3\]]cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 
[\[281a.4\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ga la mchis/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas mthong ste/_rgyal po 
[\[281a.5\]]gsal rgyal gyis khye'u de'i lus gzugs yongs su grub pa lha las 'das pa'i mdog dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyis brgyan pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon las byas shing bsags pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'di ltar 'di'i 
[\[281a.6\]]lus yongs su dag par gyur snyam mo/_/de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang dag rtag tu byams sems dag 
[\[281a.7\]]sems ldan/_/gang dag mi brlang mnyen zhing dran ldan la/_/legs par bsdams shing drang la tshangs spyod pa/_/de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/gang dag sdig pa spong zhing mi spyod la/_/rtag tu dge ba mi chung rnam spel zhing /_/gnod par sems dang khro ba rnam spong ba/_/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/_/gus dang bcas par rtag tu mchod byed cing /_/gzhan la rdeg 'dod sdigs mo mi byed pa/_/de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/gang dag gzhan la phrag dog ser 
[\[281b.2\]]sna dang /_/de bzhin nga rgyal dag kyang mi byed la/_/gzhan gyi nyes pa byung ba mi rjod pa/_/de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/gzhan la co dri ba dang smad pa dang /_/bshung ba dag ni nam yang mi byed cing /_/gzhan la 'khrul pa'i glags lta mi byed pa/_/de dag 
[\[281b.3\]]lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di chos chen po dang ldan pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig gis/_khye'u 
[\[281b.4\]]'di bud med khyim thab ma mchis pa'i mngal du skyes la/_der yang khang stong du bor bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[281b.5\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 
[\[281b.6\]]byung ngo /_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis shig byung ste/_lha bzang zhes bya ba dang /_sa zhes bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin 
[\[281b.7\]]pa de ni phyir mi ldog par gyur cing /_/don du nyung ba/_bya ba nyung ba/_dben pa la dga' ba/_bsam gtan dang /_mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse bar gyur to/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chos rgya chen po dang ldan par ma gyur te/_lha bzang gi 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]g.yog byed do/_/de ha cang grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug ste/_zhugs nas kyang bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang bar gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang des de la khyod ci'i phyir rnal 'byor dang spong ba la brtson par mi 
[\[282a.2\]]byed par ha cang bya ba mang zhing ha cang byed pa mang zhes bsgo zhing bstan to/_/des de la yang dang yang bskul bas de khros shing 'khrugs te yid ma rangs nas/_gnod sems su gyur pa des lus dang sems ma rung bar byas te/_ngan du bsams nas tshig rtsub po smras pa/_nal gyi bu/_
[\[282a.3\]]sbyar ma'i bu/_skyes pa gzhan las grub pa khyod kyi pha ma yang med na/_khyod la shes rab bam/_tshul khrims lta ga la yod ces des ngan du bsams te/_tshig rtsub po smras pa/_mi mthol mi 'chags mi 'dor gyi/_zhe la 'dzin te/_de byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang de la rtag 
[\[282a.4\]]tu ngan sems dang ldan zhing byams pa'i sems med par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang gis kyang de snod ma yin no snyam nas bkyed pa dang /_de de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang la ngan du sems shing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod de/_snyan pa ma yin pa dang /_grags 
[\[282a.5\]]pa ma yin pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa brjod do/_/de las bsags shing tshogs su byas pa des lus zhig ste/_shi ba'i 'og tu bud med khyim thab med pa'i mngal du skyes so/_/byang chub kyi sems bsrungs pas des na sems can dmyal bar ni ma skyes so/_/de btsas ma thag tu 
[\[282a.6\]]bud med des lam srang chen por bor te/_der de khyi dang /_spyang ki dang /_ce spyang rnams kyis zos so/_/rgyal po chen po tshul 'di 'dra bar 'di bskal pa dgu bcur sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dang /_nyam thag pa 'di lta bus 'chi ba'i dus byas shing btsas pa btsas pa na yang bor bar gyur te/_yang 
[\[282a.7\]]skye bo phal po che 'di skad du nal gyi bu sbyar ma'i bu 'di la khyi dang spyang ki dang /_ce spyang rnams za'o zhes 'dzer to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/_yid gnyis za bar gyur na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po 'di'i las kyi sgrib pa ni zad/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems ni rnam par sbyangs/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyes par 
[\[282b.2\]]byas/_ngan 'gro thams cad ni bcad nas/_khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi mnyes par byas shing /_bsti stang du byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/
[\[282b.3\]]chos yongs su btsal ba la yang brtson par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid chen po 'di thob bo/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar na las nag po dang /_dkar po dag chud za bar 'gyur ba med do/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na mkhas pas lus kyi las dang /_
[\[282b.4\]]ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las bsdam par bya ste/_srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bgyi bar gyur pa des/_
[\[282b.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob lags sam/_'on te da dung du yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha bzang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs 
[\[282b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal 'byung zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos gus par 
[\[282b.7\]]bgyis te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi'o/_/bsten par bgyi'o/_/bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing bsten te/_bsnyen bkur bgyis na dge ba'i chos thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]chos thob pas bsam pa dge bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa dge bas sbyor ba dge bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba dge bas dge ba'i las bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/las dge bas 'gro ba dge bar mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba dge bas dge ba'i grogs po mgu bar bgyid do/_/
[\[283a.2\]]grogs po dge bas sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/_/bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa ma bgyis shing dge ba'i las bgyis pas bdag la gdung bar mi 'gyur/_gzhan la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung bas byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[283a.3\]]byang chub kyi lam la gnas pas lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bgyid nus pa dang /_skal ba mchis pa dang /_mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras 
[\[283a.4\]]so/_/rgyal po chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[283a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang 
[\[283a.6\]]ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa la 'jug pa dang /_chad pa dang /_rtag pa rnam par spong ba dang 
[\[283a.7\]]sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gang zag med par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid la mos shing /_stong pa nyid la spyod yul ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]ba dang /_zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/khye'u gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sngon gyi mtha' dben pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[283b.2\]]mi 'pho ba dang /_da ltar byung ba 'jig par shes pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de bzhi po de dag go/_/gzhan yang bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus dben pa dang /_sems dben pa dang /_chos dben pa dang /_las dben pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/gzhan yang bzhi ste/_bzhi 
[\[283b.3\]]gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas la chos nyid du mthong gi gzugs su ma yin pa dang /_chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong gi yi ge dang /_nges pa'i tshig tu ma yin pa dang /_dge 'dun la 'dus ma byas su mthong gi tshogs su ma yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag par 'gyur 
[\[283b.4\]]ba ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/gzhan yang bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bsdu ba'i dngos po mi gtong bas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa dang /_sems can med par rnam par dpyod pa dang snying rje chen po ste/_khye'u byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[283b.5\]]chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mi 
[\[283b.6\]]skye ba'i chos la bzod par thob par gyur te/_de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa 
[\[283b.7\]]mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs/_kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/_kha dog du ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung nas/_zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'od mog mog por byas te/_slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla 
[\[284a.2\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/_blta sdug bltar 'os gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang /_/
[\[284a.3\]]dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis rab mdzes shing /_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kyis 'od mdzes pa/_/'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/_/tshul khrims 'phags shing spyod pa legs spyad pa/_/ting 'dzin shes rab bsags pa'i ye shes 'od/_/rnam grol snying 
[\[284a.4\]]po stobs ldan yang dag gzigs/_/'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/_/bzod pa'i stobs ldan stobs kyi shugs mnga' ba/_/brtson 'grus mngon par 'phags te mi bskyod pa/_/mig tu sdug cing bden pa bzhi gzigs pa/_/'dzum pa mdzad de 
[\[284a.5\]]bdag la bstan du gsol/_/rdo rje'i sku mnga' sra brtan mi shigs pa/_/sred med bu mthu sred med bu bas mchog_/tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan 'jam pa'i dbyangs ldan pa/_/'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/_/bzhugs kyang tshangs dang de bzhin lha tshogs 
[\[284a.6\]]kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug ma mthong la/_/gus dang bcas pas kun nas blta bgyid pa/_/'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/_/khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor/_/mi rtag sgras ni lha dang lha min dang /_/de bzhin klu dang gnod 
[\[284a.7\]]sbyin rab bskyod pa/_/'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/_/snang ba mnyes shing mun pa rnams bral ba/_/kun nas spyan mnga' mnyam pa nyid bzhugs pa/_/yon tan mchog mnga' yon tan snying po bstan/_/'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/_/
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong 
[\[284b.2\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya'i 'og tu bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya ba la/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spyod pa zhes bya bar 
[\[284b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[284b.4\]]'das snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spyod pa de ni 'di lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa lta bur 
[\[284b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de la nyan thos brgyad khri'i dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[284b.6\]]de rnam par spyod pa zhes bya zhing /_bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya bar 'gyur zhe na/_kun dga' bo bar gyi bskal pa brgya stong mang por sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sngon nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ste/_der de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'byung bar 
[\[284b.7\]]'gyur ba de na/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di skad du bskal pa 'di ni kun tu snang ba med pa kun tu snang ba med pa ste/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo /_/zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]bstan pa brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_lha dang mi'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' drug cu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 
[\[285a.2\]]thob par gyur to/_/nyan thos lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_da ltar dang /_
[\[285a.3\]]ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar 
[\[285a.4\]]gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang /_snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis ji 
[\[285a.5\]]srid 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa la bsti stang byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing /_me tog gi phur ma ri rab tsam gtor ba dang /_spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[285a.6\]]ba dan dang /_lha'i dang mi'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gis mchod pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing klog la/_kun chub par byed cing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 
[\[285a.7\]]yang dag par ston la/_de bzhin du nan tan du byed na 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa dang /_shes rab kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]bar bya/_bklag par bya/_nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam 
[\[285b.2\]]gyis mi khyab pa dang /_yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[285b.3\]]dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen 
[\[285b.4\]]gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/[ {D104}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga tA nA ma bud d+ha k+She tra gu Nok+ta d+harma par+yA ya/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs 
[\[285b.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul mnyam dga' na chos kyi dgon pa byang chub kyi snying po na nor bu rdo rjes spras pa'i pad 
[\[285b.6\]]ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thabs cig go/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi 
[\[285b.7\]]dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/_
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig 
[\[286a.2\]]rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 
[\[286a.3\]]snying pos rab tu 'dul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za bar pad mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i 
[\[286a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul 
[\[286a.5\]]dang bral ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[286a.6\]]mar me ldan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer rab 
[\[286a.7\]]tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go_/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa thams cad blo gros 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi dkyil 'khor dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 
[\[286b.2\]]gang 'jig rten gyi khams brtag cing bgrang ba la 'jug pa'i tshul 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcur tshang ba'i rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa'i pha rol na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[286b.3\]]kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sa yongs su sbyong ba'i khyad par can 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo dpal gyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_
