[\[286b.4\]]klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/_de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rab 'byam dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[286b.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dga' zhing de skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[286b.6\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyas pos smras pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la 
[\[286b.7\]]dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//[{D105}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya maN+Da la aSh+Ta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo/_'di skad 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[287a.2\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa du mas yongs su bskor te/_mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong nas ltad mor 
[\[287a.3\]]gyur te/_de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma zhig 'das na gang gi 
[\[287a.4\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar ma gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di'i lan stsal du gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis thos na yang dbugs phyin par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzengs 
[\[287a.5\]]stod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang ngas sngon so so'i skye bo'i dus na kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pa de bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i dus na 
[\[287a.6\]]sngon byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin zhes bya ba zhig shin tu ma dad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos lnga dang ldan zhing /_chos 'dul ba la 
[\[287a.7\]]rgyab kyis phyogs so/_/dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang du rgyun mi 'chad par khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'gro'o/_/re zhig na dus kyi mthus khyim bdag de dge slong de la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa'i sems su gyur nas/_re zhig na khyim bdag des legs par bya ba'i las 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]kyi 'bras bu dris so/_/de nas dge slong des skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan te/_khyim bdag dkyil 
[\[287b.2\]]'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/_/des 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur te/_gang dang gang du skyes par chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_'khor mang pos lus phun sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po nyid thob 
[\[287b.3\]]par 'gyur/_yo byad phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_btsal dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor bar 'gyur/_lus sra zhing brtan la lus phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_de la ri dang rtsig pa rnams kyang sgrib pa mi byed de/_phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[287b.4\]]khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs par gyur nas/_dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ston cig dang /_des bdag la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung bas khyim bdag de'i bsam pa shes nas yang dag par rab tu 
[\[287b.5\]]bstan te/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/_/des na lci ba gsar bsres pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/_/sems can kun dang thun mong du/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang /_/gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_/rang sangs rgyas dag gang yod pa/_/de dag 
[\[287b.6\]]rnams la yongs su bsngo/_/de nas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste/_/'jig rten dbang dang byams pa dang /_/thub pa skyes mchog nam mkha' dang /_/kun tu bzang po blo ldan dang /_/gsang ba pa yi bdag po dang /_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang /_/
[\[287b.7\]]de bzhin sa yi snying po ste/_/de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o/_/khyim bdag 'di ni dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/_'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de las mngon sum du thos so/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig_/
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]kun nas skal ba 'thun pa yi/_/'khor rnams gang zhig 'dod pa des/_/dkyil 'khor brgyad ni bri bar bya/_/gang zhig brgya byin nyid dang ni/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag po dang /_/lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang /_/blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs bzang 'dod/_/rtag tu dkyil 
[\[288a.2\]]'khor mchog brgyad bya/_/seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[288a.3\]]seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi'am yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur to/_/ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[288a.4\]]byas pa'i bar dang /_sangs rgyas nyid thob kyi bar du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum de dang de dag tu chos 'di kun tu bsten to/_/bsgoms so/_/mang du byas so/_/rigs kyi bu gang gis na nga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/_/rkyen ni de yin no/_/
[\[288a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[288a.6\]]rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen kyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde 
[\[288a.7\]]la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
